Product_Description: What it is: An eau de toilette that offers an impressionistic stroll through the island-gardens on the Nile at Aswan.Fragrance story: Green mango, lotus, calamus and sycamore wood all lie at the heart of this refreshing ode."A new idea of freshness that is rather unusual; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand." —Jean-Claude Ellena Item #394624

PName: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li - Eau de toilette spray
Product_Description: What it is: An eau de toilette that describes a Chinese garden somewhere between reality and imagination.Fragrance story: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li is a place for meditation where strolling is allied to thought, and every step sets the imagination free."I remembered the smell of ponds, the smell of jasmine, the smell of wet stones, of plum trees, kumquats and giant bamboos. It was all there, and in the ponds there were even carp steadily working towards their hundredth birthday." —Jean-Claude Ellena Item #1094981

PName: Un Jardin en Méditerranée - Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: What it is: A perfume that conjures an idyllic world of shadows, water and light, on the theme of a fig tree allied with Mediterranean zests.Fragrance story: A novella that describes the spirit of a Mediterranean garden luxuriant with trees and flowers, and evokes a mosaic of smells pilfered from a private garden in Tunisia.'A perfumed expression of a Mediterranean memory, a mosaic of olfactory, visual and tactile sensations.' —Jean-Claude Ellena. Item #394623

PName: Un Jardin sur le Toit - Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: What it is: A lively, edgy novella that describes a secret garden, nestled in the heart of the city in Paris.Fragrance story: A hanging garden, perched on the roof of the house of Hermès, at 24 faubourg Saint-Honoré. An apple tree, a pear tree, a magnolia in the Paris air, along with a few self-seeded imposters, all making up this perfume of light and pleasure, enticing and full of laughter.'A garden for fun, a garden that answers to no one, sprinkled with light.' —Jean-Claude Ellena. Item #394628

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère - Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: What it is: A fragrance inspired by a surprising garden that is neither green nor floral, but blond.Fragrance story: It is the expression of an olfactory quest through Greece that leads to Kythira, an unspoiled island that has inspired many artists. A citrus, woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of the horse-drawn-carriage lanterns of yesteryear. The luminous graduated yellow glass echoes the sunny fragrance. On the box, artist Elia Kafouros sketches a colorful landscape of his homeland: golden grasses, green olive trees, fresh pink pistachios and, in the background, the blue of the sea.Style: Woody, aromatic.Notes:- Top: grasses- Middle: olive wood- Base: fresh pistachio- Made in France Item #7540883

PName: Rose Hermès - Silky Blush Powder
Product_Description: What it is: A blush with a semi-matte finish, embossed with texture resembling silk twill.What it does: A fine, silky, long-lasting powder for a luminous, radiant complexion. At once ethereal and compact, its ultralight, pigmented texture allows color intensity to be tailored as desired, softened or asserted, from the most natural to the most sophisticated finish. This long-lasting powder clings to the skin with the first touch. Rose Hermès can be refilled by simply removing and replacing its powder pan. With its round case and off-center mirror, this disk of white and gold light designed by Pierre Hardy is distinctive for its lightness, as it was conceived for use on the go. Slipped inside its orange box, this is a pure Hermès object.How to use: Applied freely, Rose Hermès expresses a state of mind, as if drawing a face. With its ultralight texture, the color can be applied as desired, to suit your mood. For a healthy glow, apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion. For highlighted cheekbones, apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look. For a sculpted effect, apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look.- 0.21 oz.- Winner of Allure's 'Best of Beauty' Award for Best Makeup Splurge, 2021- Made in France Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Talc, Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Zinc Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Dehydroacetate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Aqua/Water/Eau, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491/Ci 77492/Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake). Item #6238338

PName: Plein Air - Radiant Matte Powder
Product_Description: What it is: Beauty embraces the open air with the radiant matte powder, a soft, silky finishing powder that mattifies the complexion with a translucent glow.What it does: The formula contains emollients for long-lasting softness and comfort in a universal shade. Its round case with an off-center mirror is a disc of light in white and gold designed by Pierre Hardy. A lightweight object, it was created for use on the go.How to use: Apply the powder to bare skin to mattify the skin or after the complexion balm to absorb shine and set makeup. It can be used for touch-ups during the day, all over the face or where required on the forehead, nose or chin.- 0.22 oz.- Made in Italy Synthetic Fluorphlogopite Zinc, Stearate Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Lauryl Dimethicone Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Alumina Calcium Sodium, Borosilicate Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Hull Powder, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Laureth-4 Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Stearic Acid, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone Morus, Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene Geraniol Item #7324654

PName: Plein Air, H Trio - Iridescent Mineral Powder
Product_Description: What it is: A highlighting powder inspired by three of nature's elements: air, sun and earth.Who it's for: Ideal for all skin types.What it does: The iridescent mineral powder leaves a shimmering finish on the skin. Its high concentration of mother-of-pearl creates a multifaceted iridescent finish. Light is perfectly diffused through this elegant prism of pink or coral hues, and the skin glows with a new, natural radiance. Each harmony evokes the color palette of one of the world's landscapes. The formula is composed with 88% ingredients of natural origin. The iridescent mineral powder has an exceptional sensory quality derived from technology that produces the softest and finest possible particles of powder. Its texture enhances natural beauty and cares for the skin thanks to a hyaluronic acid derivative. With its round case, this white-and-gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic 'H' motif.Shades:- Rose atacama: the sand and rock of the Chilean desert illuminated by rare and unexpected blooms, captured in an iridescent palette with a rosy sheen- Made in Italy Item #7548607

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail & Cuticle Nourishing Oil
Product_Description: What it is: A nourishing oil that contains essential nutrients needed to nourish, hydrate, fortify and protect the nails from dryness.What it does: It also hydrates and softens the cuticles and is composed with 100% of ingredients of natural origin. It nourishes and protects the nails from external aggressors through the combined action of five oils with renowned properties, blended with Pistacia lentiscus L. resin, white mulberry extract and vitamin E. Easy to apply and nongreasy, it primes the nails for your color ritual. An object designed by Pierre Hardy that is both poetic and functional, slipped inside a little orange box.How to use: Apply to the top of each finger. Massage your cuticles with small, circular movements for optimum absorption. This caring gesture can be repeated daily or after your color ritual.- 0.5 oz.- Made in France M Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Squalane, Tocopherol, Parfum (Fragrance), Pongamia Glabra Seed Oil, Benzyl Salicylate, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral. Item #6826588

PName: Les Mains Hermès - Enamel Base Coat
Product_Description: What it is: A base coat that is the first step of the Hermès nail ritual.What it does: Its smooth texture, in translucent white, unifies and protects the nails and extends the longevity of your nail polish. Perfected by this invisible satin softness, the nails are prepared for the application of color. A formula containing 69% natural ingredients, it is enriched with the resin from Pistacia lentiscus. An object designed by Pierre Hardy that is both poetic and functional, it is protected from the light inside its white lacquered bottle and slipped into a little orange box.How to use: Apply the enamel base coat to your nails to prepare them for color. Place the brush at the base of your nail and sweep it upward toward the tip. Repeat on each side of the nail if necessary to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes.- 0.5 oz.- Made in France Butyl Acetate Ethyl Acetate Nitrocellulose Acetyl Tributyl Citrate Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer Alcohol Stearalkonium Bentonite Acrylates Copolymer Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer Isopropyl Alcohol Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Etocrylene Diacetone Alcohol Isopropyl Myristate Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract Phosphoric Acid Sorbic Acid Polyvinyl Butyral Acetyl Methionine Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) Ci 60725 (Violet 2) Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide). Item #6826577

PName: Les Mains Hermès - Nail Enamel
Product_Description: What it is: A nail polish available in a wide range of shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel.What it does: The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultrafine pigments. Its formula, made in France, is composed of at least 71% ingredients of natural origin. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris.How to use: To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle at the center and sweep upward toward the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the color more intense.- 0.5 oz.- Made in France Butyl Acetate Ethyl Acetate Nitrocellulose Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer Acetyl Tributyl Citrate Alcohol &Nbsp; Stearalkonium Bentonite Isopropyl Alcohol Etocrylene Diacetone Alcohol Hexanal Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract Phosphoric Acid Mannitol Sorbic Acid Diatomaceous Earth Zinc Sulfate N-Butyl Alcohol Tocopherol [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) Ci 77491/Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) Ci 73360 (Red 30)] *Ingrédients Issus De Lagriculture Biologique Item #6804812

PName: Trait d'Hermès - Revitalizing Care Mascara
Product_Description: What it is: A revitalizing care mascara that intensifies and emphasizes the gaze with lash-to-lash volume.What it does: Its innovative wand ensures easy application and precise lash definition. The mascara is composed of 97% natural ingredients and features a gentle formula suitable for all eyes, including sensitive ones. It contains millet-seed extract, known for its protective and lengthening properties, nourishing shea butter and moringa butter. As a result, the lashes appear denser and thicker. The light texture of the mascara, designed for lash-to-lash volume, glides seamlessly along each lash from root to tip, coating them individually for precise application. Its weightless formula has a long-lasting result that does not flake or transfer to the eyelid. The elegant and slim case features an ultrafine technocal wand made from plant fibers derived from the castor bean. Its shape forms a subtle H, creating reservoirs in the sides that deposit just the right amount of product onto lashes. True objects d'art designed by Pierre Hardy, each mascara is packaged in an orange box, a House signature.Colors:- Noir Fusain: a mark of mystery and a dark spark underscoring an enigmatic twinkle in the eye- Brun Bistre: a wooded path scattered with bronzed pigments, a sepia watercolor tinted with warm, coppery tones- Rouge H: the house's heritage color, an unfathomable shade nurtured by cherry brown and a Venetian-tinged burgundy, a fiery line that embodies its own history- Bleu Encre: a flowing line, diffuse writings extending out like a pair of wings, an elusive firmament as deep as the skies- Vert Titien: suffused with a vivid memory and tinged with botanical brightness, a spiritual allegory, a legendary sketch that captures the natural light- Violet indigo: a hazy azure pigment with cerulean intensity, a patch of sky that defines the eyes like a chiaroscuro landscape- 0.16 oz.- Made in Italy Aqua/Water/Eau Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate Glycerin Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba Moringa Oil/Hydrogenated Moringa Oil Esters Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate Panicum Miliaceum (Millet) Seed Extract Mica Cetyl Alcohol Phenoxyethanol Xanthan Gum Arginine Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Hydroxyacetophenone Sodium Dehydroacetate Potassium Sorbate Talc Chlorphenesin Triticum Aestivum (Wheat) Seed Extract Kaolin Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Morus Alba Bark Extract Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract Tocopherol Benzyl Alcohol [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 77007 (Ultramarines) Ci 77491 / Ci 77492 / Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) Ci75470 (Carmine)]./Creation Item #10103509

True objects d'art designed by Pierre Hardy, each mascara is packaged in an orange box, a House signature.Colors:- Noir Fusain: a mark of mystery and a dark spark underscoring an enigmatic twinkle in the eye- Brun Bistre: a wooded path scattered with bronzed pigments, a sepia watercolor tinted with warm, coppery tones- Rouge H: the house's heritage color, an unfathomable shade nurtured by cherry brown and a Venetian-tinged burgundy, a fiery line that embodies its own history- Bleu Encre: a flowing line, diffuse writings extending out like a pair of wings, an elusive firmament as deep as the skies- Vert Titien: suffused with a vivid memory and tinged with botanical brightness, a spiritual allegory, a legendary sketch that captures the natural light- Violet indigo: a hazy azure pigment with cerulean intensity, a patch of sky that defines the eyes like a chiaroscuro landscape- 0.16 oz.- Made in Italy Aqua/Water/Eau Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate Glycerin Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba Moringa Oil/Hydrogenated Moringa Oil Esters Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate Panicum Miliaceum (Millet) Seed Extract Mica Cetyl Alcohol Phenoxyethanol Xanthan Gum Arginine Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Hydroxyacetophenone Sodium Dehydroacetate Potassium Sorbate Talc Chlorphenesin Triticum Aestivum (Wheat) Seed Extract Kaolin Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Morus Alba Bark Extract Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract Tocopherol Benzyl Alcohol [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 77007 (Ultramarines) Ci 77491 / Ci 77492 / Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) Ci75470 (Carmine)]./Creation Item #10103509

PName: Trait d'Hermès - Revitalizing Care Mascara
Product_Description: What it is: A revitalizing care mascara that intensifies and emphasizes the gaze with lash-to-lash volume.What it does: Its innovative wand ensures easy application and precise lash definition. The mascara is composed of 97% natural ingredients and features a gentle formula suitable for all eyes, including sensitive ones. It contains millet-seed extract, known for its protective and lengthening properties, nourishing shea butter and moringa butter. As a result, the lashes appear denser and thicker. The light texture of the mascara, designed for lash-to-lash volume, glides seamlessly along each lash from root to tip, coating them individually for precise application. Its weightless formula has a long-lasting result that does not flake or transfer to the eyelid. The elegant and slim case features an ultrafine technocal wand made from plant fibers derived from the castor bean. PName: Ombres d'Hermès - Eyeshadow Quartet
Product_Description: What it is: A refillable eyeshadow palette that offers various avenues of expression for the eyes, creating a natural, intense or sophisticated look.What it does: Imagined by Gregoris Pyrpylis, creative director of Hermès Beauty, each palette is composed of 98% natural ingredients, is inspired by nature and bears a name evocative of its color universe. Each quartet is designed in a graduated trio of powders complemented by a fourth, bold and unexpected shade. The matte finish evokes the essence of silk chiffon, while the satin finish mirrors the allure of silk twill and the shimmering finish is reminiscent of silk lamé. Designed by Pierre Hardy, this quartet of eyeshadows plays with geometric shapes and echoes the Bauhaus movement. Its round case is protected by a canvas drawstring pouch and includes an applicator brush in lacquered wood. The object is presented in an orange box.Palette colors:- Ombres Pétales: a graceful palette with a poetic floral heritage accentuated by the sultry innocence of shades of pink and plum- Ombres Végétales: influenced by green foliage adorned with an iridescent shimmer, evoking an illuminated garden abundant with nature- Ombres Fauves: amber undertones that evoke the sensation of lustrous silk, accentuated with a bright ephemeral orange- Ombres Marines: a deep blue imbued with rich and enigmatic shades, resembling glimpses of the ocean's depths- Ombres Fumées: stormy shades tinged with a cool light as well as a dark presence with celestial accents- Ombres Mordorées: a golden horizon illuminated with delicate bronze accents that echo the radiant embers of autumn's warmthHow to use: The eyeshadow's soft and light texture can be easily blended using a finger or brush, allowing you to achieve your desired level of intensity. All can be used individually or combined to create a subtle, seamless blend of shadows. The eyeshadow case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately in quartets. SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CELLULOSE, PHENYLPROPANOL, MAGNESIUM STEARATE, MORUS ALBA BARK EXTRACT, CI 77491 / CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77007 (ULTRAMARINES). (MAT / MATTE) LIGHT ACCENT - INGREDIENTS: MICA, CALCIUM SODIUM BOROSILICATE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, ZINC STEARATE, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, TIN OXIDE, PHENYLPROPANOL, CELLULOSE, MAGNESIUM STEARATE, MORUS ALBA BARK EXTRACT, CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 77163 (BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE), CI 77491/ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES). (irisÃ© / iridescent) SURPRISE COLOUR - INGREDIENTS: MICA, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) POWDER, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, MALTODEXTRIN, LAUROYL LYSINE, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CELLULOSE, PHENYLPROPANOL, MAGNESIUM STEARATE, MORUS ALBA BARK EXTRACT, CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE), CI 75470 (CARMINE). PName: Trait d'Hermès - Precision Eyeliner
Product_Description: What it is: A precision eyeliner that highlights the gaze in a single stroke.What it does: Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal.How to use: The eyeliner is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze.- 0.07 oz.- Made in Japan This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your products packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. PName: Trait D'Hermès - Eye Pencil
Product_Description: What it is: This eye pencil combines a firm point with a creamy texture. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look.What it does: Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes.Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood sourced from PEFC-certified forests and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic 'H'.How to use: The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze.Pro tips: Using the pencil's smudger or the L'Estompeur precision brush, you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline. PName: The Hermèsistible - Infused Lip Care Oil
Product_Description: What it is: A lip oil featuring a scent created by perfumer Christine Nagel that corresponds to its color.What it does: Enriched with 93% active-care ingredients, the care oil is extremely sensory, enveloping and comfortable. Its plant oils form a protective and nourishing film on the lips, while the complex of emollient raw materials maintain and boost hydration. The case is made from glass and features a playful jumble of letters that form the name of the collection. The flocked, delicate and precise shape of the applicator enables a simple and intuitive action.The Colors: - Pourpre Camarine is a sparkling and fruity purple which borrows its hue from crowberries- Rose Kola is an elegant rosewood with vibrant nuances reminiscent of koala nut- Rouge Amarelle is a bright red to which the Amarelle cherry brings tangy gourmand notes- Rose Pitaya is a fresh pink combining delicacy with the fruity radiance of dragon fruit- Corail Bigarade is a bright, sunny coral, as fresh and soft as the flesh of a Seville orange- Beige Sapotille is a soft beige with a bright orange note reminiscent of sapodilla, a tropical fruit with a creamy caramel flavorThe Scents: Hermés perfumer, Christine Nagel has created a collection of unique scents that feature a base of sandalwood and arnice, which is then combined with other notes special to each color.- Pourpre Camarine features the fruity note of crowberry- Rose Kola features the spicy note of arnica- Rose Amarelle features the tangy note of Amarelle cherry- Rose Pitaya features the delicate note of dragon fruit- Corail Bigarade features the soft note of Seville orange- Beige Sapotille features the caramelized note of sapodilla- 0.28 oz.- Made in France- Made in France Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate, Copolymer, Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl, Glutamate, Dextrin, Palmitate/Ethylhexanoate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot), Kernel Oil, Octyldodecanol, Glyceryl Caprylate Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Sorbitan, Oleate Magnesium, Hydroxide Stearic Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Barium Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Eugenol, Citral, Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491/Ci 77492/Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake). PName: Rouge Hermès - Silky Lipstick Shine
Product_Description: What it is: A lipstick inspired by the luster of Hermès' silk.What it does: Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds and subtle pinks. The melting texture of Silky Lipstick Shine glides onto the lips, leaving a light and comfortable veil of translucent color. Its light to medium coverage offers buildable intensity, for looks ranging from a soft, sheer wash of color to a more intense result. The formula contains up to 85% ingredients of natural origin to provide comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with vegetable oils and butters, it contains active ingredients that care for the lips naturally. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood and angelica.Pierre Hardy has designed an object with slender lines and a lacquered and brushed metal finish. Its cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. Silky Lipstick Shine is protected by a Rouge H canvas pouch and nestled in an orange box. The Silky Lipstick Shine object is refillable. Only the lipstick bullet itself will need replacing (refills sold separately).Key ingredients:- Raspberry leaf extract: hydrating and plumping- Sesame seed extract: smoothing and softening- Abyssinian plant oil, white mulberry: nourishing and protectingHow to use: The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive and generous application. Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats. Product_Description: What it is: A complete treatment for the lips with moisturizing and smoothing properties.What it does: This rich balm with a fine, soft texture gently moisturizes. Its natural, nongreasy finish is perfect for both men and women. Its formula contains a high concentration of beeswax and candelilla wax for well-hydrated, supple and comfortable lips. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box.How to use: The stick is domed for easy, liberal and generous application, either as a base to smooth and soften the lips before applying color or as a treatment to keep the lips continuously hydrated.- 0.12 oz. PName: Rouge Hermès - Silky Lipstick Shine
Product_Description: What it is: A lipstick inspired by the luster of Hermès' silk.What it does: Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds and subtle pinks. The melting texture of Silky Lipstick Shine glides onto the lips, leaving a light and comfortable veil of translucent color. Its light to medium coverage offers buildable intensity, for looks ranging from a soft, sheer wash of color to a more intense result. The formula contains up to 85% ingredients of natural origin to provide comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with vegetable oils and butters, it contains active ingredients that care for the lips naturally. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood and angelica.Pierre Hardy has designed an object with slender lines and a lacquered and brushed metal finish. Its cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. Silky Lipstick Shine is protected by a Rouge H canvas pouch and nestled in an orange box. The Silky Lipstick Shine object is refillable. Only the lipstick bullet itself will need replacing (refills sold separately).Key ingredients:- Raspberry leaf extract: hydrating and plumping- Sesame seed extract: smoothing and softening- Abyssinian plant oil, white mulberry: nourishing and protectingHow to use: The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive and generous application. Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats. Product_Description: What it is: A duo of Hermès lip care products that will moisturize, smooth and color lips.Set includes:- Rouge Hermès - Lip Care Balm (0.12 oz.): a complete lip care product with moisturizing and smoothing properties. PName: Les Mains Hermès - Nail Enamel
Product_Description: What it is: A nail polish available in a wide range of shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel.What it does: The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultrafine pigments. Its formula, made in France, is composed of at least 71% ingredients of natural origin. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris.How to use: To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle at the center and sweep upward toward the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the color more intense.- 0.5 oz.- Made in France Butyl Acetate Ethyl Acetate Nitrocellulose Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer Acetyl Tributyl Citrate Alcohol &Nbsp; Stearalkonium Bentonite Isopropyl Alcohol Etocrylene Diacetone Alcohol Hexanal Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract Phosphoric Acid Mannitol Sorbic Acid Diatomaceous Earth Zinc Sulfate N-Butyl Alcohol Tocopherol [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) Ci 77491/Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) Ci 73360 (Red 30)] *Ingrédients Issus De Lagriculture Biologique Item #6804812

PName: Trait d'Hermès, Le Courbe-cils eyelash curler
Product_Description: What it is: An eyelash curler that enhances and sets the natural curl of the lashes, giving the eyes an elevated appearance.Who it's for: Suitable for all shapes of eyelids.What it does: This portable and durable object in matte black metal is engraved with the tone-on-tone Hermès signature on the golden band. Protected by a canvas pouch and an orange box, Le Courbe-cils comes with three replaceable pads: white, blue and orange.How to use: Gently press and hold at the base of the lashes to achieve a natural, wide-eyed look. PName: Trait D'Hermès - Eye Pencil
Product_Description: What it is: This eye pencil combines a firm point with a creamy texture. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look.What it does: Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes.Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood sourced from PEFC-certified forests and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic 'H'.How to use: The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze.Pro tips: Using the pencil's smudger or the L'Estompeur precision brush, you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline. PName: Eau de Mandarine Ambrée - Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: What it is: An eau de cologne capturing the joyous freshness of mandarin enveloped in notes of amber, bottled with a removable pump.Fragrance story: Reinventing its classic connections with citrus fruit and freshness, Eau de Mandarine Ambrée brings a vitality to cologne that is as mischievous as it is gentle. Intrinsically cheerful mandarin is combined with sparkling passionfruit, which is itself revealed by the mellowness of amber. A novella that expresses a lively, shimmering, smooth paradise, captured in color.'I can think of no smell more joyful than mandarin, more mellow than amber.'—Jean-Claude Ellena- Made in France Item #911605

PName: Concentré de Pamplemousse Rose - Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: What it is: An eau de toilette with a classic approach, favoring the liveliness and freshness of citrus fruits.Fragrance story: Eau de pamplemousse rose is distinctive for the modern way it is written. The citrus theme of this novella, incarnated by grapefruit, takes on a new brilliance when it comes into contact with roses. Eau de toilette; the sustained freshness of grapefruit, nuanced with rose petals, endorsed with full-bodied vetiver.'A bitter-sweet cologne: freedom in tradition.' —Jean-Claude Ellena. Item #394759

PName: Twilly d'Hermès - Body Shower Cream
Product_Description: What it is: A rich and velvety foaming cream that leaves your skin delicately perfumed, soft and supple.Fragrance story: It is in the spirit of free, bold and irreverent young women that perfumer Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle.Style: Spicy, floralNotes:- Top: ginger- Middle: tuberose- Base: sandalwood- 6.7 oz.- Made in France Item #7049288

PName: Sauvage Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: What it is: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes mysterious and sensual facets. Spicy and juicy bergamot brightens a trail of earthy patchouli and enveloping vanilla absolute with subtle smoky accents. An unforgettable signature that lasts all day and through the night.Fragrance story: Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. The Eau de Parfum represents the magic hour of the twilight in the desert, when the wolves come out. As the coolness of the thick blue night meet the burning desert air, nature exudes profound scents.The eau de parfum features a timeless and refillable cologne bottle, dense and dark like the inky night, shading from total opaqueness to smoky transparency. As an object of true luxury, each detail has been carefully studied: the initials CD are engraved on the bottom, and a bee, symbol of Dior men's fashion, is tucked inside the magnetized cap. The Sauvage Eau de Parfum bottle is now refillable thanks to its new design. The Sauvage refill, not suitable for standalone use, is only compatible with the Sauvage Eau de Parfum 1 oz and 3.4 oz bottles labeled 'REFILLABLE' on the backStyle: Earthy, woody, warm.Notes: Crisp Calabrian bergamot, sensual vanilla absolute, earthy patchouli.How to use: Cleanse with Sauvage Shower Gel (sold separately). Hydrate your skin with Sauvage Moisturizer for Face and Beard (sold separately). Complete the Sauvage ritual by applying Sauvage Eau de Toilette on pulse points: wrists and neck. Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Coumarin, Citronellol, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Citral, Bht, Geraniol, Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Tocopherol, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 42090 (Blue 1). The refill is only compatible with the 3.4 oz. (100 ml) bottle of Sauvage Eau de Parfum Made in France Item #5575921

PName: BLEU DE CHANEL Eau de Parfum Spray
Product_Description: What it is: An unexpected and undeniably bold fragrance that is fresh, clean and profoundly sensual.Fragrance story: This woody and aromatic fragrance reveals the spirit of a man who chooses his own destiny with independence and determination—a man who defies convention. It features a fresh citrus accord followed by ambery cedar notes. Woods are amplified by tonka bean and vanilla for heightened sensuality. New Caledonian sandalwood unfolds at the base for greater depth.Style: Woody, aromatic.Notes: Citrus accord, cedar notes, woods, tonka bean, vanilla, sandalwood.- Made in France Item #1040731

PName: Donna Born in Roma Eau de Parfum Fragrance
Product_Description: What it is: A modern and feminine floral women's perfume infused by Roman architecture and the iconic Valentino haute couture fashion house.Fragrance story: This long lasting eau de parfum is made with three qualities of jasmine blended with vanilla bourbon, creating the most expensive extract in the world. The sweet floral perfume base is then twisted with a radiant trio of moderny woody notes, giving an edgy touch to the scent reminiscent of Roman street culture. Designed with the iconic Valentino stud across the exterior, the fragrance bottle is an ode to the non-traditional fashion house.Style: Floral, woodyNotes:- Top: blackcurrant accord, bergamot essence- Middle: jasmine grandiflorum absolute, jasmine sambac absolute, jasmine tea- Base: bourbon vanilla, cashmeran, guaiac wood essenceMood: Feminine, delicate, refinedHow to use: Perfume is intensified by the warmth of your body. Mist in the creases of your knees and elbows for a long lasting scent. After applying the scent, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the eau de parfum, causing it to wear off more quickly. If you prefer to spray fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing as this tends to rinse off the scent. Made in France Item #5876543

PName: COCO MADEMOISELLE Eau de Parfum Spray
Product_Description: What it is: A sparkling fragrance that recalls a daring young Coco Chanel.Fragrance story: This irresistibly sexy fragrance is a modern composition with a strong yet surprisingly fresh character. Sparks of fresh and vibrant orange immediately awaken the senses. A clear and sensual heart reveals the transparent accords of Grasse jasmine and May rose. The scent finally unfurls with vibrant accents of patchouli and vetiver.Notes:- Top: orange.- Middle: Grasse jasmine, May rose.- Base: patchouli, vetiver. Made in France Item #108858

PName: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: What it is: A universal, luminous and intense fragrance with woody ambery floral notes, a one-of-a-kind condensed olfactory signature with a long-lasting sillageFragrance story: Inspired by the 250th anniversary of Baccarat, Francis Kurkdjian wanted to convey the poetic alchemy of crystal-making in this woody ambery floral fragrance, imagining a unique creation based on 3 ‘auras’.In the top notes, the breezy facets of jasmine flowers and the radiance of saffron evoke the aura of air. They are highlighted by an accord evoking ambergris and dry woody tones, embodying the mineral aura. Lastly, the aura of fire is suggested by the addictive sensuality of ethyl maltol, a note with gourmand facets.Style: Woody, ambery, floral.Notes:- Top: Jasmine, saffron- Middle: mossy woody accord- Base: Ethyl-maltol Ambroxan™ (amber, dry woody and mineral note) Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bht, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4). PName: Addict Lip Glow Balm
Product_Description: What it is: A hydrating lip balm infused with a unique technology that adapts to the pH of lips to reveal custom color and a natural-looking glow. The iconic formula is now available in an extended shade range of cool and warm undertones.What it does: Dior Addict Lip Glow Balm is where makeup meets lip care, offering the perfect blend of nourishment and color.The formula reacts to the pH level of your lips to instantly deliver custom color with a sheer, radiant glow. Infused with cherry extract and shea butter, this balm hydrates lips for 48 hours as it locks in moisture and visibly smoothes and plumps. This luxurious lip balm features a smooth texture that delivers maximum comfort and care.How to use: Apply additional coats of this lip balm directly to lips to achieve your desired look, from a subtle tinted glow to more intense color. Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Jojoba Esters, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Behenyl Behenate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ethyl Vanillin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Propyl Gallate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 45380 (Red 21), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake)]. 0.11 oz. PName: Rouge Dior Refillable Lipstick
Product_Description: What it is: A refillable Dior lipstick in two couture finishes.What it does: The refillable, long-lasting lipsticks with hydrating floral lip care provide 24 hours of color and comfort. Rouge Dior reveals satin and matte lipsticks in a sleek new magnetic case, an even wider range of shades, and with two times more lip care than before. PName: BLEU DE CHANEL L'EXCLUSIF
Product_Description: What it is: Designed like an Extrait de Parfum, this intense ambery-aromatic fragrance features a spellbinding trail, making it the most mysterious of all the BLEU DE CHANEL interpretations.Fragrance story: The radical lines of the cubic bottle accentuate the unique shape, rendering the vessel a true statement piece. Composed by CHANEL In-House Perfumer Creator Olivier Polge, BLEU DE CHANEL L'EXCLUSIF is a true concentration of precious raw materials. Sandalwood, highlighted in all its glory, adds dimension. The enigmatic character of the scent manifests through notes of cistus labdanum. Finally, woody ambery notes bring contrast and vibrancy, resulting in a majestic expression that leaves a memorable impression and stays on skin as if magnetically drawn to it.Style: Ambery.Notes: sandalwood, cistus, labdanum ad ambery notes. Made in France Item #10974896

PName: Miss Dior Parfum
Product_Description: What it is: A warm, floral fragrance from Dior.Fragrance story: Created by Francis Kurkdjian, this perfume opens with the juicy freshness of a sparkling mandarin. Starry jasmine, tailor-made for Dior, brings out succulent wild strawberry facets, and the ambery woody accord warms up a soothing depth to this intense yet incredibly smooth fruity floral parfum.'Make me a fragrance that smells like love,' Christian Dior said when he imagined his first fragrance, Miss Dior, in 1947. Today, the eau de parfum is a modern interpretation of Dior's eternal breath of youth, hope and happiness.The couturier's fragrance, Miss Dior Parfum, is adorned with a 'poignard' bow crafted in the workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers, known for its decade-long dedication to high fashion shows. A couture detail, woven from Lurex threads in a silvery hue that echoes the signature label. The emblematic Miss Dior houndstooth motif is engraved in the glass of this perfume in shimmering pink tones.Style: Warm floral.Notes: Sparkling mandarin, fruity jasmine, warm amber woods.How to use: Soften skin with the rich, creamy Miss Dior Moisturizing Body Milk (sold separately). Spray Miss Dior Parfum on pulse points: wrists and neck. Add shine and delicately scent your hair with Miss Dior Hair Mist (sold separately). PName: Men's Terre d'Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense, 1.6 oz.
Product_Description: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Terre d'Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense reveals a deeper facet of the inner fire that animates the earth and man. It is a deep, woody fragrance that combines fiery bergamot with burning wood, underpinned by the mineral notes of intense lava stone. The sides and H-shaped base of the bottle are presented in a reddish-brown lacquer with a molten look. The bottle is topped with a matte black metal cap that evokes lava stone. The 3.3-oz. and 1.6-oz. bottles can be replenished using the 6.7-oz. refill (sold separately). The bottle is made from glass and aluminum, two noble materials.

PName: Men's Terre d'Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense, 3.3 oz.

PName: Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée Eau de Parfum Spray, 1.6 oz
Product_Description: Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée, the heat of ice. A new Eau de Parfum, both fresh and intense. Created by Christine Nagel, Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée combines the intensity of citron and the sharp freshness of juniper berry with the power of Timut pepper. The striking sensation of an icy breeze is contrasted with the warmth of the woody, mineral notes characteristic of Terre d'Hermès. As if cut from ice, the refillable bottle is sleek and translucent. Frosted glass and brushed aluminum suggest the idea of frost covering the earth. The H on its base is a subtle reference to the ancestry of a now-cult object. Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée explores a new territory where freshness and strength nourish each other. "An icy cloak fertilizes the earth, exalting it with new and vibrant strength." - Christine Nagel, creative director of Hermès fragrances.

PName: Men's H24 Eau de Parfum Spray, 1.6 oz
Product_Description: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, H24 Eau de Parfum reveals an intense strength as the signature of a new energy. A woody aromatic, H24 Eau de Parfum draws on the generous, botanical power of enveloping sage, dense high-tech moss and warm and vibrant sclarene. With its pure lines, the refillable bottle designed by Philippe Mouquet is adorned with moss-green lacquer to echo the fragrance's olfactory notes. The intense gray box is decorated with a fine lime-green line that delimits and opens up the space. H24 is the key to a new space. H for Hermès, Homme and Hours. 24 to evoke a relationship with time and a link to the house's flagship address of 24 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré.

PName: Men's H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum Spray, 1.6 oz
Product_Description: With this third instalment in the H24 line, Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel continues her exercise in the footsteps of a modern man on the move. H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum recreates the sensation of rediscovering urban nature after the rain. H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum combines the power of a bouquet of fresh herbs, the texture of a pear granita and the liveliness of a high-tech molecule, Physcool.

Product_Description: Fresh woody notes are lively and reassuring; the brightness of juniper berries contrasts with the energy of cedar and the softness of white musks. An invitation to discover, meet and share." Jean-Claude Ellena A novel that feeds on the imagination, Voyage d'Hermès expresses the long-standing and unusual relationship between the house and travel. An interplay of paradoxes, complements and unexpected alliances support the premise of woody notes that are fresh yet musky, familiar yet surprising, hovering between impulsive and comforting, equally at ease with men as with women. Hermès designer Philippe Mouquet created a travel object bottle for Voyage d'Hermès, designed for journeys and symbolic of movement.

PName: Concentré d'Orange Verte Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: Freshness upheld by an explosion of orange, with a woody signature. The founding cologne, created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, Eau d'orange verte has since asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, standing out by its distinctive freshness. Conceived as an explosion of citrus notes, orange plays the principal role supported by zest and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. The fragrance reveals its complexity in a unique sillage composed of oak moss and patchouli.

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Eau de Cologne Spray, 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: Hermès' first cologne: the bright and green freshness of orange combined with woody undertones. The founding cologne, created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, Eau d'Orange Verte has since asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, standing out by its distinctive freshness. Conceived as an explosion of citrus notes, orange plays the principal role supported by zest and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. The fragrance reveals its complexity in a unique sillage composed of oak moss and patchouli. Bottle with removable pump.

PName: Eau de Basilic Pourpre Eau de Cologne, 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: Hermès Fragrances welcomes a new light and airy creation. Conceived by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Eau de Basilic Pourpre is a tribute to purple basil, a sun-drenched aromatic that calls to mind conviviality and summer holidays with the family. Eau de Basilic Pourpre expresses the deep and generous aromatic freshness of purple basil, enlivened with light, crystalline green bergamot and geranium to lend character. The iconic lantern bottle is dressed up in a luminous green that vibrates with color. The orange box is adorned with a contrasting green band that echoes the color of the bottle. An endless playground for virtuosity, the Hermès Fragrances collection explores the sensoriality of materials. It procures an instant, abundant pleasure whose unifying appeal goes beyond gender, fashion, age and season.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Eau de Cologne, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime. "Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... So many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note." - Christine Nagel. Eau de Citron Noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness that rises to the challenge of tenacity: it is the midday-to-midnight cologne!

PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate Eau de Cologne Natural Spray, 3.3 oz
Product_Description: The crisp tangy freshness of rhubarb with the velvety allure of white musks. "I've always loved the duality of rhubarb. A double duality: visual and olfactory. The green color metamorphoses into red. Starting acidic and crisp, its smell becomes smooth and velvety." - Christine Nagel. With Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate, Christine Nagel created her first cologne for Hermès. Unprecedented and bold, more vegetal than citrus, it gives you the crisp, acidic freshness of rhubarb made velvet-smooth with white musks. Bottle with removable pump.

PName: Eau de Parfum, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: The scent of the Hermès girls, a daring fragrance woven with striking ginger and sensual tuberose. A floral and spicy Eau de Parfum. "It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'Hermès. Free, bold, connected, mischievous and irreverent, they turn expectation on its head, swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo." - Christine Nagel. It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. Each silk ribbon is unique.

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Eau Ginger Eau de Parfum, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: Twilly Eau Ginger, the sparkle of the Hermès girls. A dazzling creation woven with three materials: a generous, vibrating peony, a bright candied ginger and a supple and lively cedarwood. A floral, spicy and woody Eau de Parfum. Yesterday they were mischievous, then they were spicy, and today they are joyful, bright and sparkling. Their faces light up, smiling and free, to express the impertinence and freshness of this new Twilly d'Hermès, one that turns everything on its head. Inside its box, printed with the Astrologie nouvelle design reworked in fresh colors, sits the Twilly Eau Ginger bottle, tied with a new silk ribbon and topped with a brilliant white cap.

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Eau Poivrée Eau de Parfum, 2.87 oz.
Product_Description: The peppery spirit of the Hermès girls. A daring fragrance colored with vibrant pink peppercorn, tender rose and elegant patchouli. Spicy, floral, woody. "Hermès girls swim happily against the tide, set their own tempo, invent a whole new rhythm. For them I have imagined a new facet in tribute to their youthful spirit." - Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumer. Twilly Eau Poivrée travels from the skin to the mind, colorful and incisive. Three new materials make up its sensuality: the vibrant and abundant heat of pink peppercorn, the teenage freshness of tender rose and the captivating enchantment of patchouli. Their essences intertwine, weaving the invisible web that connects the Hermès girls to each other.

PName: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum, 1.6 oz
Product_Description: Created by Christine Nagel for the Hermès girls, Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum is a tribute to their free spirit (a blend of daring and lightheartedness) and their multifaceted nature. A floral and fruity Eau de Parfum, combining notes of gentle ginger blossom, mellow lychee and enveloping musk notes. Designed by Florence Manlik, the lantern-shaped bottle has a square silhouette, adorned with an inverted lychee-red color graduation. With a final flourish, a unique hand-tied silk ribbon playfully embellishes the cap of each bottle designed by Carine Brancowitz.

PName: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum, 2.87 oz

PName: Eau des Merveilles Bleue Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.6 oz.
Product_Description: The woody and amber toned Eau de toilette takes on mineral notes. A sparkling and brisk plunge into the deep sea of Merveilles. Since 2004, Eau des Merveilles has been a key that opens the door to the wonders of Hermès. From innocence to fantasy, from childhood dreams to femininity, it is a world where the extraordinary is brought into the light. Year after year, we are transported on an air of poetic enchantment. Captured in their round bottles resembling a magnifying glass, the fragrances have the magical power to see the world from new and marvelous angles. It is the key to wonders, the origin of stars in broad day light.

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur la Lagune, a dream garden, soothing and vibrant. A floral and woody Eau de Toilette. A half open door, a dream escapes. Un jardin sur la Lagune is a secret garden where nature comes into its own again. Woody scents blend with floral notes. The wind carries afar salty notes. "I dreamed of this garden; I created a perfume woven from its memories, the cycle of trees and flowers, nature still enduring within it." - Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumer.

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur la Lagune, a dream garden, soothing and vibrant. A floral and woody Eau de Toilette. A half open door, a dream escapes. PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur le Nil is an impressionistic stroll through the island gardens on the Nile at Aswan, the starting point for a new olfactory adventure. Green mango, lotus, calamus and sycamore wood all lie at the heart of this refreshing ode. A garden full of life, generous and sparkling, where the scents of green mango, lotus blossom and rush blend with incense and sycamore wood. "A new and rather unusual concept of freshness; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand." - Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li describes a Chinese garden poised between reality and imagination. A place for meditation, where strolling is allied to thought, and every step sets the imagination free. A garden of awakening and harmony, poised between reality and the imagination, with wet stones, vegetal jasmine and kumquats. "I remembered the smell of ponds, the smell of jasmine, the smell of wet stones, of plum trees, kumquats and giant bamboos. It was all there, and in the ponds there were even carp steadily working towards their hundredth birthdays." - Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: Un Jardin en Méditerranée Eau de Toilette, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: A garden of water, light and shadows, enveloping and sensual, where the fig tree is allied with Mediterranean zests. "An expression in perfume of a Mediterranean memory, a mosaic of olfactory, visual and tactile sensations." - Jean-Claude Ellena. A novella that describes the spirit of a Mediterranean garden luxuriant with trees and flowers and evokes a mosaic of scents gathered from a private garden in Tunisia. Like a travelogue, this fragrance conjures up an idyllic world of shadows, water and light, on the theme of a fig tree allied with Mediterranean zest.

PName: Un Jardin en Méditerranée Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: A garden of water, light and shadows, enveloping and sensual, where the fig tree is allied with Mediterranean zests. A novella that describes the spirit of a Mediterranean garden luxuriant with trees and flowers and evokes a mosaic of scents gathered from a private garden in Tunisia. Like a travelogue, this fragrance conjures up an idyllic world of shadows, water and light, on the theme of a fig tree allied with Mediterranean zest. "An expression in perfume of a Mediterranean memory, a mosaic of olfactory, visual and tactile sensations." - Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: Un Jardin sur le Toit Eau de Toilette, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur le Toit is a lively, edgy novella. This fragrance describes a secret garden, hidden in the heart of the city, in Paris. A hanging garden, perched on the rooftop of the Hermès building at 24 Faubourg Saint-Honoré. An apple tree, a pear tree and a magnolia flourish in the Paris air, along with a few self-seeded imposters, all making up this scent of light and pleasure, enticing and full of laughter. A garden of feasting and joyfulness, where apple trees overhang wild grasses. "A garden that answers to no one, a cheerful garden, watered with light." - Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: Un Jardin sur le Toit Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur le Toit is a lively, edgy novella. This fragrance describes a secret garden, hidden in the heart of the city, in Paris. A hanging garden, perched on the rooftop of the Hermès building at 24 Faubourg Saint-Honoré. An apple tree, a pear tree and a magnolia flourish in the Paris air, along with a few self-seeded imposters, all making up this scent of light and pleasure, enticing and full of laughter. A garden of feasting and joyfulness, where apple trees overhang wild grasses. "A garden that answers to no one, a cheerful garden, watered with light." - Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: HERMES Un Jardin à Cythère Scented Hair Mist, 1 oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin à Cythère is reinvented as a perfumed hair mist, offering a multi-sensory tour of the Peloponnese. The light, airy texture delicately perfumes and enhances the hair. Un Jardin à Cythère is a woody citrus fragrance that combines an enveloping character reminiscent of grasslands with the power of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. The formula is suitable for all hair types, with active ingredients that leave hair visibly shinier, softer and silkier without adding weight or drying it out. Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of horse-drawn carriage lanterns. The glass features a lively frosted effect in yellow hues that evoke brilliant sunlight. The hair mist comes in an ideal travel format and is a great way to prolong the scent of Un Jardin à Cythère throughout the day.

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette, 1.6 oz
Product_Description: Created by Hermès' perfumer Christine Nagel, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette is a surprising garden that is neither green nor floral, but blond. It is the expression of an olfactory quest through Greece that leads to Kythira, an unspoiled island that has inspired many artists. A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of the horse-drawn carriage lanterns of yesteryear. The luminous graduated yellow glass echoes the sunny fragrance. On the box, artist Elias Kafouros sketches a colorful landscape of his homeland: golden grasses, green olive trees, fresh pink pistachios and, in the background, the blue of the sea.

PName: Rose Hermès Silky Blush Powder
Product_Description: Embossed with a texture resembling silk twill, Rose Hermès Silky Blush is a fine, silky, long-lasting powder with a semi-matte finish for a luminous, radiant complexion. At once ethereal and compact, its ultra-light, pigmented texture allows color intensity to be tailored as desired, softened or asserted, from the most natural to the most sophisticated finish. This long-lasting powder clings to the skin with the first touch. With its round case and off-center mirror, this disc of white and gold light designed by Pierre Hardy is distinctive for its lightness, as it was conceived for use on the go. Slipped inside its orange box, this is a pure Hermès object. Rose Hermès Silky Blush can be refilled by simply removing and replacing its powder pan. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A blush with a semi-matte finish#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Helps create a luminous, radiant complexion#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Applied freely, Rose Hermès Silky Blush expresses a state of mind, as if drawing a face; with its ultra-light texture, the color can be applied as desired, to suit your mood#||#Healthy Glow: Apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion#||#Highlighted Cheekbones: Apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look#||#Sculpted Effect: Apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look

PName: Plein Air Radiant Matte Powder - Nuage
Product_Description: Beauty embraces the open air with Radiant Matte Powder, a soft, silky finishing powder that mattifies the complexion with a translucent glow. Its shade is universal. The formula contains emollients for long-lasting softness and comfort. Its round case with off-center mirror is a disc of light in white and gold designed by Pierre Hardy. A lightweight object, it was created for use on the go. Slipped into its orange box, it is a pure Hermès object. The Radiant Matte Powder case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately.

PName: Plein Air H Trio Iridescent Mineral Powder
Product_Description: Beauty in the open air with the H Trio mineral powders. Inspired by three of nature's elements (air, sun and earth), the Iridescent Mineral Powder leaves a shimmering finish on the skin. Its high concentration of mother-of-pearl creates a multifaceted iridescent finish. Light is perfectly diffused through this elegant prism, and the skin glows with a new radiance. With its round case, this white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic H passant motif.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#Iridescent mineral powders with each harmony evoking the color palette of one of the world's landscapes#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Leaves a shimmering finish on the skin; cares for the skin thanks to a hyaluronic acid derivative#||#INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS:#||#Exceptional sensory quality is derived from technology that produces the softest and finest possible particles of powder; high concentration of mother-of-pearl creates a multifaceted iridescent finish#||#SKIN TYPES:#||#Suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive#||#HOW TO USE:#||#The case can be refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder compact#||#Refills are sold separately

PName: Les Mains Hermès Enamel Base Coat, 0.5 oz.
Product_Description: The Enamel Base Coat is the first step of the Les Mains Hermès ritual. Its smooth texture, in translucent white, unifies and protects the nails and extends the longevity of the polish. Perfected by this invisible satin softness, the nails are prepared for the application of color. An object designed by Pierre Hardy that is both poetic and functional, it is protected from the light inside its white lacquered bottle and slipped into its little orange box!

PName: Les Mains Hermès Enamel Top Coat, 0.5 oz.
Product_Description: The Enamel Top Coat is the final touch of the Les Mains Hermès color ritual. Its transparent "gel lacquer" texture produces a long-lasting high-gloss finish, encasing the color in a protective shell for durability. Nails do not catch; instead they shine, with the mirror polish optimizing light (without encumbering the surface) and giving a curved effect of depth. Its formula is made in France. The object designed by Pierre Hardy is both poetic and functional. It is protected from the light inside its black lacquered bottle and slipped into its little orange box!#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A transparent "gel lacquer" texture#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Produces a long-lasting high-gloss finish#||#HOW TO USE:#||#To give the color maximum shine and hold, apply a layer of the top coat#||#The gesture is identical to that of the enamel base#||#Allow to dry for about fifteen minutes#||#For a natural look, the top coat can be applied directly over the enamel base#||#This product will be delivered by Standard Ground Shipping and is not eligible for Premium or Overnight Shipping.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel, 0.5 oz.
Product_Description: Hermès' nail enamel is available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its cap in white and gold-tone metal is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A nail enamel available in 24 shades#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine#||#INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS:#||#Contains a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments#||#HOW TO USE:#||#To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the center of the lunula, then sweep it upward to the tip of the nail; repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface#||#Allow to dry for two minutes#||#Applying a second coat will make the color more intense#||#This product will be delivered by Standard Ground Shipping and is not eligible for Premium or Overnight Shipping.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Revitalizing Care Mascara
Product_Description: The Revitalizing Care Mascara with lash-to-lash volume is ideal for intensifying and emphasizing the gaze. Its innovative wand ensures easy application and a precise gesture for perfect lash definition and an open, elevated gaze. The mascara's gentle formula is suitable for all eyes, including sensitive. It contains millet seed extract with its protective and lengthening properties, shea butter with its nourishing properties and moringa butter. The light texture extends along each lash from root to tip, coating them one by one for precise, weightless volume and a long-lasting result that does not flake or transfer to the eyelid. This refined and slender object holds an ultra-fine technical wand composed of fibers from the castor bean. Its shape forms a subtle H, creating reservoirs in the sides that deposit just the right amount of product on the lashes. True objets d'art designed by Pierre Hardy, each mascara is packaged in an orange box, a House signature.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A mascara to intensify and emphasize the gaze#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Coats the lashes, which appear denser and thicker; protects, lengthens and nourishes lashes; suitable for all eyes, including sensitive#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Use the ultra-fine technical wand to deposit just the right amount of product on the lashes#||#Remove makeup using warm water; it's quick, easy and gentle

PName: Ombres d'Hermès Powder Quartet For Eyes
Product_Description: Six palettes offer multiple possibilities of expression for a natural, intense and sophisticated look. Each quartet is composed of a graduated trio of powders enlivened by a fourth, stronger and more surprising color. All can be used alone or combined to create a subtle harmony or blend of shadows. Imagined by Gregoris Pyrpylis, creative director of Hermès Beauty, each harmony is inspired by nature and bears a name evocative of its color universe. The object designed by Pierre Hardy for this quartet of eyeshadows plays with geometric shapes and echoes the Bauhaus movement. The round case is protected by a canvas drawstring pouch and accompanied by an applicator brush in lacquered wood. The object is presented in an orange box.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#An eyeshadow quartet#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#The eyeshadows contain silky emollients and oils for easy application and a long-lasting, second-skin effect#||#The soft and light texture of the eyeshadows is easily blended with the finger or a brush for customized intensity#||#In each palette, the different finishes are inspired by the silk métier; the matte finish evokes silk chiffon, the satin finish suggests silk twill and the shimmering finish is reminiscent of silk lame#||#The case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan; refills are sold separately in the form of quartets

PName: Trait d'Hermès Precision Eyeliner
Product_Description: The Trait d'Hermès Precision Eyeliner highlights the gaze in a single stroke. It is easy to apply, creating a long-wear line on the eyelid. The product is formulated with intense black pigments, while its texture allows the user to draw a clean line with an even, satin finish. Waterproof and quick-drying, the eyeliner creates a long-wear makeup look that will not smudge or run. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the refillable eyeliner is an object created to last. It contains an Encre Noir cartridge and is reminiscent of a fountain pen. The fibers of the tapered applicator tip remain soft over time and are shaped to ensure a precise and adjustable line. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic H.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A refillable eyeliner that offers makeup looks from the most natural to the most sophisticated#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Creates a long-wear line on the eyelid; will not smudge or run#||#HOW TO USE:#||#For a fine, precise line, use the tip of the applicator and draw a line with a light touch#||#For a thick, graphic line, use the full length of the applicator and draw a line with a firm touch

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Color Pencil
Product_Description: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. The twenty-four emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils from your childhood, this eye pencil is made of wood. It has a built-in smudger and its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic "H."#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A formula that combines highly sensory qualities and intense pigments#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Draws a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids; creamy texture offers a matte finish; suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Apply the color in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze#||#Using the pencil's smudger or the L'Estompeur de Précision Brush (sold separately), you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline

PName: Hermèsistible Infused Lip Care Oil, 0.28 oz.
Product_Description: The Hermèsistible lip collection awakens the senses with a synaesthesia of colors and scents. Hermèsistible Color & Scent Care Oil combines a nourishing skincare action with a fresh makeup result, while Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel has created a collection of six scents corresponding to each color. Hydrated and smoothed, the lips are adorned with a light touch of color, radiant shine and a unique scent. The joyful and colorful object is made from glass and enhanced with a playful jumble of letters forming the name of the collection. On the cap, the Hermès ex-libris is engraved tone-on-tone.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A sensory, enveloping and comfortable care oil enriched with a high concentration of active ingredients#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Forms a protective, nourishing film on the lips; helps maintain and improve hydration; flocked, delicate and precise shape of the applicator enables a simple and intuitive action

PName: Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description: The Rosy Lip Enhancer is a lip enhancer that evokes fresh dew on the lips. Its weightless and translucent halo reveals the lips' own beauty. With its fine and delicate waxy finish, the Rosy Lip Enhancer melts over the lip, leaving a hint of transparent pink and a matt luminosity. Lips are delicately smoothed with a soft-focus effect. The Rosy Lip Enhancer object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic yet functional and durable. Made from lacquered, polished and brushed metal, it is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box! This object is refillable. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A lip enhancer with a fine and delicate waxy finish#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Leaves a hint of transparent pink and a matt luminosity; delicately smooths lips with a soft-focus effect#||#INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS:#||#Sesame seed and raspberry seed oils help soften and nourish#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Beveled and slightly rounded, the shape of the bullet invites a generous and precise application

PName: Trait d'Hermès Lip Color Pencil
Product_Description: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. The 16 emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are designed to match all the shades in the Rouge Hermès collection perfectly. Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils you remember from childhood, this lip pencil is made of wood. It has a built-in smudger and its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic H.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A creamy, comfortable lip pencil with a matte finish#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Delivers intense, long-wear color; line may be precise or blended#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Apply the color in a single stroke, to delineate, define and enhance the contours of the lips or to color them#||#The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible (sold separately), or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick (sold separately)
