PName: Rouge Hermès Silky Lipstick Shine
Product_Description: Silky Lipstick Shine is inspired by the luster of Hermès silk. Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds and subtle pinks. The hybrid makeup and lip-care formula provides comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with oils and butters, it also contains active ingredients that care for the lips, including hydrating and plumping raspberry leaf extract, smoothing and softening sesame seed extract, nourishing and protecting Abyssinian oil and white mulberry. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood and angelica. Pierre Hardy has designed an object with slender lines and a lacquered and brushed metal finish. Its cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. It is protected by a Rouge H canvas pouch and nestled in an orange box. Silky Lipstick Shine is refillable. Only the lipstick bullet itself will need replacing. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A new lipstick that features a hybrid makeup and lip-care formula#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#The melting texture glides onto the lips, leaving a light and comfortable veil of translucent color; its light to medium coverage offers buildable intensity, for looks ranging from a soft, sheer wash of color to a more intense result#||#HOW TO USE:#||#The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive and generous application#||#Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats#||#For flawlessly defined or subtly ombré lips, use a Trait d'Hermès Lip Pencil (sold separately) before applying Silky Lipstick Shine

PName: Rouge Hermès Poppy Lip Shine
Product_Description: Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. The Poppy Lip Shine is a surprising lip shine that elegantly enhances and amplifies the natural radiance of the lips. The translucent, slightly orange-toned formula is enriched with mother-of-pearl micro-particles. The object designed by Pierre Hardy is at once poetic and functional. The durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! Poppy Lip Shine is refillable. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A lip shine with a fine, rich and comfortable texture#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Applied generously, it acts as a natural enhancer, leaving lips lightly tinted with a subtle gloss; this is the Poppy touch

PName: Rouge Hermès Lip Care Balm
Product_Description: Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. The Lip Care Balm is a rich balm with a fine, soft texture that gently moisturizes. Its natural, non-greasy finish is perfect for both men and women. The formula includes a high concentration of beeswax and candelilla wax for well-hydrated, supple and comfortable lips. The object designed by Pierre Hardy is at once poetic and functional. The durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! Rouge Hermès Lip Care Balm is refillable. Refills are sold separately.

PName: Rouge Hermès Matte Lipstick
Product_Description: The Rouge Hermès collection is dedicated to lip beauty. It makes a daily ritual exquisite, oozes charm and showcases the color of a personality. This matte lipstick with a second-skin effect promises moisturized, comfortable lips. Its velvety, powdery finish provides intense, long-lasting color. The highly concentrated pigments leave their mark with a single stroke. The combination of a moisturizing complex and white mulberry extract in the heart of the formula takes care of the lips. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the polished and brushed, lacquered metal object is protected by a canvas bag and slipped inside a small orange box. Its design creates tension between the maison's contemporary spirit and its history told by the Ex-Libris. Rouge Hermès is refillable. It is made from high-quality materials to ensure it lasts. Only the lipstick bullet is temporary. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A matte lipstick with a second-skin effect#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Provides intense, long-lasting color while leaving lips moisturized and comfortable#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Use the pointed tip of the lipstick for a neat and precise line in a single gesture

PName: Rouge Hermès Silky Lipstick Shine
Product_Description: Silky Lipstick Shine is inspired by the luster of Hermès silk. Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds and subtle pinks. The hybrid makeup and lip-care formula provides comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with oils and butters, it also contains active ingredients that care for the lips, including hydrating and plumping raspberry leaf extract, smoothing and softening sesame seed extract, nourishing and protecting Abyssinian oil and white mulberry. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood and angelica. Pierre Hardy has designed an object with slender lines and a lacquered and brushed metal finish. Its cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. It is protected by a Rouge H canvas pouch and nestled in an orange box. Silky Lipstick Shine is refillable. Only the lipstick bullet itself will need replacing. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A new lipstick that features a hybrid makeup and lip-care formula#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#The melting texture glides onto the lips, leaving a light and comfortable veil of translucent color; its light to medium coverage offers buildable intensity, for looks ranging from a soft, sheer wash of color to a more intense result#||#HOW TO USE:#||#The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive and generous application#||#Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats#||#For flawlessly defined or subtly ombré lips, use a Trait d'Hermès Lip Pencil (sold separately) before applying Silky Lipstick Shine

PName: Trait d'Hermès Lip Color Pencil
Product_Description: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. The 16 emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are designed to match all the shades in the Rouge Hermès collection perfectly. Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils you remember from childhood, this lip pencil is made of wood. It has a built-in smudger and its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic H.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A creamy, comfortable lip pencil with a matte finish#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Delivers intense, long-wear color; line may be precise or blended#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Apply the color in a single stroke, to delineate, define and enhance the contours of the lips or to color them#||#The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible (sold separately), or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick (sold separately)

PName: 2-Pc. Rouge Hermès & Rose Hermès Gift Set
Product_Description: Discover this duo of Hermès beauty objects. Rouge Hermès Lip Balm is a complete lip-care product with moisturizing and smoothing properties. With a fine, soft, melting texture and a non-greasy finish, the rich balm is perfect for both men and women. Depositing a light, translucent halo, Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer in Rose Confetti reveals the natural beauty of the lips. Its fine, soft, waxy texture melts onto the lips, enhancing them with a transparent touch of pink and a brilliant shine. The Rose Confetti shade is a playful pink with hints of blue, whose radiance and freshness color the lips with the lightness of confetti. Each object is slipped into a colored canvas pouch. A treat for yourself or for someone else, presented ready to gift in an orange box.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel, 0.5 oz.
Product_Description: Hermès' nail enamel is available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its cap in white and gold-tone metal is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A nail enamel available in 24 shades#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine#||#INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS:#||#Contains a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments#||#HOW TO USE:#||#To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the center of the lunula, then sweep it upward to the tip of the nail; repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface#||#Allow to dry for two minutes#||#Applying a second coat will make the color more intense#||#This product will be delivered by Standard Ground Shipping and is not eligible for Premium or Overnight Shipping.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Le Courbe-Cils Eyelash Curler
Product_Description: Suitable for all shapes of eyelids, the Le Courbe-Cils Eyelash Curler optimizes and sets the curl of the lashes for elevated eyes. This portable and durable object in matte black metal bears the Hermès signature engraved tone-on-tone on the golden band. Protected by a canvas pouch and an orange box, Le Courbe-Cils is supplied with three pads: one white, one blue and one orange.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Color Pencil
Product_Description: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. The twenty-four emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils from your childhood, this eye pencil is made of wood. It has a built-in smudger and its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic "H."#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A formula that combines highly sensory qualities and intense pigments#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Draws a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids; creamy texture offers a matte finish; suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Apply the color in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze#||#Using the pencil's smudger or the L'Estompeur de Précision Brush (sold separately), you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline

PName: Eau de Mandarine Ambrée Eau de Cologne, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: The joyous freshness of mandarin enveloped in notes of amber. "I can think of no smell more joyful than mandarin, more mellow than amber." - Jean-Claude Ellena. Reinventing its classic connections with citrus fruit and freshness, Eau de Mandarine Ambrée brings a vitality to cologne that is as mischievous as it is gentle. Intrinsically cheerful mandarin is combined with sparkling passion fruit, which is itself revealed by the mellowness of amber. A novella that expresses a lively, shimmering, smooth paradise, captured in a color.

PName: Eau de Pamplemousse Rose Eau de Cologne, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: The sparkling freshness of grapefruit with nuances of rose petals. "A bitter-sweet cologne: freedom in tradition." - Jean-Claude Ellena. With its classic approach favoring the liveliness and freshness of citrus fruit, Eau de Pamplemousse Rose is distinctive for its modern writing style. The citrus theme of this novella, incarnated by grapefruit, takes on a new brilliance when it comes into contact with roses.

PName: Concentré de Pamplemousse Rose Eau de Toilette, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: The sustained freshness of grapefruit, nuanced with rose petals, endorsed with full-bodied vetiver. ""A bitter-sweet cologne: freedom in tradition."" Jean-Claude Ellena With its classic approach favouring the liveliness and freshness of citrus fruit, Eau de pamplemousse rose is distinctive for its modern writing style. The citrus theme of this novella, incarnated by grapefruit, takes on a new brilliance when it comes into contact with roses.

PName: Eau de Néroli Doré Eau de Cologne, 3.3-oz.
Product_Description: The vivid and abundant freshness of neroli accentuated with notes of saffron. Bottle with removable pump. "Whereas there's usually very little neroli in fragrances, I used an abundance of it, out of love, out of the ordinary." - Jean-Claude Ellena. With Eau de Néroli Doré, his fifth creation in the colognes family, Jean-Claude Ellena has given full voice to neroli (the essence extracted from orange blossom), so called in homage to Princess Nerola, who perfumed her gloves with it. He also added saffron to heighten its lively, enveloping freshness.

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Hair & Body Shower Gel, 6.7-oz.
Product_Description: The founding cologne, created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, Eau d'Orange Verte has since asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, standing out because of its distinctive freshness. Conceived as an explosion of citrus notes, orange plays the principal role supported by zest and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. The fragrance reveals its complexity in a unique sillage composed of oak moss and patchouli.

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Hand & Body Cleansing Gel, 10.1 oz.
Product_Description: Freshness upheld by an explosion of orange, with a woody signature. The founding cologne, created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, Eau d'Orange Verte has since asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, standing out by its distinctive freshness. PName: Eau de Citron Noir Hair & Body Shower Gel, 6.7-oz.
Product_Description: Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... So many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note. - Christine Nagel. A hair and body formula that transforms into a pleasant, generous lather; easy to rinse. Delicately perfumed, the skin is left soft and the hair shiny. Another way to wear fragrance with Eau de Citron Noir.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Hand & Body Cleansing Gel, 10.1 oz.
Product_Description: Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... So many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note. - Christine Nagel. Eau de Citron Noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness that rises to the challenge of tenacity: it is the midday-to-midnight fragrance!

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Moisturizing Body Lotion, 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime. "Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... So many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note." - Christine Nagel. Eau de Citron Noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness that rises to the challenge of tenacity: it is the midday-to-midnight fragrance!

PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate Perfumed Soap, 100 g
Product_Description: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate Perfumed Soap cleanses and delicately perfumes the skin without drying it out. The crisp, tangy freshness of rhubarb with the velvety allure of white musk. This round, gentle perfumed soap sits inside a case in the colors of a silk scarf. Another way to wear fragrance with Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate. "I've always loved the duality of rhubarb. A double duality: visual and olfactory. The green color metamorphoses into red. Starting acidic and crisp, its smell becomes smooth and velvety." - Christine Nagel. With Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate, Christine Nagel created her first cologne for Hermès. Unprecedented and bold, more vegetal than citrus, it gives us the crisp, acidic freshness of rhubarb made velvet-smooth with white musks.

PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate Hand & Body Cleansing Gel, 10.1 oz.
Product_Description: The crisp tangy freshness of rhubarb with the velvety allure of white musks. "I've always loved the duality of rhubarb. A double duality: visual and olfactory. The green color metamorphoses into red. Starting acidic and crisp, its smell becomes smooth and velvety." - Christine Nagel. With Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate, Christine Nagel created her first cologne for Hermès. Unprecedented and bold, more vegetal than citrus, it gives you the crisp, acidic freshness of rhubarb made velvet-smooth with white musks. Bottle with removable pump.

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Scented Soap, 100 g
Product_Description: Un Jardin à Cythère Scented Soap cleanses and delicately perfumes the skin without drying. Shaped like a round pebble, the gentle soap nestles inside a box that evokes a Hellenic landscape, designed by artist Elias Kafouros. A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio.

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Moisturizing Body Lotion, 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin à Cythère expresses the gentle escapism of the Parfums-Jardins in the form of a moisturizing lotion. Another way to wear fragrance. Un Jardin à Cythère combines enveloping note of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Un Jardin sur le Toit Moisturizing Body Lotion, 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur le Toit expresses the gentle escapism of the Parfums-Jardins in the form of a moisturizing lotion. Another way to wear fragrance. Un Jardin sur le Toit unleashes into the Paris air the crisp scent of an apple tree mingled with juicy notes of a pear tree. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Men's Sauvage Eau de Parfum Spray, 1 oz.
Product_Description: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes mysterious and sensual facets. Spicy and juicy bergamot brightens a trail of earthy patchouli and enveloping vanilla absolute with subtle smoky accents. An unforgettable signature that lasts all day and through the night. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: A timeless and refillable cologne bottle, dense and dark like the inky night, shading from total opaqueness to smoky transparency. As an object of true luxury, each detail has been carefully studied: the initials CD are engraved on the bottom, and a bee, symbol of Dior men's fashion, is tucked inside the magnetized cap. The Sauvage Eau de Parfum bottle is now refillable thanks to its new eco-design. The Sauvage refill, not suitable for standalone use, is only compatible with the Sauvage Eau de Parfum 1.0-oz and 3.4-oz bottles labeled 'REFILLABLE' on the back. ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. The Eau de Parfum represents the magic hour of the twilight in the desert, when the wolves come out. As the coolness of the thick blue night meet the burning desert air, nature exudes profound scents.

Product_Description: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes mysterious and sensual facets. PName: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum Spray, 2.4 oz
Product_Description: Baccarat Rouge 540 is a universal, luminous and intense fragrance with woody ambery floral notes, a one-of-a-kind condensed olfactory signature with a long-lasting sillage. Inspired by the 250th anniversary of Baccarat, Francis Kurkdjian wanted to convey the poetic alchemy of crystal-making in this woody ambery floral fragrance, imagining a unique creation based on 3 'auras'. In the top notes, the breezy facets of jasmine flowers and the radiance of saffron evoke the aura of air. They are highlighted by an accord evoking ambergris and dry woody tones, embodying the mineral aura. Lastly, the aura of fire is suggested by the addictive sensuality of ethyl maltol, a note with gourmand facets. ABOUT THE BRAND: Created in the tradition of French luxury by renowned perfumer Francis Kurkdjian, Maison Francis Kurkdjian is known for elegant scents designed to be worn like a wardrobe of fragrance, each blend of notes capturing a different emotion and mood.

PName: Y Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.3-oz.

Infused with sophisticated and revitalizing notes of sage and geranium, this intense men's cologne embodies the passion of the Y man's unique strength and masculinity.

PName: BLEU DE CHANEL L'EXCLUSIF Parfum Spray, 3.4 oz
Product_Description: Designed like an Extrait de Parfum, this intense ambery-aromatic fragrance features a spellbinding trail, making it the most mysterious of all the BLEU DE CHANEL interpretations. Composed by CHANEL In-House Perfumer Creator Olivier Polge, BLEU DE CHANEL L'EXCLUSIF is a true concentration of precious materials. Sandalwood, highlighted in all its glory, adds dimension. The enigmatic character of the scent manifests through notes of cistus labdanum. Finally, woody ambery notes bring contrast and vibrancy, resulting in a majestic expression that leaves a memorable impression and stays on skin as if magnetically drawn to it. The radical lines of the bottle accentuate the unique shape, rendering the vessel a true statement piece.

PName: Miss Dior Parfum, 2.7 oz
Product_Description: Created by Francis Kurkdjian, this perfume opens with the juicy freshness of a sparkling mandarin. Starry jasmine, tailor-made for Dior, brings out succulent wild strawberry facets, and the ambery woody accord warms up a soothing depth to this intense yet incredibly smooth fruity floral parfum. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: The couturier's fragrance, Miss Dior Parfum, is adorned with a 'poignard' bow crafted in the workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers, known for its decade-long dedication to high fashion shows. A couture detail, woven from Lurex threads in a silvery hue that echoes the signature label. The emblematic Miss Dior houndstooth motif is engraved in the glass of this perfume in shimmering pink tones. ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Between strength and grace, boldness and elegance, Miss Dior embodies Dior's vision of youth and femininity. Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creation Director, reinterprets the original fragrance of the House, infusing it with today's youthful spirit.

Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Fiery Bergamot, Burning Wood, Intense Lava Stone FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Warm & Sensual ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Terre d'Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense reveals a deeper facet of the inner fire that animates the earth and man. Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Fiery Bergamot, Burning Wood, Intense Lava Stone FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Warm & Sensual ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Terre d'Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense reveals a deeper facet of the inner fire that animates the earth and man. PName: Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Cedrat, Juniper Berries, Timut Pepper ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée, the heat of ice. A new Eau de Parfum, both fresh and intense. Created by Christine Nagel, Hermès' perfumer, Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée combines the intensity of citron and the sharp freshness of juniper berry with the power of timut pepper. The striking sensation of an icy breeze is contrasted with the warmth of the woody, mineral notes characteristic of Terre d'Hermès. The refillable bottle combines glass with aluminum, two fully recyclable materials. As if cut from ice, the object is sleek and translucent. Frosted glass and brushed aluminum suggest the idea of frost covering the earth. The "H" on its base is a subtle reference to the ancestry of a now-cult object. "An icy cloak fertilizes the earth, exalting it with new and vibrant strength." - Christine Nagel, creative director of Hermès fragrances.

PName: Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver Eau de Parfum 6.7 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Green Bergamot, Sichuan Pepper, Vetiver FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Intense Woody ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Men are beckoned to another Terre. In 2018, Christine Nagel explored her vision of Terre d'Hermès and created Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver. A new luminous vibration, an unprecedented expression of the power of Terre. An intense, woody fragrance, Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver expresses the depth of vetiver combined with the liveliness of green bergamot and Sichuan pepper. The original cap takes on the warm brown hue of leather tanned in the sun. At its base, the bottle rests on an "H" in a deeper shade of orange. At the top, the light is intensified and reflected by the bottle's metal shoulders. When held in the hand, the Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver bottle unveils its many details, including the House's iconic Clou de Selle and the sliding cover used to release the spray. Created by designer Philippe Mouquet, it is inspired by a bottle in a travel vanity case that is conserved at the Emile Hermès museum.

PName: H24 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Clary Sage, Oakmoss, Sclarene ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, H24 Eau de Parfum reveals an intense strength as the signature of a new energy. A woody aromatic, H24 Eau de Parfum draws on the generous, botanical power of enveloping sage, dense high-tech moss and warm and vibrant sclarene. With its pure lines, the bottle designed by Philippe Mouquet is adorned with moss-green lacquer to echo the fragrance's olfactory notes. The intense gray box is decorated with a fine lime-green line that delimits and opens up the space. The aerodynamic, refillable bottle is crafted from recycled glass. Made entirely of untreated paper, the box is composed of recycled fibers. H24 is the key to a new space. H for Hermès, Homme and Hours. 24 to evoke a relationship with time and a link to the house's flagship address of 24 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré.

PName: H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top notes: Fresh Herbs - Middle notes: Pear Granita - Base notes: Physcool FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Fresh & Delicate ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: With this third instalment in the men's H24 line, Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel continues her exercise in the footsteps of a modern man on the move. H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum recreates the sensation of rediscovering urban nature after the rain. H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum combines the power of a bouquet of fresh herbs, the texture of a pear granita and the liveliness of the high-tech molecule Physcool.

PName: H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top notes: Fresh Herbs - Middle notes: Pear Granita - Base notes: Physcool FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Fresh & Delicate ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: With this third instalment in the men's H24 line, Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel continues her exercise in the footsteps of a modern man on the move. H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum recreates the sensation of rediscovering urban nature after the rain. H24 Herbes Vives Eau de Parfum combines the power of a bouquet of fresh herbs, the texture of a pear granita and the liveliness of the high-tech molecule Physcool.

PName: Voyage d'Hermès Pure Perfume Refillable Natural Spray 1.2 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES:- Top note: Juniper Berries - Middle note: Sandalwood - Base note: Amber FRAGRANCE FAMILY:Woods, FreshABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:"An invitation to discover, meet and share." -Jean-Claude EllenaA novel that feeds on the imagination, Voyage d'Hermès expresses the long-standing and unusual relationship between the house and travel. An interplay of paradoxes, complements and unexpected alliances upholds the premise of woody notes that are fresh yet musky, familiar yet surprising, hovering between impulsive and comforting, equally at ease with men as with women. Hermès designer Philippe Mouquet created a "nomad" object bottle for Voyage d'Hermès, conceived for voyages and symbolic of movement. The perfume, lively, reassuring and generous, between warmth and intensity.

PName: Voyage d'Hermès Pure Perfume Refillable Natural Spray 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES:- Top note: Juniper Berries - Middle note: Sandalwood - Base note: Amber FRAGRANCE FAMILY:Woods, FreshABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:"An invitation to discover, meet and share." -Jean-Claude EllenaA novel that feeds on the imagination, Voyage d'Hermès expresses the long-standing and unusual relationship between the house and travel. An interplay of paradoxes, complements and unexpected alliances upholds the premise of woody notes that are fresh yet musky, familiar yet surprising, hovering between impulsive and comforting, equally at ease with men as with women. Hermès designer Philippe Mouquet created a "nomad" object bottle for Voyage d'Hermès, conceived for voyages and symbolic of movement. The perfume, lively, reassuring and generous, between warmth and intensity.

PName: Concentré d'orange verte Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: Eau d'Orange Verte is the scent of the Little Prince in all of us. –Jean-Claude Ellena The founding cologne created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, this fragrance has asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, and stands out for its distinctive freshness. A novella perfume conceived as an explosion of citrus notes with orange playing the central role between zests and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. Eau d'orange verte reveals its complexity in a unique sillage comprising oak moss and patchouli. The eau de toilette (Concentré d'orange verte), freshness upheld by an explosion of orange, with a woody signature.

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: Eau d'Orange Verte is the scent of the Little Prince in all of us. –Jean-Claude Ellena The founding cologne created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, this fragrance has asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, and stands out for its distinctive freshness. A novella perfume conceived as an explosion of citrus notes with orange playing the central role between zests and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. Eau d'orange verte reveals its complexity in a unique sillage comprising oak moss and patchouli. The eau de cologne, the green freshness of an explosion of orange, with a woody signature.

PName: Eau de Basilic Pourpre Eau de Cologne
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES: Purple basil, Green bergamot, Geranium ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:
Hermès Fragrances welcomes a new light and airy, plant-driven creation. Conceived by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Eau de Basilic Pourpre is a tribute to purple basil, a sun-drenched aromatic that calls to mind conviviality and summer holidays with the family. Eau de Basilic Pourpre expresses the deep and generous aromatic freshness of purple basil, enlivened with light, crystalline green bergamot and geranium to lend character.
The iconic lantern bottle is dressed up in a luminous green that vibrates with color. The orange box is adorned with a contrasting green band that echoes the color of the bottle.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top note: lemon - Middle note: black tea - Base note: guaiac wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau de Citron Noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness which rises to the challenge of tenacity: It is the midday-to-midnight cologne. The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime.

PName: Barénia Scented Hair Mist 1 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Butterfly Lily, Miracle Berry, Oak, Patchouli FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Warm & Sensual ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Barénia is reinvented as a perfumed hair mist with a light, airy texture that delicately fragrances and enhances the hair. The scent blends exhilarating butterfly lily with delicate miracle berry and envelops them in oakwood and an intense patchouli. The mist suits all hair types, leaving hair shinier and silkier without weighing it down or drying it out. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: The glass bottle was created by Philippe Mouquet and inspired by the Collier de Chien bracelet. It has a frosted look and the size is an ideal travel format. A great way to prolong the scent of Barénia throughout the day. HOW TO USE IT: - Spray onto the hair from around 16", using a circular motion. Alternatively, spray onto a hairbrush. - For the full sensory experience and to intensify the trail, scent the pulse points of the body with Barénia Eau de Parfum and apply Barénia Perfumed Body Cream (both sold separately).

PName: Barénia Perfumed Body Cream 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top notes: Miracle Berry - Middle notes: Butterfly Lily - Base notes: Oak, Patchouli FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Warm Floral ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Barénia is a skin perfume, bringing together strength and softness. It expresses the instinctive, captivating facets of a woman. An unstoppable woman. The living embodiment of freedom. Barénia blends exhilarating butterfly lily with the delicacy of the miracle berry and envelops them in oakwood and an intense patchouli. Derived from the Eau de Parfum, Barénia Perfumed Body Cream has a melting, enveloping texture that soothes and hydrates the skin while leaving it delicately fragranced.

PName: Barénia Perfumed Body Soap 4.4 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top notes: Miracle Berry - Middle notes: Butterfly Lily - Base notes: Oak, Patchouli FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Warm Floral ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Barénia is a skin perfume, bringing together strength and softness. It expresses the instinctive, captivating facets of a woman. An unstoppable woman. The living embodiment of freedom. Barénia blends exhilarating butterfly lily with the delicacy of the miracle berry and envelops them in oakwood and an intense patchouli. Derived from the Eau de Parfum, Barénia Perfumed Body Soap releases a generous lather that gently cleanses the skin while leaving it delicately fragranced. The oval bar is decorated with the iconic Hermès "H" and is easy to grip.

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Ginger, tuberose, sandalwood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: "It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'Hermès. Free, bold, connected, mischievous and irreverent, they turn expectation on its head, swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo." --Christine Nagel It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. Each silk ribbon is unique. The scent of the HERMÈS girls, a daring fragrance woven with striking ginger and sensual tuberose. A floral, spicy and oriental eau de parfum.

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Ginger, tuberose, sandalwood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: "It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'Hermès. Free, bold, connected, mischievous and irreverent, they turn expectation on its head, swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo." --Christine Nagel It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. Each silk ribbon is unique. The scent of the HERMÈS girls, a daring fragrance woven with striking ginger and sensual tuberose. A floral, spicy and oriental eau de parfum.

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Eau Poivrée
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Pink peppercorn, rose, patchouli ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The peppery spirit of the Hermès girls. A daring fragrance colored with vibrant pink peppercorn, tender rose and elegant patchouli. Spicy, floral, woody. Twilly Eau Poivrée travels from the skin to the mind, colorful and incisive. Three new materials make up its sensuality: the vibrant and abundant heat of pink peppercorn, the teenage freshness of tender rose and the captivating enchantment of patchouli. Their essences intertwine, weaving the invisible web that connects the Hermès girls to each other. "Hermès girls swim happily against the tide, set their own tempo, invent a whole new rhythm. For them, I have imagined a new facet in tribute to their youthful spirit." --Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumer

PName: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES: - Top note: Ginger Blossom - Middle note: Lychee - Base note: Musk ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:
Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel for the Hermès girls, Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum presents another facet of Twilly. It is a tribute to their free spirit--a blend of daring and lightheartedness--and their multifaceted nature. A floral and fruity eau de parfum, crafted with gentle ginger blossom, mellow lychee and enveloping musk notes. Designed by Florence Manlik, the iconic lantern-shaped bottle is adorned with an inverted lychee-red color gradation and a bright white cap. A unique, hand-tied silk ribbon adds a playful finishing touch. The Twilly d'Hermès family of perfumes evokes the Hermès silk métier on two fronts: it calls to mind the house's silk twill scarf as well as the Twilly, a small, joyful, colorful silk ribbon that can be worn in countless ways.

PName: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES: - Top note: Ginger Blossom - Middle note: Lychee - Base note: Musk ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:
Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel for the Hermès girls, Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum presents another facet of Twilly. It is a tribute to their free spirit--a blend of daring and lightheartedness--and their multifaceted nature. A floral and fruity eau de parfum, crafted with gentle ginger blossom, mellow lychee and enveloping musk notes. Designed by Florence Manlik, the iconic lantern-shaped bottle is adorned with an inverted lychee-red color gradation and a bright white cap. A unique, hand-tied silk ribbon adds a playful finishing touch. The Twilly d'Hermès family of perfumes evokes the Hermès silk métier on two fronts: it calls to mind the house's silk twill scarf as well as the Twilly, a small, joyful, colorful silk ribbon that can be worn in countless ways.

PName: Eau des Merveilles Bleue Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Patchouli, woody notes, sea notes ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles Bleue leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, the fragrance successfully rises to the challenge of sparkling femininity with not a flower in sight.

PName: Eau des Merveilles L'Ambre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: The perfume of enchantment. An amber wood for women, surprising and magical. –Jean-Claude Ellena From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multi-faceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, this fragrance was created in 2004 by Ralph Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. It successfully takes on the challenge of being a sparkling women's perfume with not a flower in sight. The eau de parfum (Ambre des Merveilles), warm and sensual.

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Florals, woody notes ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Un Jardin sur la Lagune, a dream garden, soothing and vibrant. A floral and woody Eau de Toilette. A half-open door, a dream escapes Un Jardin sur la Lagune is a secret garden where nature comes into its own again. Woody scents blend with floral notes. The wind carries afar salty notes. "I dreamed of this garden; I created a perfume woven from its memories, the cycle of trees and flowers, nature still enduring within it." --Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumer

PName: Un Jardin sur le Toit Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: KEY NOTES:- Top note: Apple - Middle note: Pear - Base note: Magnolia FRAGRANCE FAMILY:Citrus/FruityABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:"A garden for fun, a garden that answers to no one, sprinkled with light." --Jean-Claude EllenaUn Jardin sur le Toit is a lively, edgy novella. This perfume describes a secret garden, nestled in the heart of the city in Paris. A hanging garden, perched on the roof of the house of Hermès, at 24 faubourg Saint-Honoré. An apple tree, a pear tree, a magnolia in the Paris air, along with a few self-seeded imposters, all making up this perfume of light and pleasure, enticing and full of laughter.

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Scented Hair Mist 1 oz.
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Un Jardin à Cythère is reinvented as a perfumed hair mist, offering a multi-sensory tour of the Peloponnese. The light, airy texture delicately perfumes and enhances the hair. The formula is suitable for all hair types, with active ingredients that leave hair visibly shinier, softer and silkier without adding weight or drying it out. KEY NOTES: Grasses, Olive Wood, Fresh Pistachio FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Woody Citrus ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Un Jardin à Cythère is a woody citrus fragrance that combines an enveloping character reminiscent of grasslands with the power of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of horse-drawn carriage lanterns. The glass features a lively frosted effect in yellow hues that evoke brilliant sunlight. It is an ideal travel format and a great way to prolong the scent of Un Jardin à Cythère throughout the day. HOW TO USE IT: - Spray onto the hair from around 15", using a circular motion. Alternatively, spray onto a hairbrush. - For a more bespoke trail, nourish the lengths and ends of the hair with Un Jardin à Cythère Hair & Body Dry Oil (sold separately) before spraying on the hair mist. - For the full sensory experience, scent a few pulse points with Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette (sold separately).

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Grasses, Olive Wood, Fresh Pistachio ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Created by Hermès' perfumer Christine Nagel, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette is a surprising garden that is neither green nor floral, but blond. It is the expression of an olfactory quest through Greece that leads to Kythira, an unspoiled island that has inspired many artists. A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of the horse-drawn carriage lanterns of yesteryear. The luminous graduated yellow glass echoes the sunny fragrance. On the box, artist Elias Kafouros sketches a colorful landscape of his homeland: golden grasses, green olive trees, fresh pink pistachios and, in the background, the blue of the sea. The Parfums Jardins collection brings together the soul of a place, the inspiration of the perfumer and the theme chosen by Hermès each year to illuminate its creation. An olfactory stroll to share for every moment, to indulge every desire for freshness, reverie or escape.

PName: Ambre Narguilé Eau de Toilette 3.3 oz.
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES: Amber, honey, spices ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:
Ambre Narguilé is a blend of honey of amber with a swirl of the Orient. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "Amber, the Western expression of Eastern fragrances, has a warm, sensual, enveloping, almost carnal smell. I wanted to imbue this idea of amber with the memory of the East I love by recreating the ambiance of those lively places where tobacco--blended with the smells of fruit, honey and spices--is smoked in narguilés, or water pipes, and where swirls of smoke diffuse a sweet sense of intoxication."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Cuir d'Ange Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Leather, musk ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Cuir d'Ange offers the softness of the leather, like a promise hovering over the skin. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "For a long time I'd wanted to reveal the importance I attach to literature, and how it corresponds to perfume. More significantly, I wanted to evoke my discovery of the work of Jean Giono. Two words from a passage in Jean le Bleu came back to me: 'cuir d'ange' - angel leather. Using the smells that are my words, I wanted to write a poem to rekindle the love duet between leather and the skin. Its softness and lightness, its tension and caress. Heliotropes and hawthorn, leather and musk."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Épice Marine Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Spices, rum, smoked wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Épice Marine offers aromas of spices cut through with the invigorating tang of the sea. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "This fragrance is the result of an encounter between a man who works by his sense of taste and one who works with his nose. I wanted it to be an invitation to discover spices, rum, waxed floors and smoked wood. A form of escape inspired by the invigorating, stimulating tang of the Brittany coast. A Hermessence with a buccaneering spirit."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Myrrhe Églantine Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Myrrh, rosehip ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: An intimate meeting of precious myrrh and wild rosehip. Delicate, tangy. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "This legendary material evokes the world of desert caravans and the former perfume routes. A myrrh, then more precious than gold, reinvented and reworked around rosehip, a wild, fresh and tangy rose that never surrenders."--Christine Nagel

PName: Poivre Samarcande Eau de Toilette
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES:
Poivre Samarcande pepper, oak ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The fiery pepper of Poivre Samarcande is softened with a woody sweetness. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "A massive, beautiful oak tree once grew in front of my house, blocking our view of the Mediterranean. Eventually, it grew ill and was felled. The peppery, musky, slightly smoky scent of the cut wood etched itself on my memory. The soul of the old oak, mixed with pepper, lives on in this fragrance. The name Samarcande is an homage to the city through which spice caravans once passed on their way from East to West."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Rose Ikebana Eau de Toilette 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Rose petals, rhubarb ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Rose Ikebana offers a surprising contrast between rose petals and crisp rhubarb. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "Beautiful and minimalist, the traditional Japanese art of ikebana--arranging bouquets of cut flowers and leaves using very few elements--ideally corresponded to a form of expression I could transpose into a perfume. The smell of a rose early in the morning, damp, sprinkled with dew, delicate and light."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Santal Massoïa Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Sandalwood, massoïa ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Santal Massoïa is a compelling encounter between two milkwoods; sandalwood and massoïa. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "There are linear, vertical woods like cedar, and others that are horizontal, round, supple and velvet-smooth, such as sandalwood and massoïa. With this understanding in mind, I composed this enigmatic, inviting yet distant perfume with its unusual, pungent hints of resin and dried fruit, and familiar smells of dulce de leche and flowers."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Vétiver Tonka Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Vetiver, tonka bean, hazelnut ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The strength of vetiver in Vétiver Tonka is softened by hazelnut. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "The unrefined, rough, earthy scent of vetiver appealed to me. I felt a need to appropriate and reinvent it. I wanted a tender, enveloping, warm vetiver. What it needed was tonka bean! With its caramel, praline and blonde tobacco notes, tonka bean draped vetiver in softness and gave its woody notes a mellow roundness."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Vétiver Tonka Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Vetiver, tonka bean, hazelnut ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The strength of vetiver in Vétiver Tonka is softened by hazelnut. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "The unrefined, rough, earthy scent of vetiver appealed to me. I felt a need to appropriate and reinvent it. I wanted a tender, enveloping, warm vetiver. What it needed was tonka bean! With its caramel, praline and blonde tobacco notes, tonka bean draped vetiver in softness and gave its woody notes a mellow roundness."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Cardamusc Essence de Parfum 0.84 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Musc, Cardamom ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. Cardamusc Essence de Parfum is a pure perfume oil whose texture exalts the spicy sensuality of cardamom, revealing it gradually in contact with reassuring musks. An assertive duo, unexpected and captivating, that dances on the skin. Christine Nagel, creative director of Hermès Parfums, creates a new ritual. Inspired by unguent, perfume's earliest form of expression, essence offers a concentration pushed to the extreme, and a second-skin texture. HOW TO USE IT: Essence de Parfum can be worn alone or under an Hermessence, to intensify its sillage and personalize its signature. Essence de Parfum is applied to the pulse points with a fingertip.

PName: Rose Hermès Silky Blush Powder
Product_Description:
WHAT IT IS: Elevate your routine with the Rose Hermès collection, featuring three shades of blush with an iridescent finish. These new Silky Blush creations add a subtle touch of pink, enhanced by a shimmering veil of light. WHAT IT DOES:
Silky Blush features an ultra-light, pigmented texture that is both airy and compact. It is enriched with subtle mother-of-pearl micro-particles for a delicately iridescent finish. With its round case and off-center mirror, this white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is truly remarkable for its lightness. The compact powder is patterned with fine lines evoking silk twill. The Silky Blush case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately. SHADES:
- Rose Dore: A radiant and elegant coral pink elevated by golden reflections. - Rose Ambre: A silky, delicate beige pink with a pearly shell-like shimmer. - Rose Cuivre: A powerful crimson pink elevated by dazzling hints of gold.

Product_Description: Not Available

Product_Description: Not Available

PName: Plein Air Radiant Matte Powder & Refill
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Beauty embraces the open air with radiant matte powder, a soft, silky finishing powder that mattifies the complexion with a translucent glow. WHAT IT DOES: The shade is universal. The round case with off-center mirror is a disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy. A lightweight object, it was created for use on the go. Slipped into its orange box, it is a pure Hermès object. KEY INGREDIENTS: The formula contains emollients for long-lasting softness and comfort. HOW TO USE IT: - The radiant matte powder is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately. - Apply the powder to bare skin to mattify the skin or after the complexion balm to absorb shine and set makeup. It can be used for touch-ups during the day, all over the face or where required on the forehead, nose or chin. ABOUT THE BRAND: The Hermès Plein Air collection is the Hermès Beauty vision applied to the complexion. It is a breath of fresh air for the skin. Composed of a natural enhancing complexion balm, two finishing powders, a powder brush and blotting papers, the collection reveals the freshness and natural beauty of the complexion.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Enamel Base Coat
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: The enamel base coat is the first step of the Les Mains Hermès ritual. WHAT IT DOES: Its smooth texture, in translucent white, unifies and protects the nails and extends the longevity of the polish. Perfected by this invisible satin softness, the nails are prepared for the application of color. A formula containing 69% natural ingredients, it is enriched with the resin tears of Pistacia lentiscus L. An object designed by Pierre Hardy that is both poetic and functional, it is protected from the light inside its white lacquered bottle and slipped into its little orange box! HOW TO USE IT: Apply the enamel base coat to your nails to prepare them for the color. Place the brush at the base of the nail and sweep it upward to the tip. Repeat on each side of the nail if necessary to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. ABOUT THE BRAND: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with color, echoing Hermès' handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand-care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a top coat and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Top Coat
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: The top coat is the final touch of the Les Mains Hermès color ritual. WHAT IT DOES: Its transparent "gel lacquer" texture produces a long-lasting high-gloss finish. The color is encased in a protective shell for durability. Nails do not catch; instead they shine, the mirror polish optimizing light without encumbering the surface, giving a curved effect of depth. Its formula is made in France. The object, designed by Pierre Hardy, is both poetic and functional. It is protected from the light inside its black lacquered bottle and slipped into its little orange box! HOW TO USE IT: To give the color maximum shine and hold, apply a layer of top coat. The gesture is identical to that of the enamel base. Allow to dry for about fifteen minutes. For a natural look, the top coat can be applied directly over the enamel base. ABOUT THE BRAND: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with color, echoing Hermès' handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand-care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a top coat and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Nail polish available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. WHAT IT DOES: The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. Its formula, made in France, is composed of at least 71% ingredients of natural origin. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. HOW TO USE IT: To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the center of the lunula, then sweep it upward to the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the color more intense. ABOUT THE BRAND: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with color, echoing Hermès' handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand-care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a top coat and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care.

Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Nail polish available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. WHAT IT DOES: The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. PName: Trait d'Hermès Revitalizing Care Mascara
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A mascara that intensifies and emphasizes the gaze with lash-to-lash volume. Its innovative wand ensures easy application and precise lash definition. WHAT IT DOES: Composed of 97% natural ingredients, the mascara's gentle formula is suitable for all eyes, including sensitive. It contains millet seed extract, known for its protective and lengthening properties, nourishing shea butter and moringa butter. As a result, the lashes appear denser and thicker. The light texture of the revitalizing care mascara, designed for lash to lash volume, glides seamlessly along each lash from root to tip, coating them individually for precise application. Its weightless formula has a long-lasting result that does not flake or transfer to the eyelid. This elegant and slim object features an ultra-fine technical wand composed of plant fibers derived from the castor bean. Its shape forms a subtle H, creating reservoirs in the sides that deposit just the right amount of product onto the lashes. True objects d'art designed by Pierre Hardy, each mascara is packaged in an orange box, a House signature. SHADES: - Noir Fusain: A mark of mystery and a dark spark underscoring an enigmatic twinkle in the eye. - Brun Bistre: A wooded path scattered with bronzed pigments, a sepia watercolor tinted with warm, coppery tones. - Rouge H: The House's heritage color, an unfathomable shade nurtured by cherry brown and a Venetian-tinged burgundy, a fiery line that embodies its own history. - Bleu Encre: A flowing line, diffuse writings extending out like a pair of wings, an elusive firmament as deep as the skies. - Vert Titien: Suffused with a vivid memory and tinged with botanical brightness, a spiritual allegory, a legendary sketch that captures the natural light. - Violet Indigo: A hazy azure pigment with cerulean intensity, a patch of sky that defines the eyes like a chiaroscuro landscape.

PName: Ombres d'Hermès Eye Shadow Quartet
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Six color palettes that offer various avenues of expression for the eyes, creating a natural, intense or sophisticated look. WHAT IT DOES: Each quartet is composed of a graduated trio of powders complemented by a fourth, bold and unexpected shade. All can be used individually or combined to create a subtle, seamless blend of shadows. Designed by Pierre Hardy, this quartet of eyeshadows plays with geometric shapes and echoes the Bauhaus movement. Its round case is protected by a canvas drawstring pouch and includes an applicator brush in lacquered wood. The object is presented in an orange box. Imagined by Gregoris Pyrpylis, creative director of Hermès Beauty, each palette is inspired by nature and bears a name evocative of its color universe. The eyeshadow quartets are composed of 98% natural ingredients. The powder contains silky emollients and oils, ensuring effortless application and a long-lasting, natural finish. The eyeshadows' soft and light texture can be easily blended using a finger or brush, allowing you to achieve your desired level of intensity. In each palette, the various finishes draw inspiration from the silk metier. The matte finish evokes the essence of silk chiffon, the satin finish mirrors the allure of silk twill, and the shimmering finish is reminiscent of silk lame. The eye shadow case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately in quartets. SHADES: - Ombres Pétales: A graceful palette with a poetic floral heritage accentuated by the sultry innocence of shades of pink and plum. - Ombres Végétales: Influenced by green foliage adorned with an iridescent shimmer, evoking an illuminated garden abundant with nature. - Ombres Fauves: Amber undertones that evoke the sensation of a lustrous silk, accentuated with a bright ephemeral orange. - Ombres Marines: A deep blue imbued with rich and enigmatic shades, resembling glimpses of the ocean's depths. - Ombres Fumées: Stormy shades tinged with a cool light. A dark presence with celestial accents. - Ombres Mordorées: A golden horizon illuminated with delicate bronze accents that echo the radiant embers of autumn's warmth.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eyeliner
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A precision eyeliner that highlights the gaze in a single stroke. It is easy to apply, creating a long-wear line on the eyelid. WHAT IT DOES: - The product is formulated with intense black pigments, while its texture allows the user to draw a clean line with an even, satin finish. - Waterproof and quick-drying, the eyeliner creates a long-wear makeup look that will not smudge or run. - Designed by Pierre Hardy, the refillable eyeliner is an object created to last. It contains an Encre Noir cartridge and is reminiscent of a fountain pen. The fibers of the tapered applicator tip remain soft over time and are shaped to ensure a precise and adjustable line. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic "H." SHADES: Encre Noire is a single shade of deep black that creates an intense line. HOW TO USE IT: The Trait d'Hermès Eyeliner offers makeup looks from the most natural to the most sophisticated. For a fine, precise line, use the tip of the applicator and draw a line with a light touch. For a thick, graphic line, use the full length of the applicator and draw a line with a firm touch.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. WHAT IT DOES: - The twenty-four emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. - Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. - Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes. - Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic "H." HOW TO USE IT: The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze. Using the pencil's smudger or the Precision Blending Eye Brush (sold separately), you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline.

PName: Hermèsistible Infused Lip Care Oil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS:The Hermèsistible lip collection awakens the senses with a synaesthesia of colors and scents. Made from 97% natural ingredients, this oil combines a nourishing skincare action with a fresh makeup result. Hydrated and smoothed, the lips are adorned with a light touch of color, radiant shine and an addictive scent.WHAT IT DOES:Enriched with 93% active care ingredients, the care oil is extremely sensory, enveloping and comfortable. Its plant oils form a protective and nourishing film on the lips, while the complex of emollient raw materials maintains and boosts hydration. Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel created a collection of six unique scents, corresponding to each color. The joyful and colorful object is made from glass and enhanced with a playful jumble of letters forming the name of the collection. On the cap, the Hermès ex-libris is engraved tone on tone.HOW TO USE IT:The flocked, delicate and precise shape of the applicator enables a simple and intuitive action.

PName: Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A lip enhancer that evokes fresh dew on the lips. WHAT IT DOES: Its weightless and translucent halo reveals the lips' natural beauty. With its fine and delicate waxy finish, the rosy lip enhancer melts over the lip, leaving a hint of transparent pink and a matt luminosity. Lips are delicately smoothed with a soft-focus effect. The rosy lip enhancer object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic yet functional and durable. Made from lacquered, polished and brushed metal, it is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box! This object is refillable. KEY INGREDIENTS: Sesame seed and raspberry seed oils help soften and nourish.

PName: Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description:
WHAT IT IS: A rosy lip enhancer that elevates the lips with a translucent touch of pink, leaving either a matte or glossy finish. Lips are gently nourished, smoothed and plumped. WHAT IT DOES:
Inspired by the softness of Milo leather, the fine, imperceptible texture glides across the lips leaving a light veil of color, for a natural look. At the heart of the formula is the combination of white mulberry extract with sesame-seed and raspberry-seed oils, infusing the lips with suppleness and comfort. Indulge your lips in lasting nourishment and hydration. Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, the fragrance exudes soft, feminine notes of arnica, sandalwood and candied angelica flowers. Designed by Pierre Hardy, this object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal is both poetic and functional. It is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box. The Rose Hermès object is refillable. Created to last, it is crafted from noble materials. The only ephemeral element is the bullet. Refills are sold separately. SHADE: Rose Confetti, a playful pink with hints of blue, illuminating your lips with its radiant and fresh confetti-like color.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Lip Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. WHAT IT DOES: Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. The formula delivers intense, long-wear color. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic H. SHADES: The 16 emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are designed to match all the shades in the Rouge Hermès collection perfectly. HOW TO USE IT: The color can be applied in a single stroke, to delineate, define and enhance the contours of the lips, or to color them. The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible, or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Lip Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. PName: Rouge Hermès Silky Lipstick Shine & Refill
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Silky Lipstick Shine is inspired by the luster of Hermès silk. Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds and subtle pinks. WHAT IT DOES: The melting texture of Silky Lipstick Shine glides onto the lips, leaving a light and comfortable veil of translucent color. Its light to medium coverage offers buildable intensity, for looks ranging from a soft, sheer wash of color to a more intense result. The hybrid makeup and lip-care formula provides comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with oils and butters, it contains active ingredients that care for the lips: hydrating and plumping raspberry leaf extract, smoothing and softening sesame seed extract, nourishing and protecting Abyssinian oil, white mulberry. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood and angelica. HOW TO USE IT: - For flawlessly defined or subtly ombré lips, use the Trait d'Hermès lip pencil (sold separately) before applying Silky Lipstick Shine. - The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive and generous application. Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats.

PName: Rouge Hermès Poppy Lip Shine
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A surprising lip shine that elegantly enhances and amplifies the natural radiance of the lips. A translucent, slightly orange-toned formula enriched with mother-of-pearl micro-particles. A fine, rich and comfortable texture. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! HOW TO USE IT: Applied generously, it acts as a natural enhancer. Lips are lightly tinted with a subtle gloss. This is the Poppy touch.

PName: Rouge Hermès Lip Care Balm
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A complete treatment for the lips with moisturizing and smoothing properties. A rich balm with a fine, soft texture that gently moisturizes. Its natural, non-greasy finish is perfect for both men and women. A formula with a high concentration of beeswax and candelilla wax for well-hydrated, supple and comfortable lips. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! HOW TO USE IT: The stick is domed for easy, liberal and generous application, either as a base to smooth and soften the lips before adding color or as a treatment to keep the lips continuously hydrated.

PName: Rouge Hermès Satin Lipstick & Refill
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A luminous satin-finish lipstick. The refill is compatible with all Rouge Hermès objects. WHAT IT DOES: Its texture, as fine as it is rich, delivers vibrant, long-lasting color. It leaves the lips supple and conditioned. The rounded tip of the lipstick invites full and generous application. HOW TO USE IT: How to refill your Rouge Hermès Lipstick: 1. Open your lipstick*. 2. Remove the black tube. 3. Take the refill out of its packaging and remove the black cap. 4. Insert the new refill* into the empty lipstick base until it clicks into place. 5. Your new lipstick is now ready for use! *The lipstick must be ordered separately.

PName: Rouge Hermès & Rose Hermès Gift Set
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Discover this duo of Hermès beauty objects, each slipped into a colored canvas pouch. A treat for yourself or for someone else, presented ready to gift in an orange box. SET INCLUDES: - Rouge Hermès Lip Balm - Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer, Rose Confetti WHAT IT DOES: - Rouge Hermès Lip Balm: A complete lip care product with moisturizing and smoothing properties. A rich balm with a fine, soft, melting texture. Its natural, non-greasy finish is perfect for both men and women. - Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer: Depositing a light, translucent halo, the rosy lip enhancer reveals the natural beauty of the lips. Its fine, soft, waxy texture melts onto the lips, enhancing them with a transparent touch of pink and a brilliant shine. Rose Confetti is a playful pink with hints of blue, whose radiance and freshness color the lips with the lightness of confetti.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Le Courbe-Cils Eyelash Curler
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Suitable for all shapes of eyelids, Le Courbe-Cils Ryelash Curler enhances and sets the natural curl of the lashes, giving the eyes an elevated appearance. Gently press and hold at the base of the lashes to achieve a natural, wide-eyed look. WHAT IT DOES: This portable and durable object in matte black metal is engraved with the tone-on-tone Hermès signature on the golden band. Protected by a canvas pouch and an orange box, Le Courbe-Cils comes with three replaceable pads: white, blue and orange.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. WHAT IT DOES: - The twenty-four emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. - Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. - Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes. - Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic "H." HOW TO USE IT: The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze. Using the pencil's smudger or the Precision Blending Eye Brush (sold separately), you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result.
