PName: Eau de Mandarine Ambrée Eau de Cologne Natural Spray
Product_Description: I can think of no smell more joyful than mandarin, more mellow than amber. –Jean-Claude Ellena Reinventing its classic connections with citrus fruits and freshness, Eau de mandarine ambrée brings a vitality to Cologne that is as mischievous as it is gentle. Intrinsically cheerful mandarin is combined with sparkling passion fruit which is itself revealed by the mellowness of amber. A novella that expresses a lively, shimmering, smooth paradise, captured in a color.

PName: Concentré de pamplemousse rose Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: A bitter-sweet cologne: freedom in tradition. –Jean-Claude Ellena With its classic approach favoring the liveliness and freshness of citrus fruits, Eau de pamplemousse rose is distinctive for the modern way it is written. The citrus theme of this novella, incarnated by grapefruit, takes on a new brilliance when it comes into contact with roses. Eau de toilette (Concentré de Pamplemousse Rose); the sustained freshness of grapefruit , nuanced with rose petals, endorsed with full-bodied vetiver.

PName: Eau de Néroli Doré Eau de Cologne Spray 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: Whereas there's usually very little neroli in perfumes, I used an abundance of it, out of love, out of the ordinary. –Jean-Claude Ellena With Eau de néroli doré, his fifth creation in the Colognes family, Jean-Claude Ellena has given full voice to neroli, the essence extracted from orange blossom and given its name in homage to Princess Nerola who perfumed her gloves with it. And he used saffron to heighten its lively, enveloping freshness.

PName: Twilly d'HERMÈS Body Shower Cream 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'HERMÈS. Free, bold, connected, mischievous and irreverent, they turn expectation on its head, swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo. --Christine Nagel It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'HERMÈS. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. Each silk ribbon is unique. A rich and velvety foaming cream. Skin is delicately perfumed, soft and supple. Another way to wear fragrance with Twilly d'HERMÈS.

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Moisturizing Body Lotion 6.76 oz.
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A fluid formula that is quickly absorbed, leaving the skin moisturized, soft, supple and delicately perfumed. Warm and sensual.

PName: Eau d'orange verte Hand and Body Cleansing Gel 10.1 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top note: Orange - Middle notes: Mandarin, Mint, Blackcurrant - Base notes: Oak Moss, Patchouli FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: "Eau d'Orange Verte is the scent of the Little Prince in all of us." --Jean-Claude Ellena An unctuous gel delicately scented that transforms into a fine foam. The skin is soft and supple and easy to rinse. The founding cologne created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, this fragrance has asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, and stands out for its distinctive freshness. A novella perfume conceived as an explosion of citrus notes with orange playing the central role between zests and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. Eau d'orange verte reveals its complexity in a unique sillage comprising oak moss and patchouli.

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Moisturizing Body Lotion 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Orange, Mint, Moss FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Citrus ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau d'Orange Verte combines vibrant orange with fresh mint and woody notes of moss.Hermès expresses the joyful and generous freshness of the Colognes in the form of a moisturizing body lotion. Another way to wear fragrance. The fluid is quickly absorbed for a sensation of comfort. The skin is soft, supple and delicately fragranced. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with a deep green, emblematic of Eau d'Orange Verte, and two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Hair & Body Shower Gel 6.7 oz.
Product_Description: A hair and body formula that transforms into a pleasant, generous lather; easy to rinse. Delicately perfumed, the skin is soft and the hair shiny. Another way to wear fragrance with Eau de Citron Noir.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Hand & Body Cleansing Gel 10.1 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Black Lemon, Black Tea, Guaia FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Spicy Dry ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau de Citron Noir combines the sharp and zesty freshness of lemon with the depth of black tea and the smoky notes of guaiac wood. Hermès expresses the joyful and generous freshness of the Colognes in the form of a hand and body cleansing gel. Another way to wear fragrance. The rich gel forms a pleasant, easy-rinse lather. The skin is soft and delicately fragranced. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with a radical deep blue, emblematic of Eau de Citron Noir, and two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Moisturizing Body Lotion 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Black Lemon, Black Tea, Guaia FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Spicy Dry ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau de Citron Noir combines the sharp and zesty freshness of lemon with the depth of black tea and the smoky notes of guaiac wood. Hermès expresses the joyful and generous freshness of the Colognes in the form of a moisturizing body lotion. Another way to wear fragrance. The fluid is quickly absorbed for a sensation of comfort. The skin is soft, supple and delicately fragranced. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with a radical deep blue, emblematic of Eau de Citron Noir, and two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate Hand & Body Cleansing Gel 10.1 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Rhubarb, Lantana, Musk FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Fresh Delicate ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate expresses the freshness of crisp rhubarb and tangy lantana blended with elegant notes of musk.<br Hermès expresses the joyful and generous freshness of the Colognes in the form of a hand and body cleansing gel. Another way to wear fragrance. The rich gel forms a pleasant, easy-rinse lather. The skin is soft and delicately fragranced. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with scarlet, emblematic of Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate, and two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate Moisturizing Body Lotion 6.5 oz.

The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with scarlet, emblematic of Eau de Rhubarbe Écarlate, and two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Perfumed Soap 3.5 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Grasses, Olive Wood, Fresh Pistachio ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The Un Jardin à Cythère scented soap cleanses and delicately perfumes the skin without drying. Shaped like a round pebble, this gentle soap nestles inside a box that evokes a Hellenic landscape designed by artist Elias Kafouros. A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. The Parfums-Jardins collection brings together the soul of a place, the inspiration of the perfumer and the theme chosen by Hermès each year to illuminate its creation. An olfactory stroll to share for every moment, to indulge every desire for freshness, reverie or escape.

PName: The Parfums Jardin Collection Soap Set
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: The Parfums-Jardins Collection Soap Set consists of three fragrant soaps: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li, Un Jardin sur le Nil and Un Jardin à Cythère. Each scented, pebble-shaped soap is slipped inside a paper box illustrated by an artist. A gift for yourself or for a loved one, presented in the house's iconic orange box. SET INCLUDES: Scented Soap 3 x 3.5 oz. ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The Parfums-Jardins Collection brings together the soul of a place, the perfumer's inspiration and the annual theme selected by Hermès. An aromatic journey for every moment, satisfying every desire for freshness, reverie or escape. Le Jardin de Monsieur Li is a floral and botanical fragrance that juxtaposes the delicate radiance of sambac jasmine, the tanginess of kumquat and the fiery notes of bergamot. Un Jardin sur le Nil is a fruity, green and woody fragrance that combines the scents of green mango, lotus blossom and aromatic rush with incense and sycamore wood. Un Jardin à Cythère is a citrus and woody fragrance that combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio.

PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Moisturizing Body Lotion 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Green Mango, Lotus, Sycamore FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Fresh Delicate ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Green and woody, Un Jardin sur le Nil combines tangy green mango with delicate lotus and elegant sycamore. PName: Sauvage Eau de Parfum
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES:
Calabrian Bergamot, Vanilla Absolute, Patchouli FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Earthy & Woody
ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes mysterious and sensual facets. Spicy and juicy bergamot brightens a trail of earthy patchouli and enveloping vanilla absolute with subtle smoky accents. An unforgettable signature that lasts all day and through the night. Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. The Eau de Parfum represents the magic hour of the twilight in the desert, when the wolves come out. As the coolness of the thick blue night meet the burning desert air, nature exudes profound scents. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: A timeless and refillable cologne bottle, dense and dark like the inky night, shading from total opaqueness to smoky transparency. As an object of true luxury, each detail has been carefully studied: the initials CD are engraved on the bottom, and a bee, symbol of Dior men's fashion, is tucked inside the magnetized cap. HOW TO USE IT: 1. Cleanse with Sauvage Shower Gel. 2. Hydrate your skin with Sauvage Moisturizer for Face and Beard. 3. Complete the Sauvage ritual by applying Sauvage Eau de Toilette on pulse points: wrists and neck.

PName: BLEU DE CHANEL Eau de Parfum Spray
Product_Description: A woody, aromatic fragrance for the man who defies convention. The profoundly sensual Eau de Parfum, infused with crisp citrus notes, offers an intense concentration of the fresh, clean and vibrant fragrance. Unexpected and undeniably bold.

Product_Description: A woody, aromatic fragrance for the man who defies convention. The profoundly sensual Eau de Parfum, infused with crisp citrus notes, offers an intense concentration of the fresh, clean and vibrant fragrance. Unexpected and undeniably bold.

PName: Donna Born in Roma
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top notes: blackcurrant accord, bergamot essence - Middle notes: jasmine grandiflorum absolute, jasmine sambac absolute, jasmine tea - Base notes: bourbon vanilla, cashmeran, guaiac wood essence ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Donna Born in Roma is a modern haute couture floriental. An elegant couture made of three qualities of Jasmine which brings a luxurious femininity blended with Vanilla Bourbon, the most expensive extract in the world. This is twisted with a radiant trio of modern wood, which gives an edgy touch reminiscent of Rome street culture. The bottle is designed with the iconic Valentino stud, inspired by Roma architecture which is the signature of Valentino Couture. Like the brand, the fragrance was born in Roma. The fragrance name is an attitude towards life. BORN IN ROMA. A statement of personality, my heritage and my own rules.

PName: COCO MADEMOISELLE Eau de Parfum Spray
Product_Description: Sexy, fresh amber fragrance recalls the irrepressible spirit of the young Coco Chanel. An elegant, luxurious spray closest in strength and character to the parfum form. The classic signature bottle is perfect for the dressing table or for travelling. Spray lightly morning and evening on pulse points at the throat and wrist.

PName: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Jasmine, saffron, cedarwood, ambergris ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Baccarat Rouge 540 is a universal, luminous and intense fragrance with woody ambery floral notes, a one-of-a-kind condensed olfactory signature with a long-lasting sillage. Inspired by the 250th anniversary of Baccarat, Francis Kurkdjian wanted to convey the poetic alchemy of crystal-making in this woody ambery floral fragrance, imagining a unique creation based on 3 'auras'. In the top notes, the breezy facets of jasmine flowers and the radiance of saffron evoke the aura of air. They are highlighted by an accord evoking ambergris and dry woody tones, embodying the mineral aura. Lastly, the aura of fire is suggested by the addictive sensuality of ethyl maltol, a note with gourmand facets. ABOUT THE BRAND: The Maison Francis Kurkdjian collection is sketched like a fragrance wardrobe, with myriad of facets of emotions. Designed in the tradition of luxury French perfumery, it advocates nevertheless a contemporary vision of the art of creating and wearing perfume. Maison Francis Kurkdjian's unique personality is fostered by the creative power of a man who has a taste for precision. Recognized as one of the world's most celebrated perfumers, Francis Kurkdjian imagined a fragrance territory of a free, sensual and delicate perfectionism.

PName: Y Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top note: apple - Middle note: sage - Base notes: vetiver, tonka bean ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Y Eau de Parfum, a seductive interpretation on the iconic Yves Saint Laurent white T-shirt and black jacket. An intense portrayal of the Y signature, sophisticated notes of bergamot, ginger and sage are sharpened by an apple accord. At its base, the boldness of vetiver embodies the passion of the Y man's unique strength. Never stop believing. Y, masculinity redefined.

PName: Dior Addict Lip Glow Balm
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Dior Addict Lip Glow Balm is where makeup meets lip care, offering the perfect blend of color and hydration. Now available in an extended shade range of cool and new warm undertones, the same iconic pH-activated formula delivers a sheer radiant glow and 48-hour hydration.* WHAT IT'S FOR: For all skin types WHAT IT DOES: The hydrating lip balm is infused with a unique technology that adapts to the pH of lips to reveal custom color and a natural-looking glow. Featuring cherry extract and shea butter, Dior Addict Lip Glow Balm hydrates lips for 48 hours,* leaving them visibly smoother for 8 hours.** FINISH: High shine COVERAGE LEVEL: Sheer SHADES: Available in 20 shades HOW TO USE IT: - Apply additional coats of this lip balm directly to lips to achieve your desired look, from a subtle tinted glow to more intense color. - Pair with Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil and Rosy Glow Blush (both sold separately). *Based on instrumental tests with 31 subjects. **Based on instrumental tests with 20 women.

PName: Rouge Dior Satin Lipstick
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Rouge Dior lipstick, the Dior makeup icon, in a satin finish. Refillable, long-lasting lipsticks with hydrating floral lip care for 24h* comfort. WHAT IT DOES: Rouge Dior reveals satin lipsticks in a sleek new magnetic case, an even wider range of shades, and with two times more lip care than before. The hydrating floral lip care formula delivers long-wearing, couture color that stays true. FINISH:Satin HOW TO USE IT: 1. Apply the Rouge Dior balm (sold separately) as a hydrating base. Use a tissue to remove any excess product before applying makeup to the lips. 2. Line the lips with Rouge Dior Contour (sold separately). 3. For intense and even color, apply Rouge Dior lipstick from the center of the lips outwards. *Self-scoring by 31 subjects.

PName: ROUGE ALLURE Luminous Intense Lip Colour
Product_Description: The next generation of ROUGE ALLURE dresses lips with unmistakable attitude. A new formula with concentrated, ultra-thin pigments offers radically intense color with full coverage and a satin finish. Leaves lips supple and protected with lasting comfort.

PName: BLEU DE CHANEL L'EXCLUSIF
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Sandalwood, Cistus Labdanum, Ambery Notes FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Rich Amber ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Designed like an Extrait de Parfum, this intense ambery-aromatic fragrance features a spellbinding trail, making it the most mysterious of all the BLEU DE CHANEL interpretations. The radical lines of the cubic bottle accentuate the unique shape, rendering the vessel a true statement piece. Composed by CHANEL In-House Perfumer Creator Olivier Polge, BLEU DE CHANEL L'EXCLUSIF is a true concentration of precious materials. Sandalwood, highlighted in all its glory, adds dimension. The enigmatic character of the scent manifests through notes of cistus labdanum. Finally, woody ambery notes bring contrast and vibrancy, resulting in a majestic expression that leaves a memorable impression and stays on skin as if magnetically drawn to it. HOW TO USE IT: Spray onto skin generously.

PName: Miss Dior Parfum
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES:
Mandarin, Jasmine, Amber Woods FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Warm Florals ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE:
Created by Francis Kurkdjian, this perfume opens with the juicy freshness of a sparkling mandarin. Starry jasmine, tailor-made for Dior, brings out succulent wild strawberry facets, and the ambery woody accord warms up a soothing depth to this intense yet incredibly smooth fruity floral parfum. Between strength and grace, boldness and elegance, Miss Dior embodies Dior's vision of youth and femininity. Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creation Director, reinterprets the original fragrance of the House, infusing it with today's youthful spirit. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: The couturier's fragrance, Miss Dior Parfum, is adorned with a 'poignard' bow crafted in the workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers, known for its decade-long dedication to high fashion shows. A couture detail, woven from Lurex threads in a silvery hue that echoes the signature label. The emblematic Miss Dior houndstooth motif is engraved in the glass of this perfume in shimmering pink tones.

PName: Terre d'Hermes Eau de Parfum Intense
Product_Description: Creation: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Terre d’Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense reveals a deeper facet of the inner fire that animates the earth and man. Fragrance Notes: Terre d’Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense is a deep, woody fragrance that combines lively bergamot with warm wood, underpinned by the mineral notes of intense lava stone. Object: The sides and H-shaped base of the bottle are presented in a reddish-brown lacquer with a molten look. The bottle is topped with a matte black metal cap that evokes lava stone. Made from glass and aluminum, the bottle can be recycled if you do not refill it. How to Use: Spray onto pulse points like the wrists, neck, or elbows. Replenish the fragrance using the 6.7 oz. refill, sold separately. 1.7 oz./ 50 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Dibutyl Adipate, Hydroxycitronellal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Linalool, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Geraniol, Citral, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate. *Please Note: This list is subject to change over time.Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

Product_Description: Feeling the earth, lying on the ground, gazing at the sky. Jean-Claude Ellena Terre d'Hermès is a symbolic narrative revolving around a raw material and its metamorphosis. A novel that expresses the alchemical power of the elements. A water somewhere between the earth and the sky. A journey imbued with strength and poetry. Woody, vegetal, mineral. Alcohol-Free Deodorant Stick A scented formula that offers protection, freshness and softness to the skin, for a sensation of comfort and well-being all day long. 2.6 oz. / 70.9g

Product_Description: Feeling the earth, lying on the ground, gazing at the sky. Jean-Claude Ellena Terre d'Hermès is a symbolic narrative revolving around a raw material and its metamorphosis. PName: Terre d'Hermes
Product_Description: A hair and body formula which transforms into a pleasant, generous lather; easy to rinse. Delicately perfumed, the skin is soft and the hair shiny. Another way to wear fragrance with Terre d'Hermès. Terre d'Hermès narrates the relationship between man and earth, his humble and harmonious dialogue with the elements and nature. Terre d'Hermès is the perfume that connects man to his origins, to the source of his creative power. 6.7 oz./ 200 mL

PName: H24 Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: The combination of an enveloping sage, an electrifying narcissus, an invigorating rosewood and a warm, metallic note of sclarene. A lively, sensual and bright men's fragrance. H24 is the first fragrance expressing the contemporary man as seen by Hermès. A lively, sensual and bright fragrance, stemming from the daring blend between nature and technology. A 100% recycled and recyclable paper case decorated with a lime coloured net enclosing but opening up to space. 1.7 oz./ 50 mL

PName: H24 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, H24 Eau de Parfum reveals an intense strength as the signature of a new energy. A woody aromatic, H24 Eau de Parfum draws on the generous, botanical power of enveloping sage, dense high-tech moss, and warm and vibrant sclarene. The Object: With its pure lines, the bottle designed by Philippe Mouquet is adorned with moss-green lacquer to echo the fragrance’s olfactory notes. The aerodynamic, refillable bottle is crafted from recycled glass. The intense grey box is decorated with a fine lime-green line that delimits and opens up the space. Made entirely of untreated paper, the box is composed of recycled fibers. The Hermès Detail: H24 is the key to a new space. H for Hermès, Homme and Hours. 24 to evoke a relationship with time and a link to the house’s flagship address of 24 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré. Product_Description: With this third installment in the H24 line, Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel continues her botanical exercise in the footsteps of a modern man on the move. H24 Herbes Vives eau de parfum recreates the sensation of rediscovering urban nature after the rain. H24 Herbes Vives eau de parfum combines the power of a bouquet of fresh herbs, the texture of a pear granita, and the liveliness of a high-tech molecule, Physcool®. Fragrance Family: Fresh & Delicate Fragrance Notes: Top: Fresh herbs Middle: Pear granita Base: Physcool® 1.6 oz. / 50 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Dipropylene Glycol, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Linalool, Citronellol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract, Triethyl Citrate, Citral, Eugenol, Farnesol, Coumarin. *Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. H24 Herbes Vives eau de parfum recreates the sensation of rediscovering urban nature after the rain. H24 Herbes Vives eau de parfum combines the power of a bouquet of fresh herbs, the texture of a pear granita, and the liveliness of a high-tech molecule, Physcool®. Fragrance Family: Fresh & Delicate Fragrance Notes: Top: Fresh herbs Middle: Pear granita Base: Physcool® 3.3 oz. / 100 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Dipropylene Glycol, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Linalool, Citronellol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract, Triethyl Citrate, Citral, Eugenol, Farnesol, Coumarin. *Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

PName: Voyage d'Hermes Eau de Toilette Refillable Natural Spray
Product_Description: An invitation to discover, meet and share. Jean-Claude Ellena A novel that feeds on the imagination, Voyage d'Hermès expresses the longstanding and unusual relationship between the house and travel. An interplay of paradoxes, complements and unexpected alliances upholds the premise of woody notes that are fresh yet musky, familiar yet surprising, hovering between impulsive and comforting, equally at ease with men as with women. Hermès designer Philippe Mouquet created a nomad object bottle for Voyage d'Hermès, conceived for voyages and symbolic of movement. Eau de Toilette The Eau de Toilette, lively and reassuring, new and familiar, between radiance and softness. 1.18 fl. oz. / 35 mL

PName: Voyage d'Hermes Pure Perfume Refillable Spray
Product_Description: The story of Hermès is a voyage to which the name refers. At Hermès, voyages are a state of mind, a source of inspiration and an aspiration. Voyage d'Hermès is lively and reassuring, new and familiar. A new intensity of Voyage d'Hermès that reinvents the notion of presence and the extent of its sillage. It stands apart thanks to an amber signature with a generosity apparent from the very first notes. Woody fresh, amber. 3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL

PName: Voyage d'Hermes Pure Perfume Refillable Spray
Product_Description: The story of Hermès is a voyage to which the name refers. At Hermès, voyages are a state of mind, a source of inspiration and an aspiration. Voyage d'Hermès is lively and reassuring, new and familiar. A new intensity of Voyage d'Hermès that reinvents the notion of presence and the extent of its sillage. It stands apart thanks to an amber signature with a generosity apparent from the very first notes. Woody fresh, amber. 3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: Hermès' first cologne: the bright and green freshness of orange combined with woody undertones. The founding cologne, created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, Eau d'Orange Verte has since asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, standing out by its distinctive freshness. Conceived as an explosion of citrus notes, orange plays the principal role supported by zest and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint, and blackcurrant bud. The fragrance reveals its complexity in a unique sillage composed of oak moss and patchouli. Key Notes: Orange, Mint, Moss 3.4 oz./ 100 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Farnesol, Citronellol, Disodium EDTA. % Alcohol: 80% vol. *Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

PName: Eau de Basilic Pourpre Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: Creation: Hermès Fragrances welcomes a new light and airy, plant-driven creation. Conceived by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Eau de Basilic Pourpre is a tribute to purple basil, a sun-drenched aromatic that calls to mind conviviality and summer holidays with the family. Olfactory Notes: Eau de Basilic Pourpre expresses the deep and generous aromatic freshness of purple basil, enlivened with light, crystalline green bergamot and geranium to lend character. Object: The iconic lantern bottle is dressed up in a luminous green that vibrates with color. The orange box is adorned with a contrasting green band that echoes the color of the bottle. The Hermès Colognes Collection: An endless playground for virtuosity, the Hermès Fragrances collection explores the sensoriality of materials. It procures an instant, abundant pleasure whose unifying appeal goes beyond gender, fashion, age, and season. 3.4 oz./ 100 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol, Aqua (Water), Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Linalool, Bht, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Citral, Eugenol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Disodium Edta

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Eau de Cologne Spray
Product_Description: The Colognes Collection – Eau de Citron Noir Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... so many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note. – Christine Nagel Eau de Citron Noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness which rises to the challenge of tenacity: it is the midday-to-midnight Cologne! The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime. 3.3 oz./ 100 mL

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Eau de Cologne Bottle w/ Pump
Product_Description: The Colognes Collection – Eau de Citron Noir Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. PName: Eau de rhubarbe ecarlate Eau de Cologne Spray
Product_Description: I've always loved the duality of rhubarb. A double duality: visual and olfactory. The green colour metamorphoses into red. Starting acidic and crisp, its smell becomes smooth and velvety. Christine Nagel With Eau de rhubarbe écarlate, Christine Nagel has created her first Cologne for Hermès. Unprecedented and bold, more vegetal than citrus, it gives us the crisp, acidic freshness of rhubarb made velvet smooth with white musks. The eau de cologne, the green freshness of an explosion of orange, with a woody signature. 100 mL / 3.3 fl. oz.

PName: Barenia Perfumed Hair Mist
Product_Description: Creation: Barénia is reinvented as a perfumed hair mist with a light, airy texture that delicately fragrances and enhances the hair. Fragrance Notes: Barénia chypre eau de parfum blends an exhilarating butterfly lily with delicate miracle berries and envelops them in oakwood and intense patchouli. The Formula: A mist to suit all hair types, leaving hair shinier and silkier without weighing it down or drying it out. The Object: The glass bottle was created by Philippe Mouquet and inspired by the Collier de Chien bracelet. It has a frosted look and comes in a 1 oz. size: the ideal travel format, and a great way to prolong the scent of Barénia throughout the day. How to Use: Spray onto the hair from around 40 cm, using a circular motion. Alternatively, spray onto a hairbrush. For the full sensory experience and to intensify the trail, scent the pulse points of the body with Barénia eau de parfum and apply Barénia perfumed body cream. 1 oz./ 30 mL Ingredients List*: Alcohol, Triethyl Citrate, Isopropyl Myristate, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Hydrogenated Farnesene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Geraniol, Panthenol, Linalool, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate, Isoeugenol, Pantolactone, Farnesol. *Please Note: This list is subject to change over time.Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: Barenia Body Cream
Product_Description: Hermes Barenia Body Cream, 7 oz. The Creation: Barénia is a skin perfume, bringing together strength and softness. It expresses the instinctive, captivating facets of a woman. An unstoppable woman. The living embodiment of freedom. Derived from the Eau de Parfum, Barénia perfumed body cream has a melting, enveloping texture that soothes and hydrates the skin while leaving it delicately fragranced. Olfactory notes: Barénia blends exhilarating butterfly lily with the delicacy of the miracle berry, and envelops them in oakwood and an intense patchouli. PName: Tutti Twilly d'Hermés Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel for the Hermès girls, Tutti Twilly d’Hermès Eau de Parfum presents another facet of Twilly. It is a tribute to their free spirit – a blend of daring and lightheartedness – and their multifaceted nature. A floral and fruity eau de parfum, crafted with gentle ginger blossom, mellow lychee, and enveloping musk notes. Designed by Florence Manlik, the iconic lantern-shaped bottle is adorned with an inverted lychee-red color gradation and a bright white cap. A unique, hand-tied silk ribbon adds a playful finishing touch. The Twilly d'Hermès family of perfumes evokes the Hermès silk métier on two fronts: it calls to mind the house's silk twill scarf as well as the Twilly, a small, joyful, colorful silk ribbon that can be worn in countless ways. Fragrance Notes: Top notes: Ginger blossom Middle notes: Lychee Base notes: Musk 1.6 oz. / 50 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Methyl Anthranilate, Coumarin, Citral, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Eugenol, Disodium Edta, Tocopherol. % alcohol: 79% vol. *This list is subject to change over time. PName: Eau des Merveilles Bleue Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles Bleue leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, the fragrance successfully rises to the challenge of sparkling femininity with not a flower in sight. A woody mineral eau de toilette, a promise of surprises and freshness. 1.6 oz./ 50 mL

PName: Eau des Merveilles Bleue Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: A woody mineral eau de toilette, a promise of surprises and freshness. From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles Bleue leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, the fragrance successfully rises to the challenge of sparkling femininity with not a flower in sight. 3.3 oz./ 100 mL

PName: Elixir Merveilles Eau de Parfum Spray
Product_Description: A delicious and sensuous distillation of wonders. A soft candied orange mush wrapped in chocolate with ambergris woody notes, warm resins, and balms emphasizing its generosity and sensuality. Since 2004, Elixir Merveilles Eau de Parfum has been a key that opens the door to the wonders of Hermès. From innocence to fantasy, from childhood dreams to femininity, it is a world where the extraordinary is brought into the light. Year after year, we are transported on an air of poetic enchantment. Captured in their round bottles resembling a magnifying glass, the fragrances have the magical power to see the world from new and marvelous angles. It is the key to wonders, the origin of stars in broad daylight. Key Notes: Benzoin, Candied Orange, Patchouli 1.7 oz./ 50 mL

Product_Description: A delicious and sensuous distillation of wonders. A soft candied orange mush wrapped in chocolate with ambergris woody notes, warm resins and balms emphasizing its generosity and sensuality. Since 2004, Eau des Merveilles has been a key that opens the door to the wonders of Hermès. From innocence to fantasy, from childhood dreams to femininity, it is a world where the extraordinary is brought into the light. Year after year, we are transported on an air of poetic enchantment. Captured in their round bottles resembling a magnifying glass, the fragrances have the magical power to see the world from new and marvellous angles. It is the key to wonders, the origin of stars in broad day light. PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Perfumed Hair Mist
Product_Description: THE CREATION Un Jardin sur le Nil is reinvented as a perfumed hair mist, offering a multi-sensory tour of the garden islands of Aswan, Egypt. The light, airy texture delicately perfumes and enhances the hair. THE OLFACTORY NOTES Un Jardin sur le Nil is a green, woody fragrance that combines tangy green mango with delicate lotus and elegant sycamore. THE FORMULA The formula is suitable for all hair types, with active ingredients that leave hair visibly shinier, softer and silkier without adding weight or drying it out. THE OBJECT Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of horse-drawn carriage lanterns. Its glass presents a frosted effect in green shades that conjure up the banks of the Nile. It comes in a 1oz size: the ideal travel format, and a great way to prolong the scent of Un Jardin sur le Nil throughout the day. GESTURE Spray onto the hair from around 40 cm, using a circular motion. Alternatively, spray onto a hairbrush. For a more bespoke trail, nourish the lengths and ends of the hair with Un Jardin sur le Nil hair and body dry oil before spraying. For the full sensory experience, scent a few pulse points with Un Jardin sur le Nil eau de toilette. A new and rather unusual concept of freshness; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand. -- Jean-Claude Ellena Un Jardin sur le Nil is an impressionistic stroll through the island-gardens on the Nile at Aswan, the starting point for a new olfactory adventure. Green mango, lotus, calamus, and sycamore wood all lie at the heart of this refreshing ode. 1 oz. / 30mL Ingredients*: Alcohol • Triethyl Citrate • Isopropyl Myristate • Aqua (Water) • Parfum (Fragrance) • Limonene • Hydrogenated Farnesene • Hydroxycitronellal • Ethylhexyl Salicylate • Citronellol • Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane • Hexyl Cinnamal • Panthenol • Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate • Geraniol • Linalool • Pantolactone • Citral *Please Note: The ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

PName: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li I remembered the smell of ponds, the smell of jasmine, the smell of wet stones, of plum trees, kumquats and giant bamboos. It was all there, and in the ponds there were even carp steadily working towards their hundredth birthday. Jean-Claude Ellena Le Jardin de Monsieur Li describes a Chinese garden somewhere between reality and imagination. A place for meditation where strolling is allied to thought, and every step sets the imagination free. 3.3 fl. oz./ 97.5 mL

PName: Un Jardin en Mediterranee - Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: A perfumed expression of a Mediterranean memory, a mosaic of olfactory, visual and tactile sensations. Jean-Claude Ellena A novella that describes the spirit of a Mediterranean garden luxuriant with trees and flowers, and evokes a mosaic of smells pilfered from a private garden in Tunisia. Like a travelogue, this perfume conjures an idyllic world of shadows, water and light, on the theme of a fig tree allied with Mediterranean zests. Eau de Toilette 1.6 fl. oz. / 45.4 mL

PName: Un Jardin en Mediterranee - Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: A perfumed expression of a Mediterranean memory, a mosaic of olfactory, visual and tactile sensations. Jean-Claude Ellena A novella that describes the spirit of a Mediterranean garden luxuriant with trees and flowers, and evokes a mosaic of smells pilfered from a private garden in Tunisia. Like a travelogue, this perfume conjures an idyllic world of shadows, water and light, on the theme of a fig tree allied with Mediterranean zests. Eau de Toilette 3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL

PName: Rose Ikebana Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. Rose Ikebana offers a surprising contrast between rose petals and crisp rhubarb. Beautiful and minimalist, the traditional Japanese art of ikebana – arranging bouquets of cut flowers and leaves using very few elements – ideally corresponded to a form of expression I could transpose into a perfume. The smell of a rose early in the morning, damp, sprinkled with dew, delicate and light. Jean-Claude Ellena Ingredients Alcohol, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Citral, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract, Coumarin, Farnesol. % alcohol: 75% vol.

PName: Rose Hermes Silky Blush Powder
Product_Description: Allure 2021 Best of Beauty Award. Blush with a semi-matte finish, embossed with texture resembling silk twill. A fine, silky, long-lasting powder for a luminous, radiant complexion. At once ethereal and compact, its ultra-light, pigmented texture allows colour intensity to be tailored as desired, softened or asserted, from the most natural to the most sophisticated finish. This long-lasting powder clings to the skin with the first touch. Rose Hermès Silky Blush can be refilled by simply removing and replacing its powder pan. Refills are sold separately. With its round case and off-centre mirror, this disc of white and gold light designed by Pierre Hardy is distinctive for its lightness, as it was conceived for use on the go. Slipped inside its orange box, this is a pure Hermès object. How to Use: Applied freely, Rose Hermès Silky Blush expresses a state of mind, as if drawing a face. With its ultra-light texture, the colour can be applied as desired, to suit your mood. Healthy Glow: Apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion. Highlighted Cheekbones: Apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look. Sculpted Effect: Apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look Ingredients Synthetic Fluorphlogopite • Talc • Dimethicone • Polymethyl Methacrylate • Zinc Stearate • Diisostearyl Malate • Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate • Lauroyl Lysine • Pentylene Glycol • Caprylyl Glycol • Parfum (Fragrance) • Sodium Dehydroacetate • Tocopherol • Sorbitan Sesquioleate • Tocopheryl Acetate • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Aqua/water/eau • Morus Alba Bark Extract • Benzyl Salicylate • Limonene [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) • Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake) • Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake) • Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) • Ci 77007 (Ultramarines) • Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) • Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake).

Healthy Glow: Apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion. Highlighted Cheekbones: Apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look. Sculpted Effect: Apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look Ingredients Synthetic Fluorphlogopite • Talc • Dimethicone • Polymethyl Methacrylate • Zinc Stearate • Diisostearyl Malate • Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate • Lauroyl Lysine • Pentylene Glycol • Caprylyl Glycol • Parfum (Fragrance) • Sodium Dehydroacetate • Tocopherol • Sorbitan Sesquioleate • Tocopheryl Acetate • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Aqua/water/eau • Morus Alba Bark Extract • Benzyl Salicylate • Limonene [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) • Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake) • Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake) • Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) • Ci 77007 (Ultramarines) • Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) • Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake).

PName: Rose Hermes Silky Blush Powder
Product_Description: Allure 2021 Best of Beauty Award. Blush with a semi-matte finish, embossed with texture resembling silk twill. A fine, silky, long-lasting powder for a luminous, radiant complexion. At once ethereal and compact, its ultra-light, pigmented texture allows colour intensity to be tailored as desired, softened or asserted, from the most natural to the most sophisticated finish. This long-lasting powder clings to the skin with the first touch. Rose Hermès Silky Blush can be refilled by simply removing and replacing its powder pan. Refills are sold separately. With its round case and off-centre mirror, this disc of white and gold light designed by Pierre Hardy is distinctive for its lightness, as it was conceived for use on the go. Slipped inside its orange box, this is a pure Hermès object. How to Use: Applied freely, Rose Hermès Silky Blush expresses a state of mind, as if drawing a face. With its ultra-light texture, the colour can be applied as desired, to suit your mood. Healthy Glow: Apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion. Highlighted Cheekbones: Apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look. Sculpted Effect: Apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look Ingredients Synthetic Fluorphlogopite • Talc • Dimethicone • Polymethyl Methacrylate • Zinc Stearate • Diisostearyl Malate • Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate • Lauroyl Lysine • Pentylene Glycol • Caprylyl Glycol • Parfum (Fragrance) • Sodium Dehydroacetate • Tocopherol • Sorbitan Sesquioleate • Tocopheryl Acetate • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Aqua/water/eau • Morus Alba Bark Extract • Benzyl Salicylate • Limonene [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) • Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake) • Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake) • Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) • Ci 77007 (Ultramarines) • Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) • Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake).

PName: Plein Air
Product_Description: Creation: Beauty in the open air with the H Trio bronzing mineral powders. Inspired by three of nature’s elements – air, sun and earth – the healthy glow mineral powder leaves a semi-matt veil of finely iridescent, pigmented powder on the skin, illuminating it with natural warmth. Depth is added progressively and the skin comes to life, revealed in a new light, subtly sun-kissed, radiant and vibrant with the sun’s energy. Color: Each harmony evokes the color palette of one of the world’s landscapes. Sahara: undulations of amber beige caressed by the Saharan wind, highlighting the complexion with sun-kissed shades. Sienne: a harmony of browns, echoing scorched Tuscan earth and elevating the complexion with natural warmth. Colorado: the contrasts and intensity of red-hot earth in the eponymous desert fusing into radiant light. Atlas: beige hues with a sunny glow evoking the Moroccan desert, a luminous palette to enhance the complexion. Tottori: a light veil of color that glides over the contours of the face in graduated shades of light and luminous beige, like the delicate contrasts of Japanese dunes. The Product: Composed of 88% ingredients of natural origin, the healthy glow mineral powder has an exceptional sensory quality derived from technology that produces the softest and finest possible particles of powder. It blurs imperfections and unifies the complexion while caring for the skin thanks to a hyaluronic acid derivative content. The healthy glow mineral powder is suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive. The Object: With its round case, this white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic H passant motif. This Art Deco-influenced graphic signature was created in the mid-1920s for Hermès the saddler. The H is as functional as it is aesthetic and offers three levels of intensity for a single shade, the vertical band being the darkest and the background the lightest. Ethics: The mineral powder case can be refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately. 0.63 oz./ 18.6 mL Ingredients*: Talc • Silica • Dimethicone • Synthetic Fluorphlogopite • Zinc Stearate • Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate • Diisostearyl Malate • Caprylyl Glycol • Pentylene Glycol • Phenyl Trimethicone • Sodium Dehydroacetate • Parfum (Fragrance) • Tocopherol • Sorbitan Sesquioleate • Tocopheryl Acetate • Sodium Hyaluronate • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Kaolin • Morus Alba Bark Extract • Geraniol • Benzyl Salicylate • Limonene • Citronellol • Linalool • Hydroxycitronellal • [+/- (May Contain): Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) • Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) • Ci 77007 (Ultramarines) • Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) • Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)] *This list is subject to change over time.Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: Plein Air Radiant Matte Powder
Product_Description: Creation: Beauty embraces the open air with the radiant matte powder, a soft, silky finishing powder that mattifies the complexion with a translucent glow. Its shade is universal. Formula: The formula contains emollients for long-lasting softness and comfort. Packaging: The Radiant Matte Powder* case is refilled simply by inserting the pin into the slot in the base to remove the powder pan and replacing it with the new one. The pin is supplied with the refill. The Radiant Matte Powder refill is is tucked into an eco-friendly plant fiber box. *The powder case must be ordered separately. How to Use: Apply the powder directly to bare skin to mattify or after the complexion balm to absorb shine and set make-up. It can be used for touch-ups during the day, all over the face, or where desired, the forehead, nose or chin. How to Refill: Open your powder case* Insert the pin into the slot in the base Keeping the pin inserted, remove the powder pan from the case. The adhesive will hold the new refill in place. Gently insert the new powder into the case. Your new Radiant Matte Powder is ready to use! *The powder case must be ordered separately. Radiant Matte Powder is compatible with the Hermès Plein Air Radiant Matte Powder and Radiant Glow Powder refill. Ingredients**: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite • Zinc Stearate • Dimethicone/vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer • Lauryl Dimethicone • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Alumina • Calcium Sodium Borosilicate • Silica • Oryza Sativa (Rice) Hull Powder • Ethylhexylglycerin • Caprylyl Glycol • Sodium Dehydroacetate • Laureth-4 • Triethoxycaprylylsilane • Stearic Acid • Parfum (Fragrance) • Aqua /water/eau • Dimethicone • Morus Alba Bark Extract • Benzyl Salicylate • Limonene • Geraniol ** Please Note: This list is subject to change over time.Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: Plein Air
Product_Description: Creation: Beauty in the open air with the H Trio highlighting mineral powders. Inspired by three of nature’s elements – air, sun and earth – the iridescent mineral powder leaves a shimmering finish on the skin. Its high concentration of mother-of-pearl creates a multifaceted iridescent finish. Light is perfectly diffused through this elegant prism of pink or coral hues, and the skin glows with a new, natural radiance. Color: Each harmony evokes the color palette of one of the world’s landscapes. Corail Mojave: a shimmering veil of light with coral hues, like a sunset over sandstone in the Californian desert. Rose Atacama: the sand and rock of the Chilean desert illuminated by rare and unexpected blooms, captured in an iridescent palette with a rosy sheen. The Product: Composed of 88% ingredients of natural origin, the iridescent mineral powder has an exceptional sensory quality derived from technology that produces the softest and finest possible particles of powder. Its iridescent texture enhances natural beauty and cares for the skin thanks to a hyaluronic acid derivative. The iridescent mineral powder is suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive. The Object: With its round case, this white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic H passant motif. Ethics: The iridescent mineral powder case can be refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder compact. Refills are sold separately. Ingredients*: Talc, Mica, Silica, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Parfum (Fragrance), Tocopherol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, [+/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491/ci 77492 (Iron Oxides)] *This list is subject to change over time.Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: 0.5 oz. Les Mains Hermes Nail & Cuticle Nourishing Oil
Product_Description: ​The nourishing oil contains the essential nutrients needed to nourish, hydrate, fortify and protect the nails from dryness. The oil also hydrates and softens the cuticles. Its Cosmos Natural-certified formula is composed of 100% ingredients of natural origin. It nourishes and protects the nails from external aggressors through the combined action of five oils with renowned properties, blended with Pistacia lentiscus L. resin, white mulberry extract (Morus alba L.), and vitamin E. It is easy to apply and non-greasy, leaving the nails ready for the colour ritual. An object designed by Pierre Hardy that is both poetic and functional, slipped inside its little orange box! How to Use: Apply the nail and cuticle nourishing oil to the top of each finger. Massage your cuticles with small circular movements for optimum absorption. This caring gesture can be repeated daily or after the colour ritual. About the Collection: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with colour, echoing Hermès’ handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand care cream, anourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a topcoat, and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care. 0.5 oz./15 mL

PName: Les Mains Hermes Enamel Base Coat
Product_Description: The enamel base coat is the first step of the ritual. Its smooth texture, in translucent white, unifies and protects the nails and extends the longevity of the polish. Perfected by this invisible satin softness, the nails are prepared for the application of colour. A formula containing 69% natural ingredients, it is enriched with the resin tears of Pistacia lentiscus L. An object designed by Pierre Hardy that is both poetic and functional, it is protected from the light inside its white lacquered bottle and slipped into its little orange box! How to Use: Apply the enamel base coat to your nails to prepare them for the colour. Place the brush at the base of the nail and sweep it upwards to the tip. Repeat on each side of the nail if necessary to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. About the Collection: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with colour, echoing Hermès’ handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a topcoat, and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care. 0.5 oz./15 mL

PName: Les Mains Hermes Top Coat
Product_Description: Description: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with color, echoing Hermès’ handicrafts and workmanship. The topcoat is the final touch. Its transparent “gel lacquer” texture produces a long-lasting high-gloss finish. The color is encased in a protective shell for durability. Nails do not catch;instead, they shine, the mirror polish optimizing light without encumbering the surface, and giving a curved effect of depth. Its formula is made in France. The object designed by Pierre Hardy, is both poetic and functional. It is protected from the light inside its black lacquered bottle and slipped into its little orange box! A complete hand care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a topcoat, and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care. How to Use: To give the color maximum shine and hold, apply a layer of topcoat. The gesture is identical to that of the enamel base. Allow to dry for about fifteen minutes. For a natural look, the topcoat can be applied directly over the enamel base. 0.5 oz./ 15 mL

PName: Les Mains Hermes Nail Enamel
Product_Description: Hermès’ nail enamel is available in 24 shades inspired by the colours of Hermès enamel. The nail polish provides radiant colour and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colours contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. Its formula, made in France, is composed of at least 71% ingredients of natural origin. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure colour, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. How to Use: To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the centre of the lunula, and sweep it upwards to the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the colour more intense. About the Collection: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with colour, echoing Hermès’ handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a topcoat, and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care. 0.5 oz./ 15 mL

PName: Trait d'Hermes Revitalizing Care Mascara
Product_Description: Creation: The revitalizing care mascara intensifies and emphasizes the gaze with lash-to-lash volume. Its innovative wand ensures easy application and precise lash definition. The Object: This elegant and slim object features an ultra-fine technical wand composed of plant fibers derived from the castor bean. Its shape forms a subtle H, creating reservoirs in the sides that deposit just the right amount of product onto the lashes. True objects d'art designed by Pierre Hardy, each mascara is packaged in an orange box, a House signature. The Color: Noir Fusain, a mark of mystery and a dark spark underscoring an enigmatic twinkle in the eye. Brun Bistre, a wooded path scattered with bronzed pigments, a sepia watercolor tinted with warm, coppery tones. Rouge H, the House's heritage color, an unfathomable shade nurtured by cherry brown and a Venetian-tinged burgundy, a fiery line that embodies its own history. Bleu Encre, a flowing line, diffuse writings extending out like a pair of wings, an elusive firmament as deep as the skies. Vert Titien, suffused with a vivid memory and tinged with botanical brightness, a spiritual allegory, a legendary sketch that captures the natural light. Violet Indigo, a hazy azure pigment with cerulean intensity, a patch of sky that defines the eyes like a chiaroscuro landscape. The Product: Composed of 97% natural ingredients, the mascara's gentle formula is suitable for all eyes, including sensitive ones. It contains millet seed extract, known for its protective and lengthening properties, nourishing shea butter and moringa butter. As a result, the lashes appear denser and thicker. The light texture of the revitalizing care mascara, designed for lash-to-lash volume, glides seamlessly along each lash from root to tip, coating them individually for precise application. Its weightless formula has a long-lasting result that does not flake or transfer to the eyelid. Ingredients*: Aqua/ Water/ Eau, Candelilla Cera/euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/cire De Candelilla, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Cera Carnauba/copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/cire De Carnauba, Moringa Oil/hydrogenated Moringa Oil Esters, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Panicum Miliaceum (Millet) Seed Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Arginine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Chlorphenesin, Triticum Aestivum (Wheat) Seed Extract, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) *Please Note: This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: Ombres d'Hermes Eyeshadow Quartet
Product_Description: Creation: Six color palettes offer various avenues of expression for the eyes, creating a natural, intense, or sophisticated look. Each quartet is comprised of a graduated trio of powders complemented by a fourth, bold, and unexpected shade. All can be used individually or combined to create a subtle, seamless blend of shadows. The Object: Designed by Pierre Hardy, this quartet of eyeshadows plays with geometric shapes and echoes the Bauhaus movement. Its round case is protected by a canvas drawstring pouch and includes an applicator brush in lacquered wood. The object is presented in an orange box. The Color: Imagined by Gregoris Pyrpylis, creative director of Hermès Beauty, each palette is inspired by nature and bears a name evocative of its color universe. Ombres Pétales, a graceful palette with a poetic floral heritage accentuated by the sultry innocence of shades of pink and plum. Ombres Végétales, influenced by green foliage adorned with an iridescent shimmer, evokes an illuminated garden abundant with nature. Ombres Fauves, amber undertones that evoke the sensation of a lustrous silk, accentuated with a bright ephemeral orange. Ombres Marines, a deep blue imbued with rich and enigmatic shades, resembling glimpses of the ocean's depths. Ombres Fumées, stormy shades tinged with a cool light—a dark presence with celestial accents. Ombres Mordorées, a golden horizon illuminated with delicate bronze accents that echo the radiant embers of autumn's warmth. The Product: The eyeshadow quartets are composed of 98% natural ingredients. The powder contains silky emollients and oils, ensuring effortless application and a long-lasting, natural finish. The eyeshadows' soft and light texture can be easily blended using a finger or brush, allowing you to achieve your desired level of intensity. In each palette, the various finishes draw inspiration from the silk métier. The matte finish evokes the essence of silk chiffon, the satin finish mirrors the allure of silk twill, and the shimmering finish is reminiscent of silk lame. To Refill: The eye shadow case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately in quartets. Ingredients*: Neutral Base: Talc, Mica, Boron Nitride, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Dimethiconol Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Methylpropanediol, Zinc Stearate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylyl Glycol, Polybutene, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Phenylpropanol, Tin Oxide, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ci 77491/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines). (Satin) Surprise Color & Dark Color: Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Magnesium Myristate, Maltodextrin, Methylpropanediol, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Cellulose, Phenylpropanol, Magnesium Stearate, Morus Alba Bark Extract [+/- (May Contain): Ci 75470 (Carmine), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77491/ Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines)]. (Matte) Light Accent: Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Methylpropanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Tin Oxide, Phenylpropanol, Cellulose, Magnesium Stearate, Kaolin, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 77491 / Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines). (Iridescent) *Please Note: This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

To Refill: The eye shadow case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately in quartets. PName: Ombres d'Hermes Eyeshadow Quartet
Product_Description: Creation: Six color palettes offer various avenues of expression for the eyes, creating a natural, intense, or sophisticated look. Each quartet is comprised of a graduated trio of powders complemented by a fourth, bold, and unexpected shade. All can be used individually or combined to create a subtle, seamless blend of shadows. The Object: Designed by Pierre Hardy, this quartet of eyeshadows plays with geometric shapes and echoes the Bauhaus movement. Its round case is protected by a canvas drawstring pouch and includes an applicator brush in lacquered wood. The object is presented in an orange box. The Color: Imagined by Gregoris Pyrpylis, creative director of Hermès Beauty, each palette is inspired by nature and bears a name evocative of its color universe. Ombres Pétales, a graceful palette with a poetic floral heritage accentuated by the sultry innocence of shades of pink and plum. Ombres Végétales, influenced by green foliage adorned with an iridescent shimmer, evokes an illuminated garden abundant with nature. Ombres Fauves, amber undertones that evoke the sensation of a lustrous silk, accentuated with a bright ephemeral orange. Ombres Marines, a deep blue imbued with rich and enigmatic shades, resembling glimpses of the ocean's depths. Ombres Fumées, stormy shades tinged with a cool light—a dark presence with celestial accents. Ombres Mordorées, a golden horizon illuminated with delicate bronze accents that echo the radiant embers of autumn's warmth. The Product: The eyeshadow quartets are composed of 98% natural ingredients. The powder contains silky emollients and oils, ensuring effortless application and a long-lasting, natural finish. The eyeshadows' soft and light texture can be easily blended using a finger or brush, allowing you to achieve your desired level of intensity. In each palette, the various finishes draw inspiration from the silk métier. The matte finish evokes the essence of silk chiffon, the satin finish mirrors the allure of silk twill, and the shimmering finish is reminiscent of silk lame. To Refill: The eye shadow case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately in quartets. PName: Trait d'Hermes Eyeliner
Product_Description: The Creation The precision eyeliner highlights the gaze in a single stroke. It is easy to apply, creating a long-wear line on the eyelid. The Color Encre Noire is a single shade of deep black that creates an intense line. The Product The product is formulated with intense black pigments, while its texture allows the user to draw a clean line with an even, satin finish. The Formula Waterproof and quick-drying, the Trait d’Hermès eyeliner creates a long-wear make-up look that will not smudge or run. The Object Designed by Pierre Hardy, the refillable eyeliner is an object created to last. It contains an Encre Noir cartridge and is reminiscent of a fountain pen. The fibers of the tapered applicator tip remain soft over time and are shaped to ensure a precise and adjustable line. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house’s emblematic H. The Gesture The Trait d’Hermès eyeliner offers make-up looks from the most natural to the most sophisticated. For a fine, precise line, use the tip of the applicator and draw a line with a light touch. For a thick, graphic line, use the full length of the applicator and draw a line with a firm touch. Ingredients: Aqua/water/eau • Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer • Butylene Glycol • 1,2-hexanediol • Phenoxyethanol • Beheneth-30 • Caprylyl Glycol • Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone • Citric Acid • Aminomethyl Propanol • Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate • Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate • Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate • Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate • Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate • Tocopherol • Ci 77266 (Black 2) [nano]. Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list. 0.017 oz.

PName: Trait d'Hermes Eye Pencil
Product_Description: The Creation Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. The Color These twenty-four emblematic, surprising, and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. The Product Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. The Formula Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes. The Object Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood – sourced from PEFC-certified* forests – and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic H. The Gesture The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze. Using the pencil's smudger or the L'estompeur de précision brush, you can create a wide range of make-up results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline. * Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification Schemes – Protecting the environmental balance of forests Ingredients: Mica • Cetyl Dimethicone • Talc • C30-45 Alkyl Methicone • Aluminum Distearate • C30-45 Olefin • Kaolin • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) • Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) • Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) • Ci 77007 (Ultramarines). Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list. 0.03oz

PName: Hermesistible Infused Lip Care Oil
Product_Description: The Hermèsistible lip collection awakens the senses with a synaesthesia of colors and scents. Made from 97% natural ingredients, Color and Scent Care Oil combines a nourishing skincare action with a fresh make-up result. Hydrated and smoothed, the lips are adorned with a light touch of color, radiant shine, and an addictive fruity note. Texture & Formulation: Enriched with a high concentration of active ingredients, the care oil is sensory, enveloping, and comfortable. Its plant oils form a protective, nourishing film on the lips, while the complex of emollient raw materials maintains and improves their hydration The Object: The joyful and colorful object is made from glass and enhanced with a playful jumble of letters forming the name of the collection. On the cap, the Hermès ex-libris is engraved tone-on-tone. How to Use: The flocked, delicate, and precise shape of the applicator enables a simple and intuitive action. 0.28 oz. The Color: Pourpre Camarine is a sparkling and fruity purple, which borrows its hue from crowberries. Rose Kola is an elegant rosewood, with vibrant and spicy nuances reminiscent of kola nut. Rouge Amarelle is a bright red to which the Amarelle cherry brings its tangy gourmand notes. Rose Pitaya is a fresh pink combining delicacy with the fruity radiance of dragon fruit. Corail Bigarade is a bright, sunny coral, as fresh and soft as the flesh of a Seville orange. Beige Sapotille is a soft beige with a bright orange note reminiscent of sapodilla, tropical fruit with creamy, caramel-flavored flesh. THE SCENT Hermès perfumer, Christine Nagel has created a collection of 6 unique scents, corresponding to each color. The scent for Pourpre Camarine is composed of the nurturing notes of sandalwood and arnica, combined with a sparkling and fruity note of crowberry. The scent for Rose Kola is composed of the caring notes of sandalwood and arnica, combined with a vibrant and spicy note of kola. The scent for Rouge Amarelle is composed of nurturing notes of sandalwood and arnica, combined with a delicious and tangy note of Amarelle cherry. The scent for Rose Pitaya is composed of the nurturing notes of sandalwood and arnica, combined with a fruity and delicate note of dragon fruit. The scent for Corail Bigarade is composed of the nurturing notes of sandalwood and arnica, combined with a soft and solar note of Seville orange. The scent for Beige Sapotille is composed of the nurturing notes of sandalwood and arnica, combined with a tender, caramelized note of sapodilla. Ingredients*: Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer • Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate • Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate • Phytosteryl/octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate • Dextrin Palmitate/ethylhexanoate • Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil • Octyldodecanol • Parfum (Fragrance) • Glyceryl Caprylate • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Tocopherol • Sorbitan Oleate • Stearic Acid • Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil • Barium Sulfate • Morus Alba Bark Extract • Aluminum Hydroxide • Magnesium Hydroxide • Linalool • Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake) • Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake) • Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) • Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake)

PName: Rose Hermes Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description: Features/Benefits: Its weightless and translucent halo reveals the lips' natural beauty. With its fine and delicate waxy finish, the rosy lip enhancer melts over the lip, leaving a hint of transparent pink and a matte luminosity. Lips are delicately smoothed with a soft-focus effect. Sesame seed and raspberry seed oils help soften and nourish. Shade Descriptions: Rose Abricoté evokes fresh dew on the lips. Rose Tan is amber-toned, warm, the imprint of sun on the lips. Rose d'Été is at once fresh, radiant and tender. The rosy lip enhancer object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic yet functional and durable. Made from lacquered, polished and brushed metal, it is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box! This object is refillable. Refills are sold separately.
