PName: Rosy Lip Shine Enhancer
Product_Description: Creation: Rose Hermès is a collection dedicated to the natural beauty of lips. The rosy lip enhancer elevates the lips with a translucent touch of pink, leaving either a matte or glossy finish. Lips are gently nourished, smoothed, and plumped. Shade Description: Rose Confetti, a playful pink with hints of blue, illuminating your lips with its radiant and fresh confetti-like color Product: Inspired by the softness of Milo leather, the fine, imperceptible texture glides across the lips leaving a light veil of color, for a natural look. Formula: At the heart of the formula is the combination of white mulberry extract with sesame-seed and raspberry-seed oils, infusing the lips with suppleness and comfort. Indulge your lips in lasting nourishment and hydration. Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, the fragrance exudes soft, feminine notes of arnica, sandalwood, and candied angelica flowers. Object: Designed by Pierre Hardy, this object in lacquered, polished, and brushed metal is both poetic and functional. It is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box. How to Use: The Rose Hermès object is refillable. Created to last, it is crafted from noble materials. The only ephemeral element is the bullet. Refills are sold separately. Ingredients*: Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecanol, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Raspberry Seed Oil/tocopheryl Succinate Aminopropanediol Esters, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Di?steardimonium Hectorite, Parfum(Fragrance), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydro-cinnamate, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Citric Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Tocopherol, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 45410 (Red 27, Red 28 Lake). *Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

PName: Trait d'Hermes Lip Pencil
Product_Description: The Creation: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d’Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define, and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. The Color: These 16 emblematic, surprising, and timeless colors are designed to match all the shades in the Rouge Hermès collection perfectly. The Product: Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. The Formula: The formula delivers intense, long-wear color. The Object: Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood – sourced from PEFC-certified* forests – and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house’s emblematic H. *Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification Schemes – Protecting the environmental balance of forests The Gesture: The color can be applied in a single stroke, to delineate, define, and enhance the contours of the lips, or to color them. The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible, or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick. Ingredients**: Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/cire De Carnauba, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/cire De Candelilla, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Mica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, [+/- May Contain: Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake)]. #5431179a **Please Note: This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: Rouge Hermès
Product_Description: What it is Silky Lipstick Shine is inspired by the luster of Hermès silk. Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds, and subtle pinks. Object Pierre Hardy has designed an object with slender lines and a lacquered and brushed metal finish. Its cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. Silky Lipstick Shine is protected by a Rouge H canvas pouch and nestled in an orange box. Texture The melting texture of Silky Lipstick Shine envelops the lips in a veil of color – sheer, delicate, and comfortable. The light to medium coverage lets you adjust the intensity to suit your mood. Formula The hybrid makeup and lip care formula contains up to 85% ingredients of natural origin to provide comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with vegetable oils and butters, it contains active ingredients that care for the lips naturally: hydrating and plumping raspberry leaf extract, smoothing and softening sesame seed extract, nourishing and protecting Abyssinian plant oil, and white mulberry. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood, and angelica. Ethics The limited edition Silky Lipstick Shine object is refillable. Limited edition colors are not available as refills, but you can replenish the tube with any other available refill of Silky Lipstick Shine. Gesture The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive, and generous application. Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats. Ritual For flawlessly defined or subtly ombré lips, use the trait d’hermès lip pencil before applying silky lipstick shine. Expiration 3 years. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

A translucent, slightly orange-toned formula enriched with mother-of-pearl micro-particles. A fine, rich and comfortable texture. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! Applied generously, it acts as a natural enhancer. Lips are lightly tinted with a subtle gloss. This is the Poppy touch. 0.10 oz.

PName: Rouge Hermes Lip Balm
Product_Description: A complete treatment for the lips with moisturizing and smoothing properties. A rich balm with a fine, soft texture that gently moisturizes. Its natural, non-greasy finish is perfect for both men and women. A formula with a high concentration of beeswax and candelilla wax for well-hydrated, supple and comfortable lips. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! The stick is domed for easy, liberal and generous application, either as a base to smooth and soften the lips before adding color, or as a treatment to keep the lips continuously hydrated. 0.12 oz.

Product_Description: Creation: Suitable for all shapes of eyelids, Le Courbe-Cils Eyelash Curler enhances and sets the natural curl of the lashes, giving the eyes an elevated appearance. Gently press and hold at the base of the lashes to achieve a natural, wide-eyed look. The Object: This portable and durable object in matte black metal is engraved with the tone-on-tone Hermès signature on the golden band. Protected by a canvas pouch and an orange box, Le Courbe-Cils comes with three replaceable pads: white, blue, and orange.

PName: Trait d'Hermes Eye Pencil
Product_Description: The Creation Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. The Color These twenty-four emblematic, surprising, and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. The Product Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. The Formula Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes. The Object Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood – sourced from PEFC-certified* forests – and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic H. The Gesture The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze. Using the pencil's smudger or the L'estompeur de précision brush, you can create a wide range of make-up results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline. * Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification Schemes – Protecting the environmental balance of forests Ingredients: Mica • Cetyl Dimethicone • Talc • C30-45 Alkyl Methicone • Aluminum Distearate • C30-45 Olefin • Kaolin • Caprylic/capric Triglyceride • Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides) • Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) • Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet) • Ci 77007 (Ultramarines). Please Note: This ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list. 0.03oz

PName: Eau de mandarine ambree Eau de cologne spray
Product_Description: I can think of no smell more joyful than mandarin, more mellow than amber. Jean-Claude Ellena Reinventing its classic connections with citrus fruits and freshness, Eau de mandarine ambrée brings a vitality to Cologne that is as mischievous as it is gentle. Intrinsically cheerful mandarin is combined with sparkling passion fruit which is itself revealed by the mellowness of amber. A novella that expresses a lively, shimmering, smooth paradise, captured in a colour. Eau de cologne 3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL

PName: Eau de pamplemousse rose Eau de cologne spray
Product_Description: A bitter-sweet cologne: freedom in tradition. Jean-Claude Ellena With its classic approach favouring the liveliness and freshness of citrus fruits, Eau de pamplemousse rose is distinctive for the modern way it is written. The citrus theme of this novella, incarnated by grapefruit, takes on a new brilliance when it comes into contact with roses. Eau de cologne The eau de cologne, the sparkling freshness of grapefruit. 3.3 fl. oz. / 100 mL

PName: Concentre Eau de pamplemousse rose Eau de toilette natural spray
Product_Description: A bittersweet cologne: freedom in tradition. Jean-Claude Ellena With its classic approach favouring the liveliness and freshness of citrus fruits, Eau de pamplemousse rose is distinctive for the modern way it is written. The citrus theme of this novella, incarnated by grapefruit, takes on a new brilliance when it comes into contact with roses. Eau de toilette (Concentré de pamplemousse rose); the sustained freshness of grapefruit nuanced with rose petals, endorsed with full-bodied vetiver. 3.3 fl. oz./ 97.5 mL

PName: Eau de neroli dore Eau de Cologne Spray
Product_Description: Whereas there's usually very little neroli in perfumes, I used an abundance of it, out of love, out of the ordinary. Jean-Claude Ellena With Eau de néroli doré, his fifth creation in the Colognes family, Jean-Claude Ellena has given full voice to neroli, the essence extracted from orange blossom and given its name in homage to Princess Nerola who perfumed her gloves with it. And he used saffron to heighten its lively, enveloping freshness. The eau de cologne, the green freshness of an explosion of orange, with a woody signature. 100 mL / 3.3 fl. oz.

PName: Twilly Shower Cream
Product_Description: Twilly d'Hermès It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'Hermès. Free, bold, connected, mischievous and irreverent, they turn expectation on its head, swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo. – Christine Nagel It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. Each silk ribbon is unique. Body shower cream. A rich and velvety foaming cream. Skin is delicately perfumed, soft and supple.

Product_Description: Twilly d'Hermès It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'Hermès. Free, bold, connected, mischievous and irreverent, they turn expectation on its head, swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo. – Christine Nagel It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. Each silk ribbon is unique. A fluid formula which is quickly absorbed. The skin is moisturized, soft, supple and delicately perfumed. 6.5 oz./ 200 mL

PName: Eau d'orange verte Hair and Body Shower Gel
Product_Description: Eau d'Orange Verte is the scent of the Little Prince in all of us. Jean-Claude Ellena The founding cologne created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, this fragrance has asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, and stands out for its distinctive freshness. A novella perfume conceived as an explosion of citrus notes with orange playing the central role between zests and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. Eau d'Orange Verte reveals its complexity in a unique sillage comprising oak moss and patchouli. Hair and Body Shower Gel A hair and body formula that transforms into a fine and generous foam; easy to rinse. Delicately scented, the skin is soft, the hair is shiny. 6.7 fl. oz./ 200 mL

The rounded lines of the bottle are embellished with a deep green, emblematic of Eau d’orange verte, and two signature details: the H imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump. Ethics: The bottle is made of recyclable glass. A responsible gesture, integral to an object created to last. PName: The Parfums-Jardins Soaps Gift Set
Product_Description: The Parfums-Jardins collection gift set consists of three fragrant soaps: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li, Un Jardin sur le Nil and Un Jardin a Cythère. The Object: Each scented, pebble-shaped soap is slipped inside a paper box illustrated by an artist. A gift for yourself or for a loved one, presented in the house's iconic orange box. Olfactory Notes: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li: a floral and botanical fragrance that juxtaposes the delicate radiance of sambac jasmine, the tanginess of kumquat, and the fiery notes of bergamot. Un Jardin sur le Nil: a fruity, green, and woody fragrance that combines the scents of green mango, lotus blossom, and aromatic rush with incense and sycamore wood. Un Jardin a Cythère: a citrus and woody fragrance that combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. The Parfums-Jardins Collection: The Parfums-Jardins collection brings together the soul of a place, the perfumer's inspiration and the annual theme selected by Hermès. An aromatic journey for every moment, satisfying every desire for freshness, reverie or escape. 3 x 3.5 oz. / 100g Ingredients*: Un Jardin à Cythère: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin, Palm Kernel Acid, Limonene, Sodium Chloride, Decyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Allantoin, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Geraniol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Tocopherol, BHT, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide). An intense portrayal of the Y signature, sophisticated notes of bergamot, ginger and sage are sharpened by an apple accord. PName: Addict Lip Glow Balm
Product_Description: Dior Addict Lip Glow Balm What It Is Dior Addict Lip Glow Balm is where makeup meets lip care offering the perfect blend of color and hydration. Now available in an extended shade range of cool and new warm undertones, the same iconic pH activated formula delivers a sheer radiant glow and 48H hydration*. What It Does A hydrating lip balm infused with a unique technology that adapts to the pH of lips to reveal custom color & a natural-looking glow. Featuring cherry extract & shea butter, Dior Addict Lip Glow hydrates lips for 48 hours*, leaving them visibly smoother for 8 hours**. How To Use Apply additional coats of this lip balm directly to lips to achieve your desired look, from a subtle tinted glow to more intense color. Clinical Results * Instrumental test on 31 subjects. ** Instrumental test on 20 women. PName: Terre d'Hermes Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#In 2006, Jean-Claude Ellena created Terre d'Hermès, a fragrance connecting man to his origins, to the sources of his creative power. A mineral, woody fragrance, this HERMÈS scent combines the strength of cedar and the radiance of grapefruit with a vibrant touch of flint. At its base, the bottle rests on an orange H, leaving its imprint on the earth. At the top, the light is reflected by metal shoulders. Between the two, the transparency of the fragrance. When held in the hand, the bottle unveils its many details: the House's iconic Clou de Selle, the sliding cover used to release the spray, etc. Created by designer Philippe Mouquet, it is inspired by a bottle in a travel vanity case that is conserved at the Emile Hermès Museum. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#GrapefruitCedarFlint#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list may change over time. Please refer to the information provided on the packaging of the product to see the most up-to-date list of ingredients.#||#Style Code: 0400016849122

PName: Terre d'Hermes Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#In 2006, Jean-Claude Ellena created Terre d'Hermès, a fragrance connecting man to his origins, to the sources of his creative power. A mineral, woody fragrance, Terre d'Hermès combines the strength of cedar and the radiance of grapefruit with a vibrant touch of flint. At its base, the bottle rests on an orange H, leaving its imprint on the earth. At the top, the light is reflected by metal shoulders. Between the two, the transparency of the fragrance. When held in the hand, the Terre d'Hermès bottle unveils its many details: the House's iconic Clou de Selle, the sliding cover used to release the spray, etc. Created by designer Philippe Mouquet, it is inspired by a bottle in a travel vanity case that is conserved at the Emile Hermès Museum. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#GrapefruitCedarFlint#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list may change over time. Please refer to the information provided on the packaging of the product to see the most up-to-date list of ingredients.#||#Style Code: 0400016299349

PName: Terre d'Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Terre d’Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense reveals a deeper facet of the inner fire that animates the earth and man. Terre d’Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense is a deep, woody fragrance that combines lively bergamot with warm wood, underpinned by the mineral notes of intense lava stone. The sides and H-shaped base of the bottle are presented in a reddish-brown lacquer with a molten look. The bottle is topped with a matte black metal cap that evokes lava stone. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Lively bergamotBurning woodIntense lava stone#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#Terre d’Hermès Eau de Parfum Intense can be sprayed onto the clothes or skin for an enveloping trail.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. PName: Terre d'Hermès Eau Givrée Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Terre d’Hermès Eau Givrée, the heat of ice. A new Eau de Parfum, both fresh and intense. Created by Christine Nagel, Hermès’ perfumer, Terre d’Hermès Eau Givrée combines the intensity of citron and the sharp freshness of juniper berry with the power of Timut pepper. The striking sensation of an icy breeze is contrasted with the warmth of the woody, mineral notes characteristic of Terre d’Hermès. The Terre d’Hermès collection tells the story of man’s relationship with the earth, his humble and harmonious dialogue with nature and the elements. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#CedratJuniper berriesTimut pepper#||#INGREDIENTS#||#ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BHT, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, CITRONELLOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, CITRAL, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, BENZYL BENZOATE, FARNESOL.#||#Style Code: 0400016796691

PName: H24 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, H24 Eau de Parfum reveals an intense strength as the signature of a new energy. A woody aromatic, H24 Eau de Parfum draws on the generous, botanical power of enveloping sage, dense high-tech moss, and warm and vibrant sclarene. With its pure lines, the bottle designed by Philippe Mouquet is adorned with moss-green lacquer to echo the fragrance’s olfactory notes. H for Hermès, Homme and Hours. 24 to evoke a relationship with time and a link to the house’s flagship address of 24 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Clary sageOakmossSclarene#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. PName: Voyage d'Hermès Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#In 2011, Jean-Claude Ellena created Voyage d'Hermès Parfum, an intense and generous reinterpretation of the original fragrance. With a woody and amber character, Voyage d'Hermès Parfum reveals invigorating juniper berry blended with sweet and milky sandalwood. Designer Philippe Mouquet created a unique object inspired by a pocket magnifying glass found by chance. The glass bottle is encased in a metallic stirrup and decorated with the emblematic Clou de Selle. The bottle can be replenished using the Voyage d'Hermès Parfum refill. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Juniper berrySandalwood#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list may change over time. Please refer to the information provided on the packaging of the product to see the most up-to-date list of ingredients.#||#Style Code: 0400016467585

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Concentré d'Orange Verte Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: Eau d'Orange Verte is the scent of the Little Prince in all of us. Jean-Claude EllenaThe founding cologne created by Françoise Caron in 1979 and inspired by the smell of undergrowth moist with morning dew, this fragrance has asserted itself as an emblem of Hermès, and stands out for its distinctive freshness. A novella perfume conceived as an explosion of citrus notes with orange playing the central role between zests and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. Eau d'orange verte reveals its complexity in a unique sillage comprising oak moss and patchouli.The eau de toilette (Concentré d'orange verte), freshness upheld by an explosion of orange, with a woody signature. 3.3 oz. Made in France.#||#Style Code: 0437517323054

PName: Eau d'Orange Verte Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The very first Hermès cologne was created by Françoise Caron in 1979. It was initially called Eau de Cologne Hermès before being renamed Eau d'Orange Verte in 1997. Now iconic, it stands out for its vivid green freshness. The Eau d'Orange Verte cologne combines vibrant orange with fresh mint and woody notes of moss. The iconic lantern bottle is adorned with a deep green. On the orange box, a vividly contrasting band recalls the color of the bottle. The Hermès Colognes collection offers a playground that is as infinite as it is masterly for exploring the sensory nature of materials. It brings immediate and abundant pleasure that unifies beyond genres, fashions, ages, or seasons. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#OrangeMintMoss#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Farnesol, Citronellol, Disodium EDTA. % alcool : 80% vol.#||#Style Code: 0400016644282

PName: Eau De Basilic Pourpre Eau De Cologne
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Hermès Fragrances welcomes a new light and airy, plant-driven creation. Conceived by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Eau de Basilic Pourpre is a tribute to purple basil, a sun-drenched aromatic that calls to mind conviviality and summer holidays with the family. Eau de Basilic Pourpre expresses the deep and generous aromatic freshness of purple basil, enlivened with light, crystalline green bergamot and geranium to lend character. The iconic lantern bottle is dressed up in a luminous green that vibrates with color. The orange box is adorned with a contrasting green band that echoes the color of the bottle. An endless playground for virtuosity, the Hermès Fragrances collection explores the sensoriality of materials. It procures an instant, abundant pleasure whose unifying appeal goes beyond gender, fashion, age, and season.3.3 oz. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Purple basilGreen bergamotGeranium#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, LINALOOL, BHT, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CITRAL, EUGENOL, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, DISODIUM EDTA.#||#Style Code: 0400016826984

PName: Eau de citron noir Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: Eau de citron noir. "Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... So many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note." Christine Nagel . Eau de citron noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness which rises to the challenge of tenacity: it is the midday-to-midnight Cologne! Eau de cologne. The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime. 3.3 oz. Made in France.#||#Style Code: 0400097897321

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime. Bottle with removable pump. 6.7 oz. PName: Eau de rhubarbe écarlate Eau de Cologne Spray
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#With Eau de rhubarbe écarlate, Christine Nagel has created her first Cologne for Hermès. Unprecedented and bold, more vegetal than citrus, it gives one the crisp, acidic freshness of rhubarb made velvet smooth with white musks. The eau de cologne, the green freshness of an explosion of orange, with a woody signature. 3.3 oz. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#RhubarbLantanaMusk#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Alcohol, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, BHT, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Farnesol, Eugenol, Disodium EDTA. PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Ecarlate Eau de Cologne
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel created Eau de Rhubarbe Ecarlate in 2016. An unexpected interpretation of the Hermès Cologne, it revisits the surprising freshness of a herbaceous plant: rhubarb. A fruity citrus fragrance, Eau de Rhubarbe Ecarlate Cologne expresses the freshness of crisp rhubarb and tangy lantana, mingled with elegant musk notes. The iconic lantern bottle is adorned with a scarlet hue. On the orange box, a vividly contrasting band recalls the color of the bottle. The Hermès Colognes collection offers a playground that is as infinite as it is masterly for exploring the sensory nature of materials. It brings immediate and abundant pleasure that unifies beyond genres, fashions, ages, or seasons. Bottle with removable pump. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#RhubarbLantanaMusk#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Alcohol, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Bht, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Linalool, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Farnesol, Eugenol, Disodium Edta. PName: Twilly Eau Ginger Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Twilly Eau Ginger, the sparkle of the Hermès girls. A captivating creation woven with three materials: a generous, vibrant peony, a bright candied ginger, a supple and lively cedar. PName: Tutti Twilly d'Hermès Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel for the Hermès girls, Tutti Twilly d’Hermès Eau de Parfum presents another facet of Twilly. It is a tribute to a free spirit — a blend of daring and lightheartedness — and a multifaceted nature. A floral and fruity fragrance, Tutti Twilly is crafted with gentle ginger blossom, mellow lychee, and enveloping musk notes. Designed by Florence Manlik, the iconic lantern-shaped bottle is adorned with an inverted color gradation and a bright cap. A unique, hand-tied silk ribbon adds a playful finishing touch. PName: Eau des Merveilles Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, this fragrance was created in 2004 by Ralph Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. It successfully takes on the challenge of being a sparkling women's perfume with not a flower in sight. 3.4 oz. PName: Eau des Merveilles - L'Ambre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: The perfume of enchantment. An amber wood for women, surprising and magical. Jean-Claude EllenaFrom surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, this fragrance was created in 2004 by Ralph Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. It successfully takes on the challenge of being a sparkling women's perfume with not a flower in sight.The eau de parfum (Ambre des Merveilles), warm and sensual. Made in France.#||#Style Code: 0420197259416

PName: L'Ambre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum Spray
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#With L'Ambre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum, perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena continues its exploration of an enchanted world with the uniqueness of amber to enrich the Eau des Merveilles constellation with its woody and amber theme. The woody and amber Eau de Parfum blends a captivating amber, deep patchouli, and a voluptuous Balsam of Peru. On the emblematic star-spangled magnifying-glass Merveilles bottle, the magic grows ever deeper with the orange gradient embracing the sunny shade of amber. The top of the spray is engraved with the house's Clou de Selle seal. The third opus of the Hermès Merveilles constellation, L'Ambre des Merveilles extends this enchanting collection with a mysterious and captivating distillation. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Perfumer's amberPatchouliBalsam of Peru#||#INGREDIENTS#||#ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LIMONENE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, DIETHYLHEXYL SYRINGYLIDENEMALONATE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BHT, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CITRAL, BENZYL BENZOATE, GERANIOL, CITRIC ACID, FARNESOL, CITRONELLOL, EUGENOL, DISODIUM EDTA, CI 15510 (ORANGE 4), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5) This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product's packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.#||#Style Code: 0400019604315

PName: L'Ombre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: The intense radiance of a chiariscuro fragrance is enveloped in the depths of its amber woody notes. The sensuality of tonka bean and incense emphasized by deep notes of black tea. Since 2004, Eau des Merveilles has been a key that opens the door to the wonders of Hermès. From innocence to fantasy, from childhood dreams to femininity, it is a world where the extraordinary is brought into the light. Year after year, we are transported on an air of poetic enchantment. Captured in their round bottles resembling a magnifying glass, the fragrances have the magical power to see the world from new and marvellous angles. It is the key to wonders, the origin of stars in broad day light. Made in France.#||#Style Code: 0400012420842

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: From The Garden-Perfume Collection. Un Jardin sur la Lagune, a dream garden, soothing and vibrant. A floral and woody Eau de Toilette. A half open door, a dream escapes. Un jardin sur la Lagune is a secret garden where nature comes into its own again. Woody scents blend with floral notes. The wind carries afar salty notes. 1.6 oz. Made in France.#||#Style Code: 0400010640762

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created in 2019 by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette is a secret garden where nature has stood the test of time. An intriguing place hidden in the city of a thousand contrasts: Venice. Floral and woody, Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette is supported by luminous magnolia, enveloping pittosporum, and carnal Madonna lily. Made in France.FROM THE PERFUMER"I dreamed of this garden; I created a perfume woven from its memories, the cycle of trees and flowers, nature still enduring within it." Christine Nagel.#||#Style Code: 0400010640764

PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created in 2005, Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette evokes an olfactory journey to the garden islands in Aswan, Egypt. In this composition, perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena tells of this river synonymous with life and generosity. Green and woody, Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette combines tangy green mango with delicate lotus and elegant sycamore. 3.3 oz. Made in France.FROM THE PERFUMER"A new idea of freshness that is rather unusual; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand." Jean-Claude Ellena#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Alcohol, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Geraniol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral.% alcool : 75%#||#Style Code: 0420187955281

PName: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette evokes a Chinese garden poised between reality and imagination. A place for meditation, where strolling and thought go hand in hand. Perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena tells the story of a fragrance dotted with flowers, water, trees, and rocks. Floral and vegetal, Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette juxtaposes delicate sambac jasmine, tangy kumquat, and explosive bergamot in a harmonious accord. Made in France.FROM THE PERFUMER"I remembered the smell of ponds, the smell of jasmine, the smell of wet stones, of plum trees, kumquats and giant bamboos. It was all there, and in the ponds there were even carp steadily working towards their hundredth birthday." Jean-Claude Ellena#||#Style Code: 0400087057251

PName: Un Jardin en Méditerranée Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The first in the Parfums-Jardins collection, created in 2003, Un Jardin en Mediterranee Eau de Toilette evokes a walk through a secret Tunisian garden exuberantly overflowing with trees and flowers. It is an unusual oasis combining olfactory, visual, and tactile sensations, by Jean-Claude Ellena. Fruity and woody, Un Jardin en Mediterranee Eau de Toilette combines a sweet fig tree with the notes of green lentisk and delicate oleander. Made in France.FROM THE PERFUMER"A perfumed expression of a Mediterranean memory, a mosaic of olfactory, visual and tactile sensations." Jean-Claude Ellena#||#Style Code: 0420141702241

PName: Un Jardin Sur Le Toit Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Un Jardin sur le Toit Eau de Toilette tells of a hidden garden in the heart of Paris: a square of nature nestled on Hermès' rooftop at 24 Rue du Faubourg-Saint-Honore. Created by perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena in 2011, this fragrance pays homage to this garden of delight and celebration. Fruity and vegetal, Un Jardin sur le Toit Eau de Toilette unleashes the scent of a crisp apple tree into the Paris air, mingled with notes of a juicy pear tree. Made in France.FROM THE PERFUMER"A garden for fun, a garden that answers to no one, sprinkled with light." Jean-Claude Ellena#||#Style Code: 0420127636256

PName: Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Hermès’ perfumer Christine Nagel, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette is a surprising garden that is neither green nor floral, but... blond. It is the expression of an olfactory quest through Greece that leads to Kythira, an unspoiled island that has inspired many artists. A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of the horse-drawn carriage lanterns of yesteryear. The luminous graduated yellow glass echoes the sunny fragrance.Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#GrassesOlive woodFresh pistachio#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. PName: Cèdre Sambac Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: ABOUT THE COLLECTIONThe Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry.SCENTThe strength of cedar surrounded by a supple climbing jasmine. Raw, voluptuous.“Upon this age-old tree, strong and graceful, I wanted to grow an embracing jasmine that coils around it.” Christine NagelMade in France.#||#Style Code: 0400098242354

PName: Cuir d'Ange Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: ABOUT THE COLLECTIONThe Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry.SCENTCuir d'Ange offers the softness of leather, like a promise hovering over the skin. 3.3 oz."For a long time I’d wanted to reveal the importance I attach to literature, and how it corresponds to perfume. More significantly, I wanted to evoke my discovery of the work of Jean Giono. Two words from a passage in Jean le Bleu came back to me: 'cuir d’ange' - angel leather. Using the smells that are my words, I wanted to write a poem to rekindle the love duet between leather and the skin. Its softness and lightness, its tension and caress. Heliotropes and hawthorn, leather and musk." Jean-Claude EllenaMade in France.#||#Style Code: 0400090272925

PName: Iris Ukiyoé Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: ABOUT THE COLLECTIONThe Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry.SCENTBright and delicate, Iris Ukiyoé interprets the virtually unknown fragrances of the iris flower. 3.3 oz."I collect prints and have a mental picture of irises in the `floating world’ (the ukiyo-é in Japanese) in the works of Hokusai or Hiroshige. They inspired me when I was composing this divertimento based on floral iris. I felt like foiling the classic approach to the iris by working on the flower’s fragrances, which are virtually unknown. Its perfume is delicate but very much there, shifting between different notes: rose, orange blossom and mandarin, all expressed by small, impressionistic touches." Jean-Claude EllenaMade in France.#||#Style Code: 0400089806385

PName: Myrrhe Églantine Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: ABOUT THE COLLECTION The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry.SCENT An intimate meeting of precious myrrh and wild rosehip. Delicate, tangy.“This legendary material evokes the world of desert caravans and the former perfume routes. A myrrh, then more precious than gold, reinvented and reworked around rosehip, a wild, fresh and tangy rose that never surrenders.” Christine NagelMade in France.#||#Style Code: 0400098242416

PName: Osmanthe Yunnan Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: ABOUT THE COLLECTION The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. SCENT Osmanthe Yunnan, a seductive game of tea, flowers and fruits."During a visit to the Forbidden City in Beijing, I was captivated by an exquisite smell that led me by the tip of my nose to the Imperial Palace, where osmanthus bushes were in bloom. In November, despite their tiny size, the flowers exuded a strong scent of apricot and freesia. I imagined combining these blossoms with a tea from Yunnan, the most beautiful province in China and the idea for the fragrance was born." Jean-Claude EllenaMade in France.#||#Style Code: 0400090271789

PName: Santal Massoïa Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: ABOUT THE COLLECTIONThe Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry.SCENTSantal Massoïa is a compelling encounter between two milkwoods; sandalwood and massoïa. 3.3 oz."There are linear, vertical woods like cedar, and others that are horizontal, round, supple and velvet-smooth, such as sandalwood and massoïa. With this understanding in mind, I composed this enigmatic, inviting yet distant perfume with its unusual, pungent hints of resin and dried fruit, and familiar smells of dulce de leche and flowers." Jean-Claude EllenaMade in France.#||#Style Code: 0400089806336

Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The strength of vetiver in HERMÈS' Vetiver Tonka eau de toilette is softened by hazelnut. Infused with caramel, praline, and blonde tobacco notes, tonka bean drapes vetiver in softness and gives its woody notes a mellow roundness. By Perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#VetiverTonka bean#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list may change over time. Please refer to the information provided on the packaging of the product to see the most up-to-date list of ingredients.#||#Style Code: 0400016849120

PName: Violette Volynka Eau De Toilette
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#From the Hermessence Collection. The Violette Volynka Eau de Toilette from the Hermessence collection is an elegant, unexpected encounter: between masculine and feminine, between two unique materials which mirror each other like two alter egos. A blend of intensity and sweetness, the Violette Volynka Eau de Toilette promises a perfect balance between the strength of character of Volynka leather and the subtle, powdery notes of violet. The Violette Volynka Eau de Toilette bottle is pulled into the spotlight by the radiant, powerful purple of its leather cap and bottle. Boasting a striated grain, brown-red shade, and burnt wood scent, Volynka leather tells the story of vegetable tanning. Incredibly durable, it perpetuates age-old techniques: the grinding of oak bark or soaking in birch bark solutions. Forgotten for many years, this know-how was revitalized in 2017 thanks to the talent of Hermès artisans and hides found in the hold of a shipwreck. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Violet flowerViolet leafVolynka leather#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. Alcohol, aqua (water), parfum (fragrance), alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl salicylate, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, limonene, bht, hydroxycitronellal, linalool, ethylhexyl salicylate, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, geraniol, eugenol, citral, farnesol, benzyl benzoate.#||#Style Code: 0400017318366

PName: Oud Alezan Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The Hermessence Oud Alezan was born when Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel encountered an extraordinary oud. Heady, subtle, and majestic, Oud Alezan embodies an accord between an exceptional, enveloping oud and a striking duo of contrasting roses. An Hermessence suitable for both men and women. The bottle is showcased by a plum-brown-colored lacquer on the glass, contrasting with the chalk-colored leather adorning the cap. The house’s emblematic “lantern” bottle constitutes a unique and timeless signature. Its leather cap with saddle-stitch signature is topped with an engraved Hermès saddle nail. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#Exceptional oudRose hydrolatRose oxide#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, DIBUTYL ADIPATE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, CITRAL, ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE, EUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL#||#Style Code: 0400020803653

PName: Musc Pallida Essence De Parfum, 25 ML
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. Musc Pallida Essence de Parfum is a pure perfume oil whose texture exalts the powdery heat of iris and its alchemy with enveloping musks. A carnal duo that dances on the skin. Christine Nagel, creative director of Hermès Parfums, creates a new ritual. Inspired by unguent, perfume’s earliest form of expression, essence offers a concentration pushed to the extreme, and a second skin texture. The Essence de Parfum can be worn alone or under an Hermessence, to intensify its sillage and personalise its signature. Essence de Parfum is applied to the pulse points with a fingertip.0.84 oz. Made in France.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. PARFUM (FRAGRANCE) • HEXYL CINNAMAL • ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE • ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE • LINALOOL • HYDROXYCITRONELLAL • EUGENOL • ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE • BHT • BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE • COUMARIN • ANISE ALCOHOL • BENZYL BENZOATE • ISOEUGENOL • BENZYL ALCOHOL • BENZYL SALICYLATE.Musc, iris#||#Style Code: 0400017244526

PName: Rose Hermès Silky Blush Powder
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Blush with a semi-matte finish, embossed with texture resembling silk twill. A fine, silky, long-lasting powder for a luminous, radiant complexion. At once ethereal and compact, its ultra-light, pigmented texture allows color intensity to be tailored as desired, softened, or asserted, from the most natural to the most sophisticated finish. This long-lasting powder clings to the skin with the first touch. Rose Hermès Silky Blush can be refilled by simply removing and replacing its powder pan. Refills are sold separately. With its round case and off-center mirror, this disc of white and gold light designed by Pierre Hardy is distinctive for its lightness, as it was conceived for use on the go. Slipped inside its orange box, this is a pure Hermès object. 0.21 oz. Made in Italy.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#Applied freely, Rose Hermès Silky Blush expresses a state of mind, as if drawing a face. With its ultra-light texture, the color can be applied as desired, to suit your mood.Healthy glow: apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion.Highlighted cheekbones: apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look.Sculpted effect: apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look.AWARDSAllure Best of Beauty Award#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Talc, Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Zinc Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Dehydroacetate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Aqua/water/eau, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake).Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400014017127

Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#These Silky Blush creations from Hermès add a subtle touch of pink, enhanced by a shimmering veil of light. Made in Italy.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#This Silky Blush features an ultra-light, pigmented texture that is both airy and compact. It is enriched with subtle mother-of-pearl micro-particles for a delicately iridescent finish.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#For a healthy glow: apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion. PName: Hermès Plein Air H Trio Healthy Glow Mineral Powder
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#From the Hermès Plein Air Collection. Beauty in the open air with the H Trio bronzing mineral powders. Inspired by three of nature’s elements, air, sun, and earth, the healthy glow mineral powder leaves a semi-matt veil of finely iridescent, pigmented powder on the skin, illuminating it with natural warmth. Depth is added progressively and the skin comes to life, revealed in a new light, subtly sun-kissed, radiant, and vibrant with the sun’s energy. With its round case, this white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic H passant motif. This Art Deco-influenced graphic signature was created in the mid-1920s for Hermès the saddler. The H is as functional as it is aesthetic and offers three levels of intensity for a single shade, the vertical band being the darkest and the background the lightest. The mineral powder case can be refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately. 0.63 oz. Made in Italy.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#Composed of 88% ingredients of natural origin, the healthy glow mineral powder has an exceptional sensory quality derived from technology that produces the softest and finest possible particles of powder. It blurs imperfections and unifies the complexion while caring for the skin thanks to a hyaluronic acid derivative content.WHO IT'S FORThe healthy glow mineral powder is suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Talc, Silica, Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Parfum (Fragrance), Tocopherol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Kaolin, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Geraniol, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Citronellol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, [+/- (May Contain): Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77491/ci 77492/ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)].Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400018603514

PName: Hermès Plein Air Radiant Matte Powder
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The Hermès Plein Air collection is the Hermès Beauty vision applied to the complexion. It is a breath of fresh air for the skin.Beauty embraces the open air with the radiant matte powder, a soft, silky finishing powder that mattifies the complexion with a translucent glow. The formula contains emollients for long-lasting softness and comfort. Its round case with an off-center mirror is a disc of light in white and gold designed by Pierre Hardy. A lightweight object, it was created for use on the go. Slipped into its orange box, it is a pure Hermès object. The radiant matte powder is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately. 0.22 oz. Made in Italy.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#Apply the powder to bare skin to mattify the skin or after the complexion balm to absorb shine and set make-up. It can be used for touch-ups during the day, all over the face, or where required on the forehead, nose, or chin.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone/vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Lauryl Dimethicone, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Alumina, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Hull Powder, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Laureth-4, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Stearic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua /water/eau, Dimethicone, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Geraniol.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400017361034

PName: Hermès Plein Air H Trio Iridescent Mineral Powder
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#From the Hermès Plein Air Collection. Beauty in the open air with the H Trio highlighting mineral powders. Inspired by three of nature’s elements, air, sun, and earth, the iridescent mineral powder leaves a shimmering finish on the skin. Its high concentration of mother-of-pearl creates a multifaceted iridescent finish. Light is perfectly diffused through this elegant prism of pink or coral hues, and the skin glows with a new, natural radiance. With its round case, this white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic H passant motif. The iridescent mineral powder case can be refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder compact. Refills are sold separately.0.63 oz. Made in Italy.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#Composed of 88% ingredients of natural origin, the iridescent mineral powder has an exceptional sensory quality derived from technology that produces the softest and finest possible particles of powder. Its iridescent texture enhances natural beauty and cares for the skin thanks to a hyaluronic acid derivative.WHO IT'S FORThe iridescent mineral powder is suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. Talc, Mica, Silica, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Parfum (Fragrance), Tocopherol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, [+/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491/ci 77492 (Iron Oxides)].Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400018603512

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with colour, echoing Hermès’ workmanship.Hermès’ nail enamel is available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. 0.5 oz. Made in France.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the centre of the nail, and sweep it upwards to the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the color more intense.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#BUTYL ACETATE • ETHYL ACETATE • NITROCELLULOSE • ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER • ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE • ALCOHOL • STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE • ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL • ETOCRYLENE • DIACETONE ALCOHOL • HEXANAL • LITHOTHAMNION CALCAREUM EXTRACT • PHOSPHORIC ACID • MANNITOL • SORBIC ACID • DIATOMACEOUS EARTH • ZINC SULFATE • N-BUTYL ALCOHOL • TOCOPHEROL • [+/- (MAY CONTAIN) : CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE) • CI 77742 (MANGANESE VIOLET) • CI 77491/CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES) • CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE) • CI 73360 (RED 30)] *Ingrédients issus de l’agriculture biologique#||#Style Code: 0400015147750

PName: Trait d'Hermès Revitalizing Care Mascara
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The revitalizing care mascara intensifies and emphasizes the gaze with lash-to-lash volume. Its innovative wand ensures easy application and precise lash definition. This elegant and slim object features an ultra-fine technical wand composed of plant fibers derived from the castor bean. Its shape forms a subtle H, creating reservoirs in the sides that deposit just the right amount of product onto the lashes. Designed by Pierre Hardy, each mascara is packaged in an orange box, a House signature. It contains millet seed extract, known for its protective and lengthening properties, nourishing shea butter and moringa butter. As a result, the lashes appear denser and thicker. The light texture of the revitalizing care mascara, designed for volume, glides seamlessly along each lash from root to tip, coating them individually for precise application. Its weightless formula has a long-lasting result that does not flake or transfer to the eyelid. 0.16 oz. Made in Italy.WHO IT'S FORSuitable for all eyes, including sensitive.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. AQUA/ WATER/ EAU, CANDELILLA CERA/EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX/CIRE DE CANDELILLA, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, POLYGLYCERYL-6 DISTEARATE, DIMER DILINOLEYL DIMER DILINOLEATE, GLYCERIN, CERA CARNAUBA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA, MORINGA OIL/HYDROGENATED MORINGA OIL ESTERS, POLYGLYCERYL-10 MYRISTATE, PANICUM MILIACEUM (MILLET) SEED EXTRACT, CETYL ALCOHOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, XANTHAN GUM, ARGININE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, CHLORPHENESIN, TRITICUM AESTIVUM (WHEAT) SEED EXTRACT, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, TOCOPHEROL, MORUS ALBA BARK EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES)Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400019845686

PName: Ombres d'Hermès Eye Shadow Quartet
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#A variety of color palettes offer various avenues of expression for the eyes, creating a natural, intense, or sophisticated look. Each quartet is composed of a graduated trio of powders complemented by a fourth, bold, and unexpected shade. All can be used individually or combined to create a subtle, seamless blend of shadows. Designed by Pierre Hardy, this quartet of eyeshadows plays with geometric shapes and echoes the Bauhaus movement. Its round case is protected by a canvas drawstring pouch and includes an applicator brush in lacquered wood. The object is presented in an orange box. The powder contains silky emollients and oils, ensuring effortless application and a long-lasting, natural finish. The eyeshadows' soft and light texture can be easily blended using a finger or brush, allowing one to achieve the desired level of intensity. In each palette, the various finishes draw inspiration from the silk metier. The matte finish evokes the essence of silk chiffon, the satin finish mirrors the allure of silk twill, and the shimmering finish is reminiscent of silk lame. The eye shadow case is refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately in quartets. 0.10 oz. Made in Italy.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400019873913

PName: Trait d'Hermès Precision Eyeliner
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The precision eyeliner highlights the gaze in a single stroke. It is easy to apply, creating a long-wear line on the eyelid. The product is formulated with intense black pigments, while its texture allows the user to draw a clean line with an even, satin finish. Waterproof and quick-drying, the Trait d’Hermès eyeliner creates a long-wear make-up look that will not smudge or run. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the refillable eyeliner is an object created to last. It contains an Encre Noir cartridge and is reminiscent of a fountain pen. The fibers of the tapered applicator tip remain soft over time and are shaped to ensure a precise and adjustable line. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house’s emblematic H. The Trait d’Hermès eyeliner offers make-up looks from the most natural to the most sophisticated. For a fine, precise line, use the tip of the applicator and draw a line with a light touch. For a thick, graphic line, use the full length of the applicator and draw a line with a firm touch. 0.017 oz. Made in Japan.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. #||#INGREDIENTS#||#: AQUA/WATER/EAU, AMMONIUM ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, BEHENETH-30, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DISILOXANE DIMETHICONE, CITRIC ACID, AMINOMETHYL PROPANOL, POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE, POLYGLYCERYL-2 TRIISOSTEARATE, POLYGLYCERYL-10 STEARATE, POLYGLYCERYL-10 MYRISTATE, SORBITAN SESQUIISOSTEARATE, TOCOPHEROL, CI 77266 (BLACK 2) [NANO]. #5429155A"Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400021976584

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Color Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic "H". 0.042 oz. Made in Germany.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#These twenty-four emblematic, surprising, and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze. Using the pencil's smudger or the L'estompeur de précision brush, create a wide range of make-up results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on the product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400021976585

PName: Hermèsistible Infused Lip Care Oil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Hermès Beauty reveals Hermèsistible, a collection of six Color and Scent Infused Care Oils to adorn the lips with an irresistible radiance and fruity sensation. With Hermèsistible, the taste for color becomes a self-indulgent pleasure. The Hermèsistible lip collection awakens the senses with the synaesthesia of colors and scents. Hermès perfumer, Christine Nagel has created a collection of six unique scents, corresponding to each color. Enriched with a high concentration of active ingredients, the Care Oil is sensory, enveloping, and comfortable. Its plant oils form a protective, nourishing film on the lips, while the complex of emollient raw materials maintains and improves their hydration. 0.28 oz. Made in France.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#Color and Scent Care Oil combines a nourishing skincare action with a fresh makeup result. Hydrated and smoothed, lips are adorned with a light touch of color, radiant shine, and addictive fruity notes.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#The flocked, delicate, and precise shape of the applicator enables a simple and intuitive action.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400016382415

PName: Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Dedicated to the natural beauty of lips, Hermès, Rosy Lip Enhancer elevates the lips with a translucent touch of pink, leaving either a matte or glossy finish. Lips are gently nourished, smoothed, and plumped.Designed by Pierre Hardy, this object in lacquered, polished, and brushed metal is both poetic and functional. It is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box. The Rose Hermès object is refillable and created to last. Refills are sold separately. 0.12 oz. Made in Italy.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#Inspired by the softness of Milo leather, the fine, imperceptible texture glides across the lips leaving a light veil of color, for a natural look. At the heart of the formula is the combination of white mulberry extract with sesame-seed and raspberry-seed oils, infusing the lips with suppleness and comfort. Created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, the fragrance exudes soft, feminine notes of arnica, sandalwood, and candied angelica flowers.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. PName: Trait d’Hermès Lip Color Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d’Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define, and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. The formula delivers an intense, long-wear color. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house’s emblematic H. The color can be applied in a single stroke, to delineate, define, and enhance the contours of the lips, or to color them. The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible, or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick. 0.03 oz. Made in Germany.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. #||#INGREDIENTS#||#: CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, CERA CARNAUBA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA, CANDELILLA CERA/EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX/CIRE DE CANDELILLA, HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, MICA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, TOCOPHEROL, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, MORUS ALBA BARK EXTRACT, BENZYL ALCOHOL, [+/- MAY CONTAIN : CI 15850 (RED 6, RED 7 LAKE), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE), CI 77491/CI 77492/CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 45410 (RED 28 LAKE)]. #5431179ALearn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400021976213

PName: Rouge Hermès Silky Lipstick Shine
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Silky Lipstick Shine is inspired by the luster of Hermès silk. Like a veil of color and shine, this new lipstick enhances the lips with subtle color of buildable intensity to create the desired level of coverage. Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, has created a palette of sensual beiges, vibrant reds, and subtle pinks. Pierre Hardy has designed an object with slender lines and a lacquered and brushed metal finish. Its cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. Silky Lipstick Shine is protected by a Rouge H canvas pouch and nestled in an orange box. 0.10 oz. Made in France.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#The melting texture of Silky Lipstick Shine glides onto the lips, leaving a light and comfortable veil of translucent color. Its light to medium coverage offers buildable intensity, for looks ranging from a soft, sheer wash of color to a more intense result.The hybrid make-up and lip care formula helps to provide comfort and hydration from the moment it is applied. Formulated with vegetable oils and butters, it contains active ingredients that care for the lips naturally: hydrating and plumping raspberry leaf extract, smoothing and softening sesame seed extract, nourishing and protecting Abyssinian plant oil, white mulberry. The scent, created by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel, combines delicate arnica, sandalwood, and angelica.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#The slim, beveled shape of the lipstick bullet allows for easy, instinctive, and generous application. Depending on the intensity of the desired look, apply one or more coats. For flawlessly defined or subtly ombré lips, use the Trait d’Hermès lip pencil before applying Silky Lipstick Shine. The Silky Lipstick Shine object is refillable. Only the lipstick bullet itself will need replacing. Refills are sold separately.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400022608512

PName: Rouge Hermès Poppy Lip Shine
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#A surprising lip shine that elegantly enhances and amplifies the natural radiance of the lips. A translucent, slightly orange-toned formula enriched with mother-of-pearl micro-particles. A fine, rich and comfortable texture. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! 0.1 oz. Made in Italy.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#Applied generously, it acts as a natural enhancer. Lips are lightly tinted with a subtle gloss. This is the Poppy touch.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Octyldodecanol, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Polybutene, Cera Microcristallina/microcrystalline Wax/cire Microcristalline, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Vp/hexadecene Copolymer, Vp/eicosene Copolymer, Polyethylene, Triisodecyl Trimellitate, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Phytosteryl Isostearate, Propylene Carbonate, Silica, Dicalcium Phosphate, Parfum (Fragrance), Tin Oxide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Bht, Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400012405884

PName: Rouge Hermès Lip Care Balm
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#A complete treatment for the lips with moisturizing and smoothing properties. A rich balm with a fine, soft and symbiotic texture. Its natural, non-greasy finish is perfect for both men and women. A formula with a high concentration of beeswax and candelilla wax for well-hydrated, supple and comfortable lips. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! 0.12 oz. Made in Italy.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#The stick is domed for easy, liberal and generous application, either as a base to smooth and soften the lips before adding color, or as a treatment to keep the lips continuously hydrated.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Cera Alba/beeswax/cire D’abeille, Cera Microcristallina/microcrystalline Wax/cire Microcristalline, Candelilla Cera/euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/cire De Candelilla, Nylon-12, Raspberry Seed Oil/tocopheryl Succinate Aminopropanediol Esters, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Lecithin, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Phytosterols, Oleyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400012405883

PName: Rouge Hermès Matte Lipstick
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#A comfortable, hydrating matte lipstick with a second-skin effect. Its velvety, powdery finish delivers intense, long-lasting color. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box! 0.12 oz. PName: Trait d’Hermès Lip Color Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d’Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define, and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. The formula delivers an intense, long-wear color. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house’s emblematic H. The color can be applied in a single stroke, to delineate, define, and enhance the contours of the lips, or to color them. The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible, or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick. 0.03 oz. Made in Germany.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients. #||#INGREDIENTS#||#: CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, CERA CARNAUBA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA, CANDELILLA CERA/EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX/CIRE DE CANDELILLA, HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, MICA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, TOCOPHEROL, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, MORUS ALBA BARK EXTRACT, BENZYL ALCOHOL, [+/- MAY CONTAIN : CI 15850 (RED 6, RED 7 LAKE), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE), CI 77491/CI 77492/CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 45410 (RED 28 LAKE)]. #5431179ALearn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400021976213
