PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with colour, echoing Hermès’ workmanship.Hermès’ nail enamel is available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. 0.5 oz. Made in France.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the centre of the nail, and sweep it upwards to the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the color more intense.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#BUTYL ACETATE • ETHYL ACETATE • NITROCELLULOSE • ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER • ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE • ALCOHOL • STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE • ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL • ETOCRYLENE • DIACETONE ALCOHOL • HEXANAL • LITHOTHAMNION CALCAREUM EXTRACT • PHOSPHORIC ACID • MANNITOL • SORBIC ACID • DIATOMACEOUS EARTH • ZINC SULFATE • N-BUTYL ALCOHOL • TOCOPHEROL • [+/- (MAY CONTAIN) : CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE) • CI 77742 (MANGANESE VIOLET) • CI 77491/CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES) • CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE) • CI 73360 (RED 30)] *Ingrédients issus de l’agriculture biologique#||#Style Code: 0400015147750

PName: Trait d'Hermès Le Courbe-Cils Eyelash Curler
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Suitable for all shapes of eyelids, Le Courbe-cils eyelash curler enhances and sets the natural curl of the lashes, giving the eyes an elevated appearance. Gently press and hold at the base of the lashes to achieve a natural, wide-eyed look. This portable and durable object in matte black metal is engraved with the tone-on-tone Hermès signature on the golden band. Protected by a canvas pouch and an orange box, Le Courbe-cils comes with three replaceable pads: white, blue and orange. Imported.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400020007349

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Color Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic "H". 0.042 oz. Made in Germany.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#These twenty-four emblematic, surprising, and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. Combining highly sensory qualities and intense pigments, the formula is suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#The color is applied in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze. Using the pencil's smudger or the L'estompeur de précision brush, create a wide range of make-up results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#This list is subject to change over time. Please refer to the information on the product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400021976585

PName: Eau de mandarine ambrée Eau de Cologne Spray
Product_Description: I can think of no smell more joyful than mandarin, more mellow than amber. Jean-Claude EllenaReinventing its classic connections with citrus fruits and freshness, Eau de mandarine ambrée brings a vitality to Cologne that is as mischievous as it is gentle. Intrinsically cheerful mandarin is combined with sparkling passion fruit which is itself revealed by the mellowness of amber. A novella that expresses a lively, shimmering, smooth paradise, captured in a colour. 3.3 oz. Made in France.#||#Style Code: 0437577537019

PName: Eau de pamplemousse rose - Eau de Cologne Bottle
Product_Description: A bitter-sweet cologne: freedom in tradition. PName: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: Luminous and sophisticated, Baccarat Rouge 540 lays on the skin like an amber, floral and woody breeze. A poetic alchemy. A graphic and highly condensed signature. Paraben free. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#JasmineSaffronCedar woodAmbergris#||#ABOUT THE BRAND#||#Recognized as one of the world's most celebrated perfumers, Francis Kurkdjian imagined a fragrance territory of a free, sensual and delicate perfectionism. The perfumery is guided by purity, sophistication, timelessness and the boldness of a classicism reinvented. They are continually writing a number of sensory adventures, in which perfume is, naturally, the hero.#||#Style Code: 0400095177980

PName: Addict Lip Glow Color Reviver Balm
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#The must-have universal balm from Dior Backstage, now unveiling two new finishes: Matte and Holographic, alongside the original Glow. All enhance the lips and bring out their natural color. Dior Addict Lip Glow reacts to the unique chemistry of each woman's lips to give them a natural flush of custom color that suits her skin tone. Lips look fresh, full and radiant, as if revived from within. 0.12 oz. Made in France.WHO IT'S FOREach enhancing, comforting shade blends into and reacts with the lips to awaken a flush of natural color that is customized to every woman's skin tone.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#The Lip Glow formula, concentrated in mango butter, provides continual hydration for 24 hours. Its secret lies in a perfect balance between make-up and lip care. The renowned Color Reviver technology reacts to the moisture and pH level of the lips, releasing its active ingredients and instantly bringing out a natural flush of customized color.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#Wear it alone, below, or on top of lipstick: Apply alone for a natural flush of color. Wear as a lip balm or primer. Layer on top of lipstick to change the effect. Top with Lip Maximizer for even more radiant results.New Matte Glow. The velvety, soft matte finish that delivers transparent color on its own and also works perfectly as a base with a matte lipstick. Dior's first Color Reviver Nourishing Lip Balm.New. Holographic Glow. The iridescent, radiant "Holographic" glow finish that creates the shimmery illusion of enhanced lips. Dior's first Color Reviver Hydrating Lip Balm.Original Glow. The iconic finish. Born backstage and loved by make-up artists for its instant, made-to-measure rosy tint effect.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400094116820

PName: Rouge Dior Lipstick
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Rouge Dior Lipstick is a refillable, long-lasting lipstick with hydrating floral lip care for up to 24-hour comfort. 0.12 oz. Made in France.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#Presented in a sleek magnetic case with an even wider range of shades, this lipstick provides up to two times more lip care than before in stay-true couture colors.#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#Apply the Rouge Dior balm (sold separately) as a hydrating base. Use a tissue to remove any excess product before applying makeup to the lips. Line the lips with Rouge Dior Contour (sold separately). For intense and even color, apply Rouge Dior lipstick from the center of the lips outwards.Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400020599140

PName: Miss Dior Parfum
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Created by Francis Kurkdjian, Miss Dior Parfum opens with the juicy freshness of a sparkling mandarin. Starry jasmine, tailor-made for Dior, brings out succulent wild strawberry facets, and the ambery woody accord warms up a soothing depth to this intense yet incredibly smooth fruity floral parfum. Made in France.#||#NOTES#||#MandarinJasmineAmber wood#||#HOW TO USE IT#||#1. Soften skin with the rich, creamy Miss Dior Moisturizing Body Milk. 2. Spray Miss Dior Eau de Parfum on pulse points: wrists and neck. 3. Add shine and delicately scent the hair with Miss Dior Hair Mist.ABOUT THE BOTTLEThe couturier's fragrance, Miss Dior Parfum, is adorned with a 'poignard' bow crafted in the workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers, known for its decade-long dedication to high fashion shows. A couture detail, woven from Lurex threads in a silvery hue that echoes the signature label. The emblematic Miss Dior houndstooth motif is engraved in the glass of this perfume in shimmering pink tones.#||#Style Code: 0400020791402

PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: A garden full of life, generous and sparkling, where the scents of green mango, lotus blossom and rush blend with incense and sycamore wood. A new and rather unusual concept of freshness; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand. Un Jardin sur le Nil is an impressionistic stroll through the island-gardens on the Nile at Aswan, the starting point for a new olfactory adventure. Green mango, lotus, calamus and sycamore wood all lie at the heart of this refreshing ode- Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li describes a Chinese garden poised between reality and imagination. A place for meditation, where strolling is allied to thought, and every step sets the imagination free. A garden of awakening and harmony, poised between reality and the imagination, with wet stones, vegetal jasmine and kumquats. "I remembered the smell of ponds, the smell of jasmine, the smell of wet stones, of plum trees, kumquats and giant bamboos. It was all there, and in the ponds there were even carp steadily working towards their hundredth birthdays." - Jean-Claude Ellena.

PName: Trait d'Hermès Eye Color Pencil
Product_Description: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the eyes. The pencils can be used to draw a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids, for a natural or sophisticated result. The twenty-four emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are a nod to the Hermès store at 24, Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris. Combining a firm point with a creamy texture, the eye pencil offers a matte finish. Easy to apply, it draws an even line in a single gesture for a precise or smudged look. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils from your childhood, this eye pencil is made of wood. It has a built-in smudger and its brushed metal cap is adorned with the House's emblematic "H."#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A formula that combines highly sensory qualities and intense pigments#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Draws a precise or smudged line of color on the eyelids; creamy texture offers a matte finish; suitable for application to the eyelids and waterline of even sensitive eyes#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Apply the color in a single stroke, along the waterline or the lower lash line, to open up the gaze#||#Using the pencil's smudger or the L'Estompeur de Précision Brush (sold separately), you can create a wide range of makeup results, from thin to thick, graphic and clean to soft and blended lines on the eyelid and along the waterline

PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Moisturizing Body Lotion, 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur le Nil expresses the gentle escapism of the Parfums-Jardins in the form of a moisturizing body lotion. Another way to wear fragrance. Green and woody, Un Jardin sur le Nil combines tangy green mango with delicate lotus and elegant sycamore. The straight lines of the bottle are embellished with two signature details: the "H" imprint of the base and the saddle nail engraved on the pump.

PName: Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS#||#Rose Abricoté evokes fresh dew on the lips. Its weightless and translucent halo reveals the lips' natural beauty. With its fine and delicate waxy finish, the rosy lip enhancer melts over the lip, leaving a hint of transparent pink and a matte luminosity. Lips are delicately smoothed with a soft-focus effect. Sesame seed and raspberry seed oils help soften and nourish. The rosy lip enhancer object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic yet functional and durable. Made from lacquered, polished and brushed metal, it is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box! This object is refillable. Refills are sold separately. 0.14 oz. Made in Italy.#||#WHAT IT DOES#||#Bevelled and slightly rounded, the shape of the bullet invites a generous and precise application.#||#INGREDIENTS#||#Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Mica, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/dicaprate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Dimethicone/phenyl Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Polybutene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Raspberry Seed Oil/tocopheryl Succinate Aminopropanediol Esters, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Citric Acid, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Propylene Carbonate, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Tocopherol, Phytosterols, Oleyl Alcohol, Bht [+/- (May Contain) : Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491/ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 45410 (Red 27, Red 28 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake)]Learn more about ourshippingandreturnspolicy.#||#Style Code: 0400014017135

PName: Barénia Perfumed Soap, 4.4 oz.
Product_Description: Barénia is a skin perfume, bringing together strength and softness. It expresses the instinctive, captivating facets of a woman, an unstoppable woman. The living embodiment of freedom. Derived from the Eau de Parfum that blends exhilarating Butterfly Lily with the delicacy of Miracle Berry, and envelops them in oakwood with an intense patchouli, Barénia Perfumed Soap releases a generous lather that gently cleanses the skin while leaving it delicately scented. The oval bar is easy to grip and decorated with the iconic Hermès "H."

PName: Twilly d'Hermès Eau Poivrée Eau de Parfum, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: The peppery spirit of the Hermès girls. A daring fragrance colored with vibrant pink peppercorn, tender rose and elegant patchouli. Spicy, floral, woody. Hermès girls swim happily against the tide, set their own tempo, invent a whole new rhythm. For them I have imagined a new facet in tribute to their youthful spirit. - Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumer. Twilly Eau Poivrée travels from the skin to the mind, colorful and incisive. Three new materials make up its sensuality: the vibrant and abundant heat of pink peppercorn, the teenage freshness of tender rose and the captivating enchantment of patchouli. Their essences intertwine, weaving the invisible web that connects the Hermès girls to each other.

PName: Terre d'Hermes Eau Intense Vétiver Eau de Parfum 1.7 oz.
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES: Vetiver, Green Bergamot, Sichuan Pepper FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Woody ABOUT THE FRARGANCE: Men are beckoned to another Terre. In 2018, Christine Nagel explored her vision of Terre d'Hermès and created Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver. A new luminous vibration, an unprecedented expression of the power of Terre. An intense, woody fragrance, Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver expresses the depth of vetiver combined with the liveliness of green bergamot and Sichuan pepper.
The original cap takes on the warm brown hue of leather tanned in the sun. At its base, the bottle rests on an H in a deeper shade of orange. At the top, the light is intensified and reflected by the bottle's metal shoulders. When held in the hand, the Terre d'Hermès Eau Intense Vetiver bottle unveils its many details: the House's iconic Clou de Selle, the sliding cover used to release the spray, etc. Created by designer Philippe Mouquet, it is inspired by a bottle in a travel vanity case that is conserved at the Emile Hermès museum.

PName: Twilly Eau Ginger Eau de Parfum 1.6 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: - Top note: peony - Middle note: candied ginger - Base note: cedar ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Twilly Eau Ginger, the sparkle of the Hermès girls. A captivating creation woven with three materials: A generous, vibrant peony, a bright candied ginger, a supple and lively cedar. Yesterday they were mischievous, then daring and today they are joyful, bright and sparkling. Their faces light up, smiling and free, to express the impertinence and freshness of this new Twilly d'Hermès, one that turns everything on its head... Inside its box, printed with the astrology-inspired design reworked in fresh colors, sits the Twilly Eau Ginger bottle, tied with a new silk ribbon and topped with a brilliant white cap.

PName: Eau des Merveilles Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Ambergris, wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau des Merveilles tells the tale of an imaginary journey at HERMÈS, the feet on the ground, the head among the stars. A modern fairy tale, bursting with charm and mystery. The perfume of enchantment, capturing the spirit of wood, the memory of the oceans and the sparkle of a constellation.

PName: Eau des Merveilles Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Ambergris, wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Eau des Merveilles tells the tale of an imaginary journey at HERMÈS, the feet on the ground, the head among the stars. A modern fairy tale, bursting with charm and mystery. The perfume of enchantment, capturing the spirit of wood, the memory of the oceans and the sparkle of a constellation.

PName: Elixir des Merveilles Eau de Parfum Natural Spray, 1.6 oz.
Product_Description: FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, this fragrance was created in 2004 by Ralph Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. It successfully takes on the challenge of being a sparkling women's perfume with not a flower in sight.

PName: Elixir des Merveilles Eau de Parfum Natural Spray, 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Eau des Merveilles leads us by the nose on a dream cloud. A multifaceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, this fragrance was created in 2004 by Ralph Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. It successfully takes on the challenge of being a sparkling women's perfume with not a flower in sight.

PName: L'Ombre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum 1.6 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Tonka Bean, Incense, Black Tea ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The intense radiance of a chiaroscuro fragrance, both woody and amber. The sensuality of tonka bean and incense emphasized by deep notes of black tea. Since 2004, Eau des Merveilles has been a key that opens the door to the wonders of Hermès. From innocence to fantasy, from childhood dreams to femininity, it is a world where the extraordinary is brought into the light. Year after year, you are transported on an air of poetic enchantment. Captured in their round bottles resembling a magnifying glass, the fragrances have the magical power to see the world from new and marvelous angles. It is the key to wonders, the origin of stars in broad daylight.

PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Green mango, lotus, calamus, sycamore wood ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: "A new idea of freshness that is rather unusual; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand." --Jean-Claude Ellena Un Jardin sur le Nil is an impressionistic stroll through the island-gardens on the Nile at Aswan, the starting points for a new olfactory adventure. Green mango, lotus, calamus and sycamore wood all lie at the heart of this refreshing ode.

PName: Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette Natural Spray 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Kumquat, jasmine, mint ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: "I remembered the smell of ponds, the smell of jasmine, the smell of wet stones, of plum trees, kumquats and giant bamboos. It was all there, and in the ponds there were even carp steadily working towards their hundredth birthday." --Jean-Claude Ellena Le Jardin de Monsieur Li describes a Chinese garden somewhere between reality and imagination. A place for meditation where strolling is allied to thought, and every step sets the imagination free.

PName: Un Jardin en Méditerranée Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: Inspired by annual themes at HERMÈS, the garden perfumes collection is an olfactory stroll, in situ creation, in the footsteps of the in-house perfumer. A narrative novel, a travel log that tells the spirit of a Mediterranean secret garden where trees and flowers—a mosaic of warm and soft scents—abound. A fragrance of light and shadow, enveloping and sensual. Woody, green, fruity.

PName: Osmanthe Yunnan Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: KEY NOTES: Osmanthus, apricot, freesia ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Osmanthe Yunnan, a seductive game of tea, flowers and fruits. The Hermessence collection is an emblematic collection, unveiling the essence of Hermès and the soul of fragrance, expressed with unique poetry. "During a visit to the Forbidden City in Beijing, I was captivated by an exquisite smell that led me by the tip of my nose to the Imperial Palace, where osmanthus bushes were in bloom. In November, despite their tiny size, the flowers exuded a strong scent of apricot and freesia. I imagined combining these blossoms with a tea from Yunnan, the most beautiful province in China...and the idea for the fragrance was born."--Jean-Claude Ellena

PName: Oud Alezan Eau de Parfum 3.3 oz.
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES:
Exceptional Oud, Rose Hydrolat, Rose Oxide FRAGRANCE FAMILY: Floral ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: The Hermessence Oud Alezan was born when Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel encountered an extraordinary oud. "That feeling of being immersed in an incredibly intimate and sensual material revived a disconcerting memory I have of smelling the neck of a chestnut horse." Heady, subtle and majestic, Oud Alezan embodies an accord between an exceptional, enveloping oud and a striking duo of contrasting roses. An Hermessence suitable for both men and women. The bottle is showcased by a plum-brown-colored lacquer on the glass, contrasting with the chalk-colored leather adorning the cap. The house's emblematic "lantern" bottle constitutes a unique and timeless signature. Its leather cap with saddle-stitch signature is topped with an engraved Hermès saddle nail.

PName: Oud Alezan Eau de Parfum 6.7 oz.
Product_Description:
KEY NOTES:

The house's emblematic "lantern" bottle constitutes a unique and timeless signature. Its leather cap with saddle-stitch signature is topped with an engraved Hermès saddle nail.

PName: Rose Hermès Silky Blush Powder & Refill
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Blush with a semi-matte finish, embossed with a texture resembling silk twill. A fine, silky, long-lasting powder for a luminous, radiant complexion. WHAT IT DOES: At once ethereal and compact, its ultra-light, pigmented texture allows color intensity to be tailored as desired, softened, or asserted, from the most natural to the most sophisticated finish. This long-lasting powder clings to the skin with the first touch. With its round case and off-center mirror, this disc of white and gold light designed by Pierre Hardy is distinctive for its lightness, as it was conceived for use on the go. Slipped inside its orange box, this is a pure Hermès object. Rose Hermès Silky Blush can be refilled by simply removing and replacing its powder pan. The refill is compatible with all objects in the Rose Hermès Silky Blush collection. The needle is supplied with the refill. HOW TO USE IT: • Healthy glow: Apply to the hollows of the cheeks, then lightly dust the nose with any surplus powder to brighten the complexion. • Highlighted cheekbones: Apply in circular motions to the cheekbones to reflect natural light for a fresh look. • Sculpted effect: Apply from the cheekbones to the temples for a more sophisticated look.

PName: Rose Hermès Silky Blush Powder & Refill
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Blush with a semi-matte finish, embossed with a texture resembling silk twill. A fine, silky, long-lasting powder for a luminous, radiant complexion. PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Nail polish available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. WHAT IT DOES: The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. Its fluid texture leaves a fine, smooth film on the nail. Its intense colors contain a high concentration of ultra-fine pigments. Its formula, made in France, is composed of at least 71% ingredients of natural origin. The long and supple rounded brush covers the nail in a single gesture. It enables precise and uniform application. Lacquered with pure color, nails come to life. Protected inside its little orange box, the object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic and functional. Its white metal cap is engraved with the Hermès ex-libris. HOW TO USE IT: To apply the nail enamel, place the brush just above the cuticle, at the center of the lunula, then sweep it upward to the tip of the nail. Repeat on each side of the nail to cover its entire surface. Allow to dry for two minutes. Applying a second coat will make the color more intense. ABOUT THE BRAND: Les Mains Hermès is the third chapter of Hermès Beauty. A collection combining care with color, echoing Hermès' handicrafts and workmanship. A complete hand-care cream, a nourishing oil for nails and cuticles, a protective base coat, nail enamels, a top coat and a set of nail files compose a repertoire of personal care.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nail Enamel
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Nail polish available in 24 shades inspired by the colors of Hermès enamel. WHAT IT DOES: The nail polish provides radiant color and a long-lasting lacquered shine. PName: Trait d'Hermès Lip Pencil
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: Created by Gregoris Pyrpylis, Creative Director of Hermès Beauty, the Trait d'Hermès collection of color pencils offers a wide range of expressive possibilities for the lips. The easy-to-apply, long-wear pencils can be used to delineate, define and enhance the lip contour or naturally shade the lips. WHAT IT DOES: Creamy and comfortable, the matte-finish pencil glides onto the lips in a single stroke. The line may be precise or blended. The formula delivers intense, long-wear color. Designed by Pierre Hardy, the pencil is inspired by the obstacle bars used in show-jumping competitions, with its black and white lacquer and brushed metal. Like the colored pencils we remember from childhood, it is made of wood and has a built-in smudger. Its brushed metal cap is adorned with the house's emblematic H. SHADES: The 16 emblematic, surprising and timeless colors are designed to match all the shades in the Rouge Hermès collection perfectly. HOW TO USE IT: The color can be applied in a single stroke, to delineate, define and enhance the contours of the lips, or to color them. The pencil is ideal for creating a tone-on-tone or contrasting look, for an ombré effect when combined with a balm or an Hermèsistible, or to prolong the hold of a Rouge Hermès lipstick.

PName: Rouge Hermès Matte lipstick
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A comfortable, hydrating matte lipstick with a second-skin effect. WHAT IT DOES: Its velvety, powdery finish delivers intense, long-lasting color. In high concentration, its pigments release their imprint in a single application. The pointed tip of the lipstick gives a neat and precise line in a single gesture. Rouge Hermès is a complete collection dedicated to the beauty of the lips. Objects designed by Pierre Hardy that are at once poetic, functional and refillable. A durable object in lacquered, polished and brushed metal, Rouge Hermès is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped inside its little orange box!

PName: Rouge Hermès Matte lipstick
Product_Description: WHAT IT IS: A comfortable, hydrating matte lipstick with a second-skin effect. WHAT IT DOES: Its velvety, powdery finish delivers intense, long-lasting color. PName: Terre d'Hermès Pure Perfume Spray, 6.7 oz.
Product_Description: The warmth and density of wood combined with the softness of benzoin and the sparkle of shiso. Terre d'Hermès narrates the relationship between man and earth, his humble and harmonious dialogue with the elements and nature. Terre d'Hermès is the perfume that connects man to his origins, to the source of his creative power.#||#Features#||#Fragrance Notes: Grapefruit, Cedar, Shiso.#||#This item purchased online must be returned to the vendor by mail only. This item cannot be returned to Macy's stores.

PName: Eau de Citron Noir Eau de Cologne, 6.7-oz.
Product_Description: The striking and explosive vitality of citrus fruits combined with the depth of subtle smoky and woody notes of black lime. Bottle with removable pump. Following a path through the olfactory universe of hesperidia led me into a vast world, dotted with surprises, with citrus fruits. Finger lime, Buddha's hand fruit, Eureka lemon... So many unusual varieties of citrus appealed to me, but it was the smoky and distinguished black lime that finally stood out as the key note. - Christine Nagel. Eau de Citron Noir offers a unique and paradoxical imprint, a surprisingly persistent freshness which rises to the challenge of tenacity: it is the midday-to-midnight cologne!

PName: Eau de Rhubarbe Ecarlate, Eau de Cologne, 6.7 oz
Product_Description: The crisp tangy freshness of rhubarb with the velvety allure of white musks. Bottle with removable pump. I've always loved the duality of rhubarb. A double duality: visual and olfactory. The green colour metamorphoses into red. Starting acidic and crisp, its smell becomes smooth and velvety. -Christine Nagel With Eau de rhubarbe écarlate, Christine Nagel created her first cologne for Hermès. Unprecedented and bold, more vegetal than citrus, it gives us the crisp, acidic freshness of rhubarb made velvet-smooth with white musks.

PName: Barénia Perfumed Body Cream, 6.5 oz.
Product_Description: Barénia brings together strength and softness. It expresses the instinctive, captivating facets of a woman. An unstoppable woman. The living embodiment of freedom. Derived from the Eau de Parfum, Barénia Perfumed Body Cream has a melting, enveloping texture that soothes and hydrates the skin while leaving it delicately fragranced. Barénia blends exhilarating butterfly lily with the delicacy of the miracle berry and envelops them in oakwood and an intense patchouli.#||#Features#||#FRAGRANCE FAMILY:#||#Warm & Sensual#||#KEY NOTES:#||#Butterfly Lily, Miracle Berry, Oak, Patchouli

PName: Élixir des Merveilles Eau de Parfum, 1.6-oz.
Product_Description: A blend of merveilles, mouth-watering and sensual: candied orange meets patchouli. From surprise to magic and from magic to enchantment, Élixir des Merveilles leads you by the nose on a dream cloud. A multi-faceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, it was created in 2004 by Ralph Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer and successfully rises to the challenge of being a sparkling fragrance for women with not a flower in sight.

PName: Plein Air H Trio Healthy Glow Mineral Powder
Product_Description: Beauty in the open air with the H Trio mineral powders. Inspired by three of nature's elements (air, sun and earth), the Healthy Glow Mineral Powder leaves a semi-matt veil of finely iridescent, pigmented powder on the skin, illuminating it with warmth. Depth is added progressively and the skin comes to life, revealed in a new light, subtly sun-kissed, radiant and vibrant with the sun's energy. Each harmony evokes the color palette of one of the world's landscapes. With its round case, the white and gold disc of light designed by Pierre Hardy is remarkable for its generosity. The compact powder bears a pattern of fine lines evoking silk twill, overlaid by the emblematic H passant motif. This Art Deco-influenced graphic signature was created in the mid-1920s for Hermès the saddler. The H is as functional as it is aesthetic and offers three levels of intensity for a single shade, the vertical band being the darkest and the background the lightest. The case can be refilled by simply removing and replacing the powder pan. Refills are sold separately.

PName: Les Mains Hermès Nourishing Oil, 0.5 oz.
Product_Description: The Les Mains Hermès Nourishing Oil contains the essential nutrients needed to nourish, hydrate, fortify and protect the nails from dryness. The oil also hydrates and softens the cuticles. The object designed by Pierre Hardy is both poetic and functional, slipped inside its little orange box!

PName: Rose Hermès Rosy Lip Enhancer
Product_Description: The Rosy Lip Enhancer is a lip enhancer that evokes fresh dew on the lips. Its weightless and translucent halo reveals the lips' own beauty. With its fine and delicate waxy finish, the Rosy Lip Enhancer melts over the lip, leaving a hint of transparent pink and a matt luminosity. Lips are delicately smoothed with a soft-focus effect. The Rosy Lip Enhancer object designed by Pierre Hardy is poetic yet functional and durable. Made from lacquered, polished and brushed metal, it is protected by a canvas pouch and slipped into its little orange box! This object is refillable. Refills are sold separately.#||#Features#||#WHAT IT IS:#||#A lip enhancer with a fine and delicate waxy finish#||#WHAT IT DOES:#||#Leaves a hint of transparent pink and a matt luminosity; delicately smooths lips with a soft-focus effect#||#INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS:#||#Sesame seed and raspberry seed oils help soften and nourish#||#HOW TO USE:#||#Beveled and slightly rounded, the shape of the bullet invites a generous and precise application

PName: Body Shower Cream, 6.7-oz.
Product_Description: A rich and velvety foaming cream. Skin is delicately perfumed, soft and supple. Another way to wear fragrance with Twilly d'Hermès.

PName: Moisturizing Body Lotion, 6.7-oz.
Product_Description: A fluid formula that is quickly absorbed. The skin is moisturized, soft, supple and delicately perfumed. Another way to wear fragrance with Twilly d'Hermès.

PName: Terre d'Hermes Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: The strength of citrus fruits and peppers combined with a note of flint reveal the trace of earth.Terre d'Hermès narrates the relationship between man and earth, his humble and harmonius dialogue with the elements and nature. Terre d'Hermès is the perfume that connects man to his origins, to the source of his creative power.6.7 oz./ 198 mL

PName: Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: Terre d’Hermès Eau Givrée, the heat of ice. A new Eau de Parfum, both fresh and intense. Created by Christine Nagel, Hermès’ perfumer, Terre d’Hermès Eau Givrée combines the intensity of citron and the sharp freshness of juniper berry with the power of Timut pepper. The striking sensation of an icy breeze is contrasted with the warmth of the woody, mineral notes characteristic of Terre d’Hermès. Refillable and sustainable, the bottle combines glass with aluminum, two fully recyclable materials. As if cut from ice, the object is sleek and translucent. Frosted glass and brushed aluminum suggest the idea of frost covering the earth. The H on its base is a subtle reference to the ancestry of a now-cult object. Terre d’Hermès Eau Givrée explores a new territory where freshness and strength nourish each other. “An icy cloak fertilizes the earth, exalting it with new and vibrant strength.” - Christine Nagel, creative director of Hermès fragrances Terre d’Hermès Eau Givrée encapsulates in one bottle, two opposites: an icy tremor and generous power. The Eau de Parfum combines the intensity of citron, the sharp freshness of juniper berry, and the power of Timut pepper. The Terre d’Hermès collection tells the story of man’s relationship with the earth, and his humble and harmonious dialogue with nature and the elements. Key Notes:Cedrat, Juniper berries, Timut pepper 3.3 fl. oz./ 100 mL

PName: Twilly d'Hermes Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: The scent of the Hermès girls, a daring fragrance woven with striking ginger and sensual tuberose. A floral, spicy and oriental eau de parfum. It is in this spirit that Christine Nagel composed Twilly d'Hermès. Ginger, tuberose and sandalwood are given a new twist. Combined differently, they become searing spice, disconcerting attraction, a revelation of the carnal. In a final flash of wit, a hand-tied silk ribbon playfully graces the bottle. It is with young women in mind, by observing their lives, that I created Twilly d'Hermès. Free, bold and irreverent, they swim against the tide, impose their own rhythm, invent a brand new tempo. – Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumer.Fragrance Family: FloralScent Type: Oriental FloralKey Notes: Ginger, Tuberose, Sandalwood2.9 oz./ 85 mL

PName: Twilly Eau Ginger Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: Twilly Eau Ginger,the sparkle of the Hermès girls. A captivating creation woven with three materials:a generous, vibrant peony, a bright candied ginger, and a supple and lively cedar. Yesterday they were mischievous, then daring, and today they are joyful, bright, and sparkling. Their faces light up, smiling and free, to express the impertinence and freshness of this new Twilly d’Hermès, one that turns everything on its head... Inside its box, printed with the astrology-inspired design reworked in fresh colours, sits the Twilly Eau Ginger bottle, tied with a new silk ribbon and topped with a brilliant white cap. 2.8 oz./ 85 mL

PName: Twilly Eau Ginger Eau de Parfum

PName: Twilly d'Hermes Eau Poivree
Product_Description: The peppery spirit of the Hermès girls. A daring fragrance colored with vibrant pink peppercorn, tender rose and elegant patchouli. Spicy, floral, woody.Hermès girls swim happily against the tide, set their own tempo, invent a whole new rhythm. For them I have imagined a new facet in tribute to their youthful spirit. - Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumerTwilly Eau Poivrée travels from the skin to the mind, colourful and incisive.Three new materials make up its sensuality: the vibrant and abundant heat of pink peppercorn, the teenage freshness of tender rose and the captivating enchantment of patchouli.Their essences intertwine, weaving the invisible web that connects the Hermès girls to each other.1.6 oz. / 50 mL

PName: Eau des Merveilles Eau de Toilette Natural Spray
Product_Description: A multi-faceted novel built on a woody amber accord that resonates right through to the top notes, this fragrance was created in 2004 by Ralf Schwieger and Nathalie Feisthauer. It successfully takes on the challenge of being a sparkling women's perfume with not a flower in sight. Scent Type Spicy, Dry Fragrance Family Woody, Amber Fragrance Key Notes - Top notes: Vetiver, Oak, Cedar. -Middle notes: Ambergris. -Base notes: Lemon, Orange, Elemi, Pink Pepper Scent Inspiration In Gentle fluidity, Silver Maison Francis Kurkdjian, nutmeg, and amber woods dominate to release a vibrant and comfortable trail. The essence of juniper berries, reveals an ultra-fresh and aromatic high note like a gin fizz balanced with dry spicy notes and balmy nutmeg notes. Alternatively soft and enveloping, powerful, and dry facets of amber wood appear in the background. The aromatic woody Gentle fluidity Silver eau de parfum is benevolent and free, deeply moving. Ingredients Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate, Farnesol, Benzyl Alcohol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Geraniol.

PName: L'Ombre des Merveilles Eau de Parfum, 3.3 oz.
Product_Description: The intense radiance of a chiaroscuro fragrance, both woody and oriental. The sensuality of tonka bean and incense emphasized by deep notes of black tea.Since 2004, Eau des Merveilles has been a key that opens the door to the wonders of Hermès. From innocence to fantasy, from childhood dreams to femininity, it is a world where the extraordinary is brought into the light. Year after year, we are transported on an air of poetic enchantment. Captured in their round bottles resembling a magnifying glass, the fragrances have the magical power to see the world from new and marvelous angles. It is the key to wonders, the origin of stars in broad day light.3.3 oz./ 100 mL

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur la Lagune, a dream garden, soothing and vibrant. A floral and woody Eau de Toilette.I dreamed of this garden; I created a perfume woven from its memories, the cycle of trees and flowers, nature still enduring within it - Christine Nagel, Hermès perfumerA half open door, a dream escapesUn jardin sur la Lagune is a secret garden where nature comes into its own again.Woody scents blend with floral notes. The wind carries afar salty notes.1.6 oz. / 50 mL

PName: Un Jardin sur la Lagune Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: Un Jardin sur la Lagune, a dream garden, soothing and vibrant. PName: Un Jardin sur le Nil Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: A new idea of freshness that is rather unusual; green and vegetal scents; the smell of water and sand. Jean-Claude EllenaUn Jardin sur le Nil is an impressionistic stroll through the island-gardens on the Nile at Aswan, the starting points for a new olfactory adventure. Green mango, lotus, calamus and sycamore wood all lie at the heart of this refreshing ode.Eau de Toilette1.6 fl. oz. / 45.4 mL

PName: Un Jardin sur le Toit Eau de Toilette Spray
Product_Description: A garden for fun, a garden that answers to no one, sprinkled with light. Jean-Claude EllenaUn Jardin sur le Toit is a lively, edgy novella. This perfume describes a secret garden, nestled in the heart of the city in Paris. A hanging garden, perched on the roof of the house of Hermès, at 24 Faubourg Saint-Honoré. An apple tree, a pear tree, a magnolia in the Paris air, along with a few self-seeded imposters, all making up this perfume of light and pleasure, enticing and full of laughter.Eau de Toilette1.6 fl. oz. / 45.4 mL

PName: Un Jardin a Cythere Eau de Toilette
Product_Description: Creation: Created by Hermès’ perfumer Christine Nagel, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette is a surprising garden that is neither green nor floral, but... blond. It is the expression of an olfactory quest through Greece that leads to Kythira, an unspoiled island that has inspired many artists. Fragrance Notes: A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère Eau de Toilette combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio. The Object: Designed by Fred Rawyler, the bottle is inspired by the lines of the horse-drawn carriage lanterns of yesteryear. The luminous graduated yellow glass echoes the sunny fragrance. On the box, artist Elias Kafouros sketches a colorful landscape of his homeland: golden grasses, green olive trees, fresh pink pistachios, and, in the background, the blue of the sea. The Parfums Jardins Collection: The Parfums Jardins collection brings together the soul of a place, the inspiration of the perfumer, and the theme chosen by Hermès each year to illuminate its creation. An olfactory stroll to share every moment, to indulge every desire for freshness, reverie, or escape. 1.7 oz. / 50 mL Ingredients*: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Methyl Anthranilate, linalool, Coumarin, Citral, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Eugenol, Disodium Edta. *This list is subject to change over time.Please refer to the information on your product’s packaging for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.

PName: Rouge Hermes Satin Lipstick
Product_Description: The refill is compatible with all Rouge Hermès objects (matte lipstick, satin lipstick, lip care balm, lip shine). A luminous satin-finish lipstick, itstexture, as fine as it is rich, delivers vibrant, long-lasting color. Leaves the lips supple and conditioned. How to Use: The rounded tip of the lipstick allows for full and generous application. Ingredients*: Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Polyethylene, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/cire De Candelilla, Ozokerite, Dicalcium Phosphate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Lecithin, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Phytosterols, Oleyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491/ Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake)] *Please Note:This ingredient list is subject to change. PName: Sauvage Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes mysterious and sensual facets. Spicy and juicy bergamot brightens a trail of earthy patchouli and enveloping vanilla absolute with subtle smoky accents. An unforgettable signature that lasts all day and through the night. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: A timeless and refillable cologne bottle, dense and dark like the inky night, shading from total opaqueness to smoky transparency. As an object of true luxury, each detail has been carefully studied: the initials CD are engraved on the bottom, and a bee, a symbol of Dior men's fashion, is tucked inside the magnetized cap. The Sauvage Eau de Parfum bottle is now refillable thanks to its new eco-design. The Sauvage refill, not suitable for standalone use, is only compatible with the Sauvage Eau de Parfum 1.0-oz and 3.4-oz bottles labeled 'REFILLABLE' on the back ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. The Eau de Parfum represents the magic hour of the twilight in the desert when the wolves come out. As the coolness of the thick blue night meet the burning desert air, nature exudes profound scents. 1. Cleanse with Sauvage Shower Gel. 2. Hydrate your skin with Sauvage Moisturizer for Face and Beard. 3. Complete the Sauvage ritual by applying Sauvage Eau de Toilette on pulse points: wrists and neck. NOTES: crisp Calabrian bergamot, sensual vanilla absolute, earthy patchouli INGREDIENTS: #16095 Alcohol • Parfum (Fragrance) • Aqua (Water) • Limonene • Linalool • Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane • Triethyl Citrate • Coumarin • Citronellol • Citral • Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate • Geraniol • Ci 14700 (Red 4) • Ci 42090 (Blue 1) • Ci 47005 (Yellow 10) • Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2) 2 oz. / 60 mL

PName: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum
Product_Description: Baccarat Rouge 540is a universal, luminous, and intense fragrance with woody ambery floral notes, a one-of-a-kind condensed olfactory signature with a long-lasting sillage. Inspired by the 250th anniversary of Baccarat, Francis Kurkdjian wanted to convey the poetic alchemy of crystal-making in this woody ambery floral fragrance, imagining a unique creation based on 3 ‘auras’. In the top notes, the breezy facets of jasmine flowers and the radiance of saffron evoke the aura of air. They are highlighted by an accord evoking ambergris and dry woody tones, embodying the mineral aura. Lastly, the aura of fire is suggested by the addictive sensuality of ethyl maltol, a note with gourmand facets. To indulge in a moment of well-being and prolong the sillage of your fragrance, complete your perfume ritual with additional Baccarat Rouge 540 scented gestures: hand and body cleansing gel, body oil, hair mist, and solid soap. Fragrance Family: Woody, ambery, floral Top Notes: Jasmine and Saffron Heart Notes: Mossy woody accord Base Notes: Ethyl-maltol, Ambroxan™ (amber, dry woody and mineral note). 2.4 oz. / 70mL

PName: Miss Dior Parfum
Product_Description: Created by Francis Kurkdjian, this perfume opens with the juicy freshness of a sparkling mandarin. Starry jasmine, tailor-made for Dior, brings out succulent wild strawberry facets, and the ambery woody accord warms up a soothing depth to this intense yet incredibly smooth fruity floral parfum. ABOUT THE BOTTLE: The couturier's fragrance, Miss Dior Parfum, is adorned with a 'poignard' bow crafted in the workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers, known for its decade-long dedication to high fashion shows. A couture detail, woven from Lurex threads in a silvery hue that echoes the signature label. The emblematic Miss Dior houndstooth motif is engraved in the glass of this perfume in shimmering pink tones. ABOUT THE FRAGRANCE: Between strength and grace, boldness and elegance, Miss Dior embodies Dior's vision of youth and femininity. Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creation Director, reinterprets the original fragrance of the House, infusing it with today's youthful spirit. '1. Cleanse with Sauvage Shower Gel. 2. Hydrate your skin with Sauvage Moisturizer for Face and Beard. 3. Complete the Sauvage ritual by applying Sauvage Parfum on pulse points: wrists and neck. NOTES: sparkling mandarin, fruity jasmine, warm amber woods INGREDIENTS: #19950 Alcohol • Parfum (Fragrance) • Aqua (Water) • Linalool • Limonene • Benzyl Salicylate • Coumarin • Citronellol • Dipropylene Glycol • Geraniol • Hexyl Cinnamal • Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate • Citral • Benzyl Benzoate • Benzyl Alcohol • Eugenol • Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane • Ci 17200 (Red 33) • Ci 19140 (Yellow 5) • Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2) • Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate
